target: سوري. معلش يا أمنية، أنا آسفة إن أنا بقولك الخبر ده كدا، بس أهو اللي حصل.

source: That's fine.
We're here.
Did you really call your competition?
You've been ignoring me for a week, not returning my calls, and that's the first thing you say?
target: وإنتي بجد بقالك أسبوع قافشة عليا مبتكلمنيش، أول كلمة تقوليها ضرتك؟

source: Yes, it is! She's your rival.
No, she's not.
You're going to kill me, Ola.
You're killing me.
God help me.
I got coffee for you.
How are you holding up?
I'm still trying to wrap my head around what happened.
I'm sorry for this.
Don't be.
This is practically my job.
target: أنا معملتش حاجة ده شغلي بردو.

source: How's Hisham doing?
Getting there, slowly, but getting there.
Would you like to go in and see him?
Of course.
Hisham, Marwan wanted to come to check on us.
target: هشام، دكتور مروان كان عايز يطمن عليك.

source: I'm glad to hear you're doing better, Hisham.
target: حمدلله على سلامتك يا دكتور هشام.

source: Thank you. Thanks, Marwan.
So, do you work in this hospital too?
target: إنت حضرتك شغال هنا في المستشفى بردو؟

source: No, but he was also at the camp.
target: لا، بس هو كان في الكامب.

source: So, he was with me when I found out and nice enough to make sure I got here okay.
target: فلما عرفت هو كان موجود، وكتر خيره مكنش عايز يسبني لوحدي.

source: Hopefully, you'll be out in a few days.
target: يوم يومين، وهتخرج بالسلامة إن شاء الله.

source: Thank you so much. Thank you.
Please don't hesitate to call if you need anything from me or the doctors.
target: وطبعاً لو محتاجين أي حاجة، أرجوكوا متترددوش إنكوا تبلغوني.

source: All I need right now is Ola, Ola, and the kids.
target: أنا مش محتاج أي حاجة إلا علا والأولاد بس.

source: It's okay, Hisham.
Don't worry.
Ola is right here. She won't ever leave your side again.
target: هي علا هتبعد عنك تاني أبداً.

source: Okay, I'm gonna head out now. Please excuse me.
target: طب أستأذن أنا بقى، عن إذنكوا.

source: Bye-bye.
He's a good man.
Are you feeling any better?
No.
This is hard.
Hard, really hard.
Just hang in there. Still, a way to go.
But didn't you say he's past the critical stage?
target: إنت مش قولت إن هو كدا طلع من المرحلة الخطر؟

source: I didn't mean Hisham.
I meant you.
Everything passes.
Thanks for being there for all of us.
Bye-bye.
If you ever feel like talking, I'm here.
I'm a heart specialist. I know the patient's heart isn't the only one affected.
target: أنا حكيم قلب وعارف المواضيع دي بتعمل إيه في قلوب الناس.

source: Okay, so tell me. How does it affect other people's hearts?
target: وبتعمل إيه المواضيع دي في قلوب الناس؟

source: It can confuse them.
Okay, I'd better get going because I have surgery pretty soon.
target: أسيبك بقى علشان عندي عملية كمان شوية.

source: Zeina has been acting differently with Nadia and me.
I understand she's probably feeling angry and left out, but I just wanted to ensure you know that's the last thing I wanted to happen.
target: أنا فاهمة طبعاً إن هي أكيد زعلانة إن الاهتمام راح منها، بس مش قصدي أضايقها أو....

source: They're just being teenagers.
They'll make up soon enough, don't worry.
But she was very upset when she saw the two of us ... when we were together at the camp.
target: بس هي ادايقت، لما شافتنا يعني مع بعض في الكامب.

source: You've got enough on your plate.
I'll take care of it.
She's my daughter.
It may come as a surprise, but I know her pretty well.
target: ممكن مش باين بس أنا عارفها كويس.

source: Sweet dreams, Ola.
Thank you so much.
Don't worry, sweetie.
He's fine now.
Did you get to talk to him?
Yes, I did.
He said he wanted to see you guys.
Can we go see him?
Of course. Of course.
Can I lie down and get a few hours' sleep first?
target: ممكن بس أريح ساعتين كدا وبعد كدا آخدكوا؟

source: Where are you at?
How are you doing?
Like I've been through the wringer.
But I'm not thinking about me. I'm just worried about Hisham.
target: بس مش مهم أنا، المهم هو دلوقتي.

source: I don't know how I'm feeling.
I'm feeling so many things, but I can't put my finger on even one, and it's killing me.
target: مش عارفة أقفش أنا حاسة بإيه بالزبط. وده اللي معصبني.

source: How come that Marwan guy came with you to the hospital?
target: هو إيه اللي ودا دكتور مروان معاكي المستشفى؟

source: He's a doctor, a heart surgeon.
He was with us at the camp.
Zeina's father.
What kind of question is that?
Yeah, right.
I thought you said, "No way! He's Zeina's father! It's not like that."
target: مش هو اللي كان، ده أبو زينة ده أبو زينة لحد ما الشريط سف خلاص.

source: So much for sisterhood, I knew you wouldn't stay single for too long.
target: أنا كنت متأكدة إنك مش هتصمدي كتير في موضوع قُطع الرجالة ده.

source: Why do you always have to turn everything into a joke?
target: إنتي كل حاجة عندك هزار كدا؟

source: Everything.
Okay, all jokes aside.
target: طب من غير هزار يا ستي.

source: Marwan isn't just Zeina's father anymore.
There's something new, right?
It feels so wrong to talk about Marwan with Hisham being in his condition at the hospital.
target: أنا مكسوفة من نفسي أوي إن أنا بتكلم عن مروان وهشام في المستشفى.

source: But it's so lovely.
That's really strange, Nesrine.
You know that feeling when you've known someone forever?
target: عارفة لما تحسي إن إنتي تعرفي حد من زمان.

source: When you don't have to explain yourself all the time?s
You feel understood, you feel seen?
I know, yep.
The timing is off, Nesrine.
What do you mean, the timing?
Because Hisham will need to get better first.
target: دلوقتي في هشام في المستشفى وبس.

source: Sure, but that doesn't mean you must put your whole life on hold.
target: هو إنتي مش من حقك تتبسطي وتشوفي نفسك شوية إنتي كمان؟

source: You have the right to be happy.
I don't think I really have the option.
I mean, Marwan is literally still wearing his wedding band.
target: مروان لسه لابس الدبلة بتاعة مراته الله يرحمها.

source: He talks about his wife like she's still alive.
The whole thing is really awkward.
Also, I just got divorced.
I can't fall in love and go through all this again.
Ola! Don't you see this is worth the risk?
target: أه يختي حبي واتوجعي تاني مفيهاش حاجة.

source: You know how hard it is to find someone who understands you like that and would
target: مش كل يوم بنلاقي اللي إنتي بتحكي فيه ده، وتلاقي حد حاسس بيكي كدا.

source: Hey, sweetie.
I want to go see Daddy.
Okay, but I promise, Daddy's all better.
target: حاضر يا حبيبي، بس هو بقى كويس على فكرة.

source: You need to put on clothes, no pajamas.
So go upstairs, get dressed, and we'll leave right away.
target: يلا اطلع البس وهوديك على طول، يلا.

source: And brush your teeth.
I will change too, make some coffee and take them to the hospital.
target: أنا هطلع أغير وأودي الولاد المستشفى، عايزين يشوفوا باباهم.

source: No, honestly.
Please eat, Hisham. Do it for me!
target: كل بليز يا هشام، عشان خاطري.

source: I can't.
He said he doesn't want to.
Are you deaf?
Salim.
It's okay, Salim.
Do you feel any better?
Yeah, buddy, I do.
Are you still mad I couldn't go to the camp?
target: إنتي لسه زعلانة مني عشان معرفتش آجي الكامب؟

source: You know I can't stay mad at you even if I tried.
target: مقدرش أزعل منك، حتى لو حاولت.

source: Nadia, come here.
Why are you over there?
Cause I'm worried about you.
Did you too have fun at the camp?
I told him from the start that he would never find another woman like you.
target: أنا قولتله من الأول، عمره ما هيلاقي حد في ظرفك.

source: No one can take care of him like you.
target: مين ياخد باله منه ويحافظ عليه زيك؟

source: And who wouldn't just adore a mother-in-law like you, Soheir?
target: مين يلاقي الأصل ده ويسيبه يا سهير؟

source: But by the way, Ola, I told him if he left you, he'd regret it.
target: على فكرة يا علا، أنا حذرته. قولتله خد بالك لتندم.

source: Yeah, I believe that.
The queen of the block.
Of course we do, honey. We know. And you know how much we care.
target: إلا عارفين يا حبيبتي، وإنتي كمان طبعاً.

source: Omnia, though. Omnia, though. I hate her guts.
target: أمنية. أمنية. مش نزلالي من زور.

source: She's bad luck. I won't say this is her fault, but I won't say it's not either.
But we're on the right path now, it seems.
What do you mean, the right path, my dear Nazly?
target: اللي هو إيه الصحيح بقى يا طنط نازلي؟

source: Pardon?
What do you mean
Hey! Hands off.
By right path, she means that a man should have his wife and kids by his side. They can't abandon him when he's on his knees, right?
target: قصدها الصحيح إن طبعاً اللي يراعيه في الظروف دي لازم يبقوا مراته وولاده، أومال يعني لما يقع يتخلوا عنه كدا يعني؟

source: Choose your words carefully, Soheir. How dare you?
target: خدي بالك إنتي بتقولي إيه يا سهير.

source: I didn't mean that.
target: يا ستي أنا مش قصدي كدا.

source: I just mean that my daughter would never abandon Hisham when he needs her.
target: أنا قصدي يعني إن أنا بردو بنتي مهياش واطية علشان تتخلى عنه في الظروف دي.

source: Even though he's not quite the man she married anymore, right?
target: مع إنه يعني مش هو هشام اللي اتجوزته زمان.

source: He needs her after all, yes?
target: هو بردو.. هو بردو محتاج لها.

source: My son doesn't need her or anyone else, for that matter.
target: ابني مش محتاج لحد، لا ليها ولا لغيرها.

source: That's not what she meant.
Get off your high horses for a second and listen to me.
target: انزلي بس إنتي من البرج العالي بتاعك ده وافهميني.

source: We both want the same thing.
Put your ego aside, and help me!
How's it going, Ola?
How's Hisham feeling?
He's feeling much better. Thank God.
It really helps when the kids are there with him.
target: خاصةً لما الولاد بيبقوا جنبه بيبقى أحسن.

source: Listen, I have Zeina here. She wanted to check in on you guys.
target: طب خدي زينة عايزة تطمن عليكوا.

source: Hi, I'm sorry about Uncle Hisham.
Thanks, Zeina, she's good. But she misses you a lot.
target: أه يا زينة كويسة، بس إنتي وحشاها أوي.

source: Actually, we all miss you.
Do you wanna come and say hi?
I don't think so. Exams are coming up, and I should study.
target: لا أصل عندي مذاكرة كتير إنتي عارفة إن الامتحانات قربت.

source: But please, tell Nadia and everyone I said hi.
target: بس سلميلي على اونكل هشام وعلى نادية.

source: Okay, I just wanted to check on you guys in case you need anything.
target: طب أنا كنت حابب بس أطمن عليكوا وأشوف لو محتاجين حاجة.

source: Thanks. I should go. I can't leave anyone alone for too long.
target: أنا كمان هروح أشوف لو محتاجنّي فحاجة عشان مقدرش أسيبهم لوحدهم كتير.

source: Bye, Zeina.
Did something happen to Hisham?
What's going on?
Hisham doesn't want me by his side, Ola.
target: هشام مش عايزني جنبه يا علا.

source: No.
What?
Forget about what happened.
Think about the future instead.
It seems like Hisham is having second thoughts.
target: أصل هشام كدا شكله بيشاور عقله.

source: Oh, having second thoughts, I see.
Second thoughts about what exactly?
target: في إيه بقى إن شاء الله؟

source: Obviously, he misses you.
And he realized he needed to be back with his family.
target: وطلب إنه يقعد مع الولاد لوحده.

source: The rest is up to you.
You should work on it.
Do you ever listen?
After our last fight, you're still telling me how to live.
target: بعد الخناقة اللي اتخنقناها بتقوليلي كدا؟

source: Mom, enough. P
Enough already, please.
But what do you mean, Ola?
Come on.
Can't he see the way the man is looking at you?
target: إنتي مبتشوفيهوش يا بنتي بيبصلك إزاي؟

source: Why would you want to destroy your own family?
target: ولا إنتي مصرّة إنك تخربي بيتك بإيدك؟

source: Destroy my family?
Hisham isn't my family anymore, Mom.
target: لا، هو هشام مبقاش بيتي يا ماما.

source: He left, not me.
target: وهو اللي سبني مش أنا اللي سبته.

source: He's the one to blame.
And his mother, your best friend, all of a sudden, treated me like I was nothing while my heart was breaking. While your daughter's heart was breaking.
target: والست والدته دي اللي إنتي مأنتمة معاها دلوقتي واللي بتضحك في وشي دي أول وحدة باعتني لما قلبي كان بيتكسر، لما قلب بنتك كان بيتكسر.

source: But now that he's sick, I'm supposed to forgive him like none of that happened?
target: بس دلوقتي عشان هو ضعيف وتعبان يا حبيبي فلازم ننساله كل حاجة، ها؟

source: What is wrong with you?
Hisham won't stop asking for you.
What is it?
What's wrong?
I'm here.
Please, Ola, can you adjust the bed for me? Mom tried, but she couldn't do it.
target: معلش يا علا، بس ممكن تعدلي السرير عشان ماما حاولت مش عارفة.

source: Sure, of course. No problem.
It's easy.
Leemo, can you get up?
Like this.
Yes, that's good.
Give Daddy a little space.
Listen to your mom. Get up.
Do you want me to raise it more?
No, that's perfect.
Could you also grab the extra blanket in that closet, please?
target: ممكن بس، في فالدولاب اللي هناك ده غطا زيادة، ممكن تجيبهولي؟

source: Sure.
And that pillow, too.
Easy.
Easy.
Better now?
Does it hurt?
Just a little.
You've got some color back in your face.
Okay, kids. It's time to go home.
target: يلا يا ولاد إحنا هنروح، ها؟

source: You've got exams and need to study, and your dad needs to rest.
target: ورانا مذاكرة كتير والامتحانات خلاص قربت، ولازم بابا يريح شوية.

source: Yes?
Can't we stay with Daddy and make up our exams later?
target: هو مينفعش نطلب نأجل الtest ونفضل قاعدين مع بابي؟

source: No, sweetie, you've gotta take your exams.
target: لا يا حبيبتي مش هينفع تأجلوا الامتحانات خالص.

source: We'll spend plenty of time together while I get better.
target: لسه قدامنا وقت كتير وأيام كتيرة أوي هنقضيها مع بعض.

source: Plenty of time?
I would like to know if I can stay back at the house after I leave because I want to spend more time with the kids.
target: أنا بس كنت عايز أستأذنك لو ممكن أطلع من المستشفى عالبيت عشان نفسي أقضي وقت أكتر مع الولاد؟

source: Of course, honey, of course!
target: أه طبعاً يا حبيبي طبعاً. إنت بتقول إيه؟

source: You don't need to ask. The door is always open.
target: ده لو مشلتكش الأرض نشيلك جوا عنينا.

source: Sweetie, you don't need permission to stay in your own house.
target: حبيبي، في حد يستأذن عشان يروح بيته؟

source: Are you coming home with us?
Yes, buddy, as long as your mom is okay with it.
target: أه يا حبيبي بس لو ماما معندهاش مانع.

source: I just assumed that Daddy would feel more comfortable staying at Grandma Nazly's
target: هو أنا كنت بس فاكرة إن بابي هيرتاح عند تيتة نازلي أكتر.

source: But of course, it's your house.
Your house.
Is Dad really coming home with us?
target: هو فعلاً بابي هيجي معانا البيت؟

source: Of course, he's coming with us!
Who would he stay with?
With Omnia?
It wasn't okay to be so rude to Omnia.
target: إيه قلة الذوق اللي إنت عاملت الست دي بيها؟

source: Don't think I've forgotten.
We need to talk about it.
Why treat her like that?
Because it's her fault.
No, sweetie, it's not.
target: لا يا حبيبي هي مش السبب.

source: It is.
Then why did you accept?
I didn't say that, Salim.
target: أنا ما قولتش كدا يا سليم.

source: Leemo, sweeties, you're still too young to understand.
target: ليمو حبيبي، إنت أصغر من إن إنت تفهم الكلام ده.

source: Can we talk about this later, please?
target: ممكن بعدين نتكلم في الموضوع ده؟

source: Later.
I have a headache, and you guys need to study.
target: أنا عندي صداع فظيع وإنتوا عندكوا مذاكرة.

source: So why don't you save that energy for studying for your exams?
target: ممكن بقى توفر المخ الفولاذي ده للامتحانات؟

source: Hi, Ola. I'm on my way into surgery.
target: هاي يا علا أنا داخل على عملية صعبة دلوقتي.

source: Is everything okay?
How's Hisham?
He's stable, he's good, thank God.
I... never mind.
Maro, are you ready? Let's do this.
target: مارو، مش يلا بينا بقى ولا إيه؟

source: Come on.
Let's go, buddy. I'm ready.
target: يلا بينا يا باشا، أنا جاهز.

source: Thank you, Omar.
Help your husband.
I'm glad you're okay, Hisham.
I'm glad you're okay, baby.
We're all glad you're okay.
Saleh?
Welcome back, doctor. You brighten up the whole building.
target: ألف حمدلله عالسلامة يا دكتور، إيه النور ده! العمارة نورت.

source: Not just the building but the whole entire street.
Thanks.
I think it's pretty bright already.
Can you bring all his bags to the house and then park the car?
target: هات الشنط من العربية وحضّن العربية كويس وهات المفتاح.

source: Sure, ma'am.
Wait, Saleh. Come here.
Take this.
To celebrate the doctor.
You don't have to
Did you buy the pigeons?
Of course.
Why pigeons? We're not newlyweds.
And some nutmeg for dinner.
target: وابقى هاتلي شوية جوزة الطيب كدا كمان.

source: We ran out.
Don't worry, you got it, ma'am.
Welcome back.
Welcome back home, baby.
Come in, Mother. Have a seat.
Are you okay?
I feel like I'm finally catching my breath after a marathon.
target: حاسس إني كنت بجري بقالي كتير أوي وأول مرة أقعد وأرتاح.

source: I'm glad you're feeling better.
Would you like something to drink?
Just some water, so I can take my pills.
target: أنا ممكن بس آخد مية عشان الدوا.

source: Get some water for Hosh-Hosh.
Where do you want me to put these, ma'am?
Just leave them there, Saleh.
I'll put your bags in your bedroom, Hisham.
target: هبقى أطلعلك شنطك في أوضتك يا هشام.

source: Mom, come here?
Whose bedroom, exactly?
Yours, of course.
Mine, of course.
So where am I supposed to sleep?
Well, that's up to you, my baby.
If you want to sleep together, no problem.
target: عايزة تفضلي بايتة في الأوضة وماله.

source: We'll just call the imam right away and make it official.
target: نبعت نجيب المأذون حالاً ونخلص كل حاجة.

source: If you'd take some time to think about it, that's fine.
target: عايزة تاخدي وقتك وتفكري، براحتك طبعاً.

source: But you'll have to find somewhere else to sleep.
target: بس ابقي دوري بقى على حتة تانية تنامي فيها.

source: You've always liked sleeping on couches.
target: ما إنتي طول عمرك بتحبي النوم على الكنب.

source: Just pick any couch you like.
target: ابقي نامي على أي كنبة يا حبيبتي.

source: You've gotta be kidding me.
target: إيه الreverse اللي أنا فيه ده؟

source: Those are my options: a shotgun marriage or a sofa?
A drink, mother?
Come in.
It's nice in here.
I'll move my things. Just a second.
Did you take my spot?
Okay, the water is right here.
And you've taken all your pills except this one.
target: إنت كدا خلاص خلصنا الأدوية فاضل بس ده.

source: Ah, take this one before bedtime.
target: ده تاخده بس قبل ما تنام.

source: That's good.
Do you need anything else before I go?
I'll pull these back for you right here.
Do you still care?
What a question, Hisham.
Just get some rest.
It's been a long day for you.
Good night. Sleep well.
I've never noticed those cracks in the ceiling before.
But if we fix them, we'll have to repaint the whole place.
target: أه بس لو عملناهم لازم نبيّض كله بقى.

source: Would we do the same color or try something different? Maybe we can change it up a little, you know?
target: نبيّض بقى إيه نفس اللون ولا نعمل لون مختلف كدا حلو؟

source: Keep it down. I'm trying to sleep.
Okay, baby. I'm sorry.
Where has Zeina been?
I don't really know.
She hasn't called me.
Isn't it weird that she hasn't even called to check how your Daddy's doing?
target: مش غريبة شوية إنها مش بتكلمك؟ يعني مش بتطمن على باباكي إزاي؟

source: Enough with the questions, please.
I just wanna sleep.
Good night
Lights off, now.
Okay, okay! Go to sleep. Good night to you, too.
I'm studying for exams.
You should know that.
Yeah, I can tell. Clearly studying hard.
target: لا ما هو واضح المذاكرة مقطعة بعضها.

source: Why are you mad at me?
Is it because of Yassin?
target: هو كل ده عشان موضوع ياسين؟

source: Yassin? I couldn't care less about Yassin.
target: ياسين مين اللي بنتكلم عليه ده كمان؟

source: Then what is it?
Why are you being like this when my dad is sick and I need you the most?
target: إنتي جاية تعملي كدا في أكتر وقت أنا محتاجاكي فيه؟

source: Come on, give me a break.
Nadia, you've got so many shoulders to cry on.
target: إنتي حواليكي كل الناس اللي إنتي محتاجاهم.

source: Your father, mom, grandma, brother, and Yassin.
I've only got you and my father.
target: أنا بقى مليش غير بابي وإنتوا.

source: Don't force me to choose between you!
I'm so over this. You're such a big downer all the time.
target: بجد أنا زهقت، كل شوية قمص قمص قمص!

source: It's not my fault your mom s
Hey, just tell me what you're looking for.
target: طب قولي بتدور على إيه طيب؟

source: Don't tire yourself.
I'm looking for my mug.
Where's my mug?s
Your mug should be in here. I never took it out.
But you're not allowed to drink coffee, remember?
Some herbal tea or anise?
Can you sit down for a minute?
I'd love to, but I have to get to work soon.
target: والله كان نفسي بس أنا لازم أروح الشغل.

source: I've been away for so long. There's so much I have to catch up on.
Sure, yeah.
Where's Omnia been?
I can't believe I'm about to say this, but I'm fine if you want her to visit. You should invite her.
target: مش مصدقة إن أنا بقولك الكلام ده بس إنت لو عايزها تجيلك هنا أنا معنديش مشكلة.

source: I mean, you can do it if you want to. I mean it.
Fine.
All of a sudden, you've decided to be cool about everything? Go with the flow, no drama?
target: يعني بقيتي فجأة عادي بقيتي سبور، فجأة ممكن تقبلي أي حاجة.

source: Never mind.
Forget I even said anything.
Doesn't matter anyway. You're looking much better today, really.
target: بس إنت ماشاءالله، لا وشك رايق النهاردة.

source: You look like your old self. I think you're past the worst of it. Thank God.
target: بقيت أحسن كتير وخرجنا من المرحلة الخطر الحمدلله.

source: I understand if you'd rather be at your place to get more rest.
target: فيعني لو لو عايز تروح بيتك ترتاح هناك أنا طبعاً متفهمة يعني.

source: I mean, I could even hire a nurse to stay with you overnight, just to be safe.
target: وممكن أجيبلك ممرض يقعد معاك بالليل.

source: Or maybe you can stay at Grandma Nazly's.
I'm sure she'd be happy to have you.
What a great morning.
target: يا صباح الفل يا صباح الفل.

source: Hisham, why are you out of bed?
Go lie down. I can bring you whatever you need.
target: أي حاجة عايزها، قولي وأنا أجيبها لغاية عندك.

source: What would you like me to cook you for lunch?
target: نفسك فإيه النهاردة أعملهولك على الغدا؟

source: Remember to pick up Hisham's medication on your way back.
target: أوعي تنسي تجيبي أدوية هشام اللي نقصت معاكي وإنتي راجعة.

source: Is there anything else?
No, my baby.
Have a good day.
Bye-bye.
When are the kids coming back?
By the way, you look so much better than you did yesterday.
target: بس الحمدلله شكلك أحسن كتير النهاردة.

source: Okay, couldn't you get it sent over from another branch that has it in stock?
target: طيب، في فرع تاني ليكوا ممكن يبعتلك الصنف ده؟

source: Okay, well, I guess I can pick it up myself.
target: مينفعش يبعت لازم أنا اللي أروح.

source: Where's the other branch located?
Elshorouk?
What? All the way to Shorouk, Ola?
target: شروق إيه اللي هتروحيلها يا علا؟

source: Please give me the address, and I'll figure it out.
target: اديني العنوان، اديني عنوان الفرع. أنا هحاول أروح.

source: What are you doing?
Leave me alone!
One second. Hold on one second.
You're going all the way to Shorouk for his medications?
target: يعني إنتي هتشحططي نفسك لحد الشروق عشان تجيبي دوا؟

source: It's none of your business. Why do you care?
Did I ask you to come with me?
No one is going anywhere.
target: ولا أنا ولا إنتي تروحي في حتة.

source: This is crazy. You're doing enough for him.
target: ما كفاية المشاوير اللي عمالة تعمليها.

source: If you have that much time on your hands, go feed my cats.
target: طب لو فاضية أوي يا ستي كدا روحي بقى هاتيلي أكل القطط بالمرة.

source: I don't get it.
Are you there, sir? Yes, yes, I can hear you now.
target: أيوة، أه أه، أنا معاك أهو.

source: Never mind. I'll take the generic brand. You can send it to the address you have.
target: لا، بص خلاص هاتلي البديل بتاعه وابعته على العنوان المتسجل عندك.

source: Yes, the usual address.
Thank you.
Thank you so much.
What's going on, Nesrine?
I've never seen you so worked up.
target: أنا عمري ما شوفتك عصبية كدا.

source: Honestly, I'm scared.
Scared of what?
I'm scared he'll suck you back into his world.
And the first thing he'll do is to force you to cut me out of your life again.
target: وأكيد أول حاجة هيطلبها منك إن إنتي تخرجيني من حياتك تاني.

source: But I want you in my life.
I don't want us to drift apart again 'cause I just got you back, and we're even closer than before.
target: مش عايزة نبعد عن بعض تاني، أنا ما صدقت رجعنا زي الأول ويمكن أكتر كمان.

source: Is there anything else?
And my life would really suck without you.
But I feel as if it's only a matter of time before you go and disappear again.
target: وحاسة كمان إن العد التنازلي بتاع صداقتنا قرب تاني.

source: Nesrine has feelings.
Nesrine has a heart.
Are you crazy?
Really?
Stop it.
Do you think I'm dumb enough to make the same mistake twice?
target: هو أنا حمارة عشان أعمل نفس الغلطة مرتين؟

source: You can't get rid of me.
target: أنا وإنتي على فكرة بقينا اوفر.

source: You're a package deal now. A package like this one here.
Do you mean it?
Damn right.
Whoever wants one of us will be stuck with the other.
target: اللي يدخل حياة وحدة، يدخل حياة التانية على طول.

source: And Monty is our "buy two, get one for free," right?
target: وطبعاً مونتي ده الbuy two get one free بتاعنا.

source: Well, I beg your pardon. If Monty's involved, I need to run it by me first.
target: لا pardon، لو هتجيبي سيرة مونتي، يبقى أعرف الموضوع كله.

source: It's the same old story you've heard a million times.
I thought you already had found your bliss.
target: هو إنتي مش كنتي رسيتي على بر يا بنتي؟

source: Me too. I really thought I had.
But then the situation changed so much.
Hisham's had two heart attacks so far in less than a year.
target: هشام جاله اتنين heart attack في أقل من سنة.

source: He's the father of my children.
I don't wanna be the reason he sees less of them in case, God forbids, something worse happens to him. I can't have that on my conscience. I just can't
target: يعني، مش عايزة أبقى السبب إن هو مش بيقضي وقت كفاية معاهم لو بعد الشر بعد الشر حصلَه أي حاجة.

source: It's very complicated.
All guilt does is drag you down.
Make up your mind and leave it all behind you.
We don't have time for this nonsense.
target: عشان إحنا ورانا شغل مفيش وقت للكلام دوت.

source: I sent you an email three days ago with new orders, but I didn't get your reply.
target: وأنا باعتلك على الطلبيات من تلت أيام إيميل وإنتي مردتيش عليا لحد دلوقتي.

source: You're dropping the ball.
That's not true. I'm a multi-tasker, so I answered your email while ordering the prescription.
target: لا مش ولا هنا، أنا على فكرة كنت برد على الإيميل بتاعك وأنا بطلب الدوا.

source: That's called on the ball.
Hey, Soha. How's it going, dear?
target: ألو، أيوة يا سها إيه يا حبيبتي؟

source: Hi Ola.
You're being so great with him. I got you another shot with the investors.
target: عشان إنتي بنت أصول جبتلك ميعاد تاني يا ستي.

source: Make sure you've got this presentation nailed down this time.
You may be called Second Chance, but this isn't a second chance.
target: بس يا علا دي مش فرصة تانية زي اسم البراند.

source: It's your last.
Right, right. I understand. I know. I understand.
target: صح صح طبعاً، إنتي عندك حق إنتي عندك حق.

source: We'll make you so proud this time, I swear. I promise.
target: لا المرة دي بجد بجد هنشرفك.

source: We'll blow you away, and I'll ensure we blow them away.
Okay, the meeting's the day after tomorrow at Tamer and Hadi's. Five o'clock. Got it?
target: خلاص بعد بكرة عندك ميعاد مع تامر وهادي الساعة خمسة.

source: Hadi?
Stop it.
Okay. You got it.
We'll be there at five sharp.
On the dot.
Okay, bye-bye.
Please, I beg you to wake up, concentrate, prepare, and bring your A-game.
target: بحق جاه النبي تركزوا أبوس إيديكوا، عايزين نخرج من عنق الزجاجة ده.

source: We will. We will.
Hi, Soheir.
How can I help you?
I'm here to see Hisham, if I may.
target: أنا جاية عشان هشام يا طنط.

source: Is he in there?
This makes the age difference more real than ever.
target: وجايز فعلاً أكون حسيت بفرق السن ما بينا دلوقتي.

source: Look, I got a heart stent.
I need to make a lot of changes in my life.
target: في حاجات كتيرة أوي في حياتي هتتغير.

source: My eating, sleeping.
I get pills for everything.
You don't need an older man dragging you down with him right now.
target: مفتكرش إن إنتي محتاجة حد عامل كدا فحياتك يعني.

source: You're still so young, and I want you to have the life you deserve.
target: إنتي لسه صغيرة وأنا مش عايز أحس إن أنا ظالمك معايا.

source: I'm not really surprised.
I've felt like things between us were changing for a while now.
target: أنا شوفت وواخدة بالي من كل اللي إنت بتقوله ده بقالي شوية حلوين.

source: I'm not different from your motorcycle.
target: أنا والموتوسيكل بتاعك مفرقناش كتير عن بعض.

source: What I mean is that we were both parts of a phase.
But when things got real, you pushed us aside.
target: بس لما الموضوع دخل في الجد بقى إيه؟ ركنتنا على جنب.

source: I just thought you loved me for who I am.
target: أنا بس كنت فكراك حبتني علشاني أنا.

source: Not because being with me made you feel young again.
target: مش عشان كنت الyouth pill بتاعتك اللي بتاخدها.

source: But anyway, good luck, and I hope what you're going through right now isn't all for nothing.
target: Anyways, good luck و يارب بس تعبك ده كله ميروحش عالفاضي.

source: I mean Ola.
I hope that she'll take you back, Hisham.
Are you okay, ma'am? Are you coming in?
target: إيه يا مدام مش هتخشي ولا إيه؟

source: I'm coming, Saleh.
I'm coming.
So Amrousi was out riding his bike. There was oil on the road, and that was it. He got smashed.
target: بس بقى يا معلم فعمروسي في الملف لقى بقعة زيت راح وقع على الأرض….

source: Stop talking about it.
He needed seven stitches.
Seven stitches, right here.
Hey, Ola.
Where've you been?
Hey, Rana.
How are you?
I can't believe it's been so long since we saw you last.
target: مش عارفة إزاي الدنيا بتشغلنا بجد إن إحنا نشوف الناس اللي بنحبهم.

source: I'm good.
I know, but at least you get to see Hisham a lot.
target: بس الحمدلله إن إنتو بتشوفوا هشام كتير.

source: What's up, Sherif?
Good.
You're such a decent woman. You should know that.
target: بس إنتي ست أصيلة بجد يا علا.

source: Not a lot of women would even consider doing this.
target: يعني مفيش ستات كتير ممكن يعملوا اللي إنتي بتعمليه ده.

source: Of course not. But if decency were a person, it would be Ola.
target: لا طبعاً، ده الأصول يعني بنتي علا.

source: Right. Right.
Well, I'd love to stay and chat, but I have so much work to do.
target: القعدة حلوة والله وأنا كان نفسي أقعد معاكو بس عندي شغل كتير.

source: Soha knows.
She set up a big meeting for me, and I need to work on the presentation.
target: أصل أنا عندي ميعاد هي اللي مظبطهولي وpresentation مهم ولازم أطلع أشتغل.

source: Not even for a few minutes?
I'm sorry. I wish I could.
target: مش هينفع والله شغل كتير أوي.

source: Your prescription.
target: الدوا بتاعك أهو يا هشام، ها؟

source: We miss you, Loulou. Keep us company.
target: وحشاني يا لولو والله اقعدي معانا شوية.

source: This is his house, too.
Bye, everyone.
See you soon.
Where did you say he got his stitches?
target: كنت بتقول أخد غرز فين بقى؟

source: Back of his head.
Poor guy.
Right.
What do you mean, his friends?
They're not just Hisham's friends.
Ola, seriously?
What is that supposed to mean now?
Well, things are a little different now, aren't they?
I can't believe you, Ola.
Why not?
Think a little harder, Ola.
If not for yourself, then do it for your kids.
target: لو مش عشان خاطرك إنتي، يبقى عشان خاطر عيالك.

source: Did he think about the kids when he traded me for a newer model?
target: وهو يعني كان فكر في العيال لما طلقني وراح صاحب الموديل الأحدث؟

source: Or am I the only one who has to do that?
target: ولا أنا بس اللي لازم أفكر في  العيال؟

source: They broke up.
I overheard everything.
She came to visit, and Hisham ended it.
Never, no matter what, for as long as I lived after that awful fight when you were so mean to me.
target: كنت حالفة إن لساني ما يخاطب لسانك ليوم الدين بعد اللي حصل بينا في الخناقة والكلام اللي إنتي قولتيه.

source: She is a total drama queen. Look at her.
Okay, go on.
You know what I think, Loulou?
Sometimes, I think Hisham's heart attacks were a blessing in disguise to give us perspective so we appreciate what we have.
target: ساعات والله بحس إن عيا هشام ده ربنا بعتهولنا كلنا عشان نعقل كدا ونهدا ونرضى.

source: Don't be ungrateful, or God might punish you for it.
target: بلاش تتبطري عالنعمة، لحسن ربنا يحاسبك.

source: Please believe me, Ola.
Weigh this carefully.
Allow your kids to grow up with you and their dad.
target: خدي ولادك في حضنك، وحضن أبوهم.

source: I don't want you to have any regrets or secretly wonder, "What if things were different?"
target: والله يا حبيبتي بقولك الكلام ده عشان خايفة عليكي لتندمي في يوم من الأيام.

source: Think hard about what I said, Ola.
What's up?
Okay, got it. I'm coming.
target: طيب طيب، أنا جاية على طول.

source: He wants to talk.
Here.
You must be feeling better if you're giving yourself a pedicure.
target: لا بسم الله ما شاء الله، وشك أحسن بكتير النهاردة.

source: Do you want anything else?
Sorry.
Do you have time to talk for a minute?
Remember when we first bought this place?
target: فاكرة يا علا اشترينا الشقة دي إزاي؟

source: I remember the day we saw it for the very first time.
target: وأنا داخل الأوضة النهاردة، افتكرت أول يوم جينا شوفناها فيه.

source: You ran through the apartment straight to this balcony.
target: ساعتها سيبتي كل الشقة وطلعتي جري عالبلكونة.

source: You told me, "This is it, Hisham."
target: وخرجتي منها تقوليلي: هي دي يا هشام هي دي!

source: Not the best negotiating position.
target: خليتي صاحب البيت يشوف نفسو علينا.

source: Even though I told you in the car, "If you like it, just whisper in my ear, don't say it in front of the owner."
target: مع إني موصيكي طول الطريق على فكرة لو عجبتك يا علا، تعالي قوليلي في ودني متقوليش قدام صاحب البيت.

source: We were really happy back then.
Everything was easy. Life was just sweeter.
target: كل حاجة سهلة ولذيذة وليها طعم.

source: Boredom, routine, the kids, the debts, the bills.
I hated all those things, just like you did, except they never made me want to leave our marriage for good.
target: كل الحاجات اللي أنا كمان كنت بكرهها بس الفرق إن أنا ما حاولتش أسيبك عشانها.

source: I even cut my best friend out of my life for you.
target: ده أنا صحبتي الوحيدة مكنتش بشوفها.

source: I quit my job 'cause I thought it'll make you happy, it'll be less selfish.
target: شغلي سبته. كل ده عشان إنت متضايقش.

source: But in the end, you still left because you were bored.
target: وفي الآخر بردو مشيت عشان زهقان.

source: Actually, Ola, I wanna come back.
target: طيب يا علا أنا عايز أرجع.

source: Come back where Hisham?
Back to what?
Am I a hotel to you?
Don't you see you can't check in and out whenever you please?
target: تعمل check in و check out وقت ما إنت عاوز؟

source: The least you could do is to have some respect, Hisham.
target: المفروض تحترمني أكتر من كدا شوية يا هشام.

source: Cause I respected your choice to leave me.
target: زي ما أنا احترمت قرارك يوم ما سبتني.

source: I did. I did.
Really.
I would never force you to stay if you were unhappy with our life together.
target: أنا مكنتش أحب إن إنت تكمل معايا وإنت مش مبسوط.

source: Back then, I had to get up every morning, go to work, take care of the kids, and take care of myself, also feeling like I was hardly good enough.
target: بس أنا بقى كان لازم أقوم الصبح وأشتغل وآخد بالي من العيال وآخد بالي من نفسي. كل ده وأنا شايفة إن أنا مش كفاية.

source: But you did hurt me, Hisham.
So, no, I can't do it, Hisham.
target: فأنا مش هقدر أرجع يا هشام.

source: And I feel super guilty about the kids.
target: بحس بذنب فظيع مع العيال، أه.

source: It won't work.
First, I never thought you weren't good enough.
target: أول حاجة، أنا عمري ما شوفتك مش كفاية.

source: Second, I'm sorry for all the pain I caused you, for burying the true Ola I fell in love with.
target: وآسف إن أنا اتسببت في أي وجع ليكي. أو إن أنا بعدتك عن علا اللي أنا حبيتها.

source: I'm glad you feel like you've grown.
But you didn't change.
You found your way back to who you used to be.
target: إنتي رجعتي علا اللي أنا أعرفها زمان.

source: That's why I really feel like we should try again.
target: عشان كدا حاسس إن إحنا نستحق فرصة تانية.

source: I mean, you even called your brand Second Chance.
target: إنتي حتى البراند بتاعتك اسمها seconf chance.

source: And what we have deserves a second chance, too, Ola.

source: Or are you jealous of that girl because she's pretty?
target: ولا أنتم غيرانين علشان البنت حلوة؟

source: Envious?
She's clumsy, and she looks weird.
target: دي حتى وحشة وشبه لوح التلج

source: Dig in. We have juice and jelly.
Why those colors?
It's because we make them from our own fruits.
target: أيوة، أصل احنا بنعملهم بالفاكهة بتاعتنا

source: Can you come here and play with me every day?
target: ممكن تيجوا تلعبوا هنا معايا كل يوم؟

source: Listen to me, Howaida.
Don't listen to Raeefa.
The way to a man's heart is not through his stomach.
The way to a man's heart is through his behind.
The more you slap that behind, the more he'll fall for you.
target: كل ما تدي له على قفاه اكتر يقع في غرامك

source: Dear God!
How is it right to slap Refaat on his behind?
target: يعني يصح برضو أدي لأبيه رفعت على قفال؟

source: Keep your voice down. She's an arashana, and she speaks Arabic.
target: وطي حسك لحسن دي قرشانة وبتفهم عربي

source: What does arashana mean?
It means "pretty woman," just like you.
I will look for him at Elham's.
target: أنا هدو ر عليه في شقة إلهام.

source: Maybe he hid there.
Come with me, Talaat.
And you, Refaat, look for him at my flat.
target: وأنت يا رفعت دور عليه في شقتي

source: I caught you!
Shiraz, do you pick easy spots so I can catch you?
target: شيراز، هو أنت بتستخبي في حتت سهلة عشان أعرف امسكك؟

source: I make it easier for you so they won't make fun of you.
target: طب زي ما أنا بخليك تمسكني عشان مايتمسخروش عليك

source: What would you do for me in return?
Just ask.
What should I ask for?
I want those berries up on the tree.
Are those berries?
Yes, we call them berries.
Shiraz, I love you.
You're so funny!
I will tell them.
Shiraz, wait!
Hey!
Listen to this!
Refaat said he loves me.
Taha!
Taha?
Arashana?
I don't know how to translate this.
Am I an arashana?
No, on the contrary.
I didn't know that you were engaged.
I didn't expect that you could get engaged and express your feelings.
target: ماكنت فاكرة رفعت ممكن يخطب ويعبر عن حبه

source: Do you know how to say romantic things?
Or do you just say the opposite of how you feel?
Like back in the day.
Do I say the opposite of how I feel?
Yes.
Sometimes, when you are silent, I'm sure you're killing us in your head.
target: في أوقات بتبقى ساكت وأنا متأكدة إنك بتقتلنا كلنا في عقلك

source: That is true.
That's not true!
You're the only one I'd spare.
target: بس هسيبك أنت بس اللي تعيشي يا ماجي

source: If Reda asks, as usual, just say we were playing near the canal.
target: لو رضا سأل هنقول زي كل مرة إن احنا بنلعب عند الترعة

source: I'm not going to lie.
You are cowards and too sensitive because you are girls.
target: أنتم بس علشان بنات قلبكم رهيف وجبنا

source: You're stupid.
That girl is not normal.
And if anyone asks, I will tell the truth.
target: ولو حد سألني أنا هقول الحقيقة

source: Raeefa is right.
We'll never come back here and keep it a secret.
target: احنا مش هنروح المكان ده تاني كلنا، ومحدش يتكلم

source: Don't cry.
I'm here with you.
Everyone hates and abandons me.
I'm not abandoning you. I'll always be by your side.
target: أنا مش هسيبك وهفضل جنبك على طول

source: If you're willing to stay by my side forever, will you do as I ask?
target: طب لو مستعد تفضل معايا على طول، تعمل اللي أنا أقولك عليك؟

source: We will play a game that will always keep you by my side.
target: هنلعب لعبة هتخليك معايا على طول

source: Hide and seek?
Yes, something like that.
Reda!
Refaat went to the Al Khadrawy house by himself and hasn't returned.
target: رفعت راح لبيت الخضراوي لوحده ولسه مارجعش.

source: I'm worried about him.
What made him go there?
We didn't go there.
Not now!
What's important is that we find Refaat.
I'm worried about him.
Refaat!
Why does the estate look like this now?
target: هو البيت بقى عامل كده ليه؟

source: Well done!
You've found me.
You won!
Get up on the railing and jump to reach me.
target: اطلع ع السور يا رفعت ونط لي

source: The roof!
The house looks weird now.
I saw strange people downstairs.
I see them, too.
They're not real.
They're inside our heads.
If you jump and reach me, you will never see them again, and we'll stay together.
target: لو نطيت وبقيت معايا هنا مش هتشوفهم تاني، وهنبقى مع بعض

source: Don't you want us to be together?
target: مش أنت عايز نبقى مع بعض؟

source: Come down, Refaat!
Step back from the railing!
Be careful not to fall!
Forget about them.
Jump, Refaat.
Don't be scared.
I'll catch you.
DEATH
Get up and come here!
Come here, all of you.
Swear by this Quran that you'll never go back near that estate.
target: تحلفوا ع المصحف ده أنكم مش هتقربوا ناحية بيت الخضراوي تاني

source: That house is not what you think!
target: البيت ده مش زي ما أنتم فاكرين

source: You live the good life, clueless to everything!
target: أنتم قاعدين في البندر ومش دريانين

source: Do you know how many families lived in that estate after it burned down?
target: أنت عارف كام واحد سكن في الدار دي بعد ما اتحرقت؟

source: Do you know what happened to them?
They all died.
Some committed suicide, some burned to death, and one woman killed her kids.
target: اللي انتحر واللي اتحرق واللي قتلت عيالها

source: Repeat after me!
We swear not to go near the Al Khadrawy house again.
target: والله ما هنقرب ناحية بيت الخضراوي تاني

source: Come here.
Stay here!
If I see you outside, Taha, your day will only worsen.
target: ولو شوفتك برة يا طه، يومك مش هيعدي.

source: I will deal with you when our guests leave!
Are you happy now?
She showed up because we talked about her.
Tell me.
The same thing happened to you in the past, right, Refaat?
target: نفس اللي حصلك زمان يا رفعت، هه؟

source: Who showed up?
Raeefa! Nothing happened.
Enough with that story.
The boy was scared, and he might have hallucinated.
So what's for dessert?
Eat this.
But don't tell your mom that I got this for you.
target: بس ماتقولش لأمك إن أنا جيبت لك حاجة

source: Don't be sad.
I should have never sent you out.
It's my fault.
It's not your fault.
I saw her yesterday.
I was afraid that I might see her again downstairs.
Who did you see?
A strange-looking little girl.
She wore a white dress and looked like a demon.
I see her, too.
I see other things, too.
For example…
Next to that dressing table, I see a demon lady.
target: عند التسريحة اللي هناك دي، أنا شايف أمنا الغولة

source: How are you, demon lady?
I hope you're all right.
Really?
Okay.
And next to that stand, I see the skinned-leg monster.
target: وعند الشماعة اللي هناك دي، أنا شايف أبو رجل مسلوخة

source: How are you, skinned-leg monster?
How's the leg?
Are you still using creams regularly?
Great!
Next to that curtain as well, I see that girl.
target: وعند الستارة اللي هناك دي أنا شايف البنت إياها

source: But I don't see her with my eyes.
I see her with my mind.
And since the mind doesn't see, you shouldn't fear it.
target: وعلشان ده مايشوفش لازم ماتخفش منه

source: What do you mean?
It means that you have to humor your mind.
target: يعني تاخد عقلك على قد عقله

source: Your uncle does that, and it greatly helps me.
target: خالك بيعمل كده، والموضوع ماشي معايا كويس

source: Uncle.
Why did you wash down the writing on the wall?
target: أنت ليه مسحت الكلام اللي كان مكتوب ع الحيطة؟

source: Thank you for the cigarettes, Taha.
Don't smoke when you grow up because these are worse than demons.
target: ودي اوعى تشربها لما تكبر علشان دي أسوء من العفاريت

source: I like to ride in the back.
You can sit at the front.
I'm sorry.
We couldn't have a word together today.
You saw how hectic it was.
I'm not upset.
Can I just tell you one thing before you head out?
target: ممكن بس أقولك على حاجة قبل ما أطلع؟

source: Go ahead!
I really loved the gift you got me last week.
target: أنا حبيت أوي الهدية اللي انت جيبتهالي الأسبوع اللي فات

source: Raeefa bought it.
I wanted to give you something in return.
I got you a tie, but I didn't know that you hate ties.
target: جيبتلك كرافتة بس ماكنتش اعرف إن أنت مبتحبش الكرفتات

source: I won't give it to you anymore.
On the contrary, it was just a joke.
target: لا بالعكس، دي كانت مجرد دعابة

source: I want my gift, please.
target: من فضلك، أنا عايز الهدية بتاعتي

source: Here you go.
Green.
Now I have to wear a green tie every time I see her.
target: دلوقتي كل مرة أشوفها لازم ألبس كرافتة خضرا

source: It looks great.
I promise that from now on, I will love neckties.
target: أوعدك إني من النهاردة هأحب الكرفتات

source: Good night.
Good night.
If I came to Egypt just to see that, it would be totally enough for me.
target: لو جيت مصر علشان أشوف المشهد ده، كفاية عليا

source: So your first love was a ghost?
You're from Scotland, and you believe in ghosts?
target: من اسكتلندا ومصدقة إن في أشباح؟

source: If that story never happened, how did your brother break his leg?
target: لو القصة دي ماحصلت، إزاي أخوك كسر رجله؟

source: I can't remember.
It was a long time ago.
It must be when we used to play up on the roof.
It was an abandoned house with a bad reputation, and we played there.
target: بصي ده كان بيت مهجور وعليه سمعة واحنا كنا بنلعب فيه

source: We made up that Shiraz story and everyone believed it because it was entertaining.
target: واختلقنا قصة شيراز دي وكلهم صدقوها طبعا لأنها قصة مسلية

source: And you all remember that in detail?
Maggie, all myths start like that, just like a virus.
target: ماجي، كل الأساطير بتبدأ كده، زي الفيروس

source: Someone tells a story and repeats it. It starts going around.
Then, the story turns into an invented memory.
Then, it becomes a part of history that cannot be questioned.
target: بعدين يبقى تاريخ معترف بيه لا يمكن نعانده

source: And no one wants to believe that it never happened.
Or you refuse to believe that they happened.
target: أو أنت رافض تصدق إنها حصلت

source: By the way
Maggie, I don't say the opposite of how I feel.
target: ماجي، أنا مش بأقول عكس اللي جوايا

source: Obviously, what I said upset you.
Or maybe I do say the opposite of what I think.
target: أو يمكن بقول عكس اللي بفكر فيه.

source: I don't know.
Maybe because what I think of cannot be said.
target: يمكن علشان اللي بفكر فيه مايصحش يتقال

source: Maybe if you say it, it turns out correct.
By the way, I got you something for your birthday.
target: على فكرة أنا جيبت حاجة معايا، هدية لعيد ميلادك

source: Did you remember my birthday?
The only photo of us together when we were students.
target: الصورة الوحيدة لينا من أيام الدراسة

source: I saw it and took it without telling you.
target: كنت شوفتها معاك وخدتها من غير ماقولك

source: And I was upset that I lost it.
target: وأنا للي كنت زعلان إني ضيعتها

source: I didn't tell your family, but I learned Arabic because I liked the poem written on the back.
target: أنا ماقولتش لعيلتك، بس أنا اتعلمت العربي علشان حبيت الشعر اللي مكتوب وراها

source: It was a lovely evening.
I will never stop loving you, Maggie.
target: لن أتوقف عن حبك يا ماجي

source: Until stars burn out and worlds disappear.
Until planets collide and the suns wither.
Until the moon is dim…
and all seas and rivers are dry.
Until I am old and my memories fade.
Until my tongue is no longer capable of saying your name.
target: حتى يعجز لساني عن لفظ اسمك

source: Until my heart beats for the last time.
Only then might I stop.
I might.
Refaat's fifth law.
If your mind tries to trick you, humor it.
target: لو عقلك لاعبك خده على قد عقله

source: You do not exist, Shiraz.
You don't exist.
No, not yet.
No, not yet.
Ready or not, here I come.
Safe
We received news that our valiant army inflicted massive damage on one of the enemy's strategic naval camps.
target: شهد الرئيس جمال عبد الناصر مناورة عكسرية هامة في أحد المناطق العسكرية في الجمهورية العربية المتحدة.

source: Some military officials are optimistic that our successes in the region will continue as our courageous men in uniform tirelessly manage to advance. More updates later in the day as the situation develops.
target: وقامت بالمناورة فرقة مشاة ميكانيكية كاملة استخدمت المدرعات البرمائية لنقل الجنود لمناطق عديدة هامة

source: I don't know who's more pathetic.
A mouse stuck in a maze, these retched students, or me?
target: الفار اللي في المتاهة ده ولا التلاميذ البؤساء دول ولا أنا؟

source: A tenured professor lost and was unable to finish this simple game.
target: لأن دكتور محترم زي حالاتي هو اللي مش عارف يطلع من المتاهة.

source: Execuse me, Dr. Refaat.
Murphy's law number one
Anything that can go wrong will go wrong.
target: أي خطأ في احتمال إنه يحصل... يبقى حيحصل

source: I'm so sorry.
But you know what they say, that's a good omen.
So, good omens only manifest themselves through spilled coffee?
target: وهو الخير لازم يعلن عن وجوده بدلق القهوة؟

source: Coffee doesn't spill itself, and it's unfair to blame omens, good or bad. There's good luck and bad luck.
target: القهوة مش بتدلق لوحدها، وميصحش نلوم الخير أو الرزق أو الحظ أو حتى النحس.

source: Speaking of bad luck, many accuse me of being unlucky.
target: وعلى ذكر النحس، يتهمني بعض الناس إني انسان نحس

source: For example, how is it that I, someone who detests cardamom, always end up with a seed in my mouth?
target: يعني على سبيل المثال، أنا أكتر واحد يكره الحبهان، وأنا الحبهاناية الوحيدة اللي في الطبخة بتوقع في بوقي

source: It's probably because I'm the last to arrive for dinner
target: ما هو أكيد علشان بوصل أي عزومة متأخر

source: and, therefore, the last one to be served.
That's the most logical explanation.
It's definitely not because I'm cursed, possessed, or unlucky like those idiots claim.
target: أكيد مش بسبب إني انسان عليا لعنة ولا مسحور ولا نحس زي ما السخفا بيقولوا

source: The only laws I believe in that aren't supported by scientific evidence are those laid out by the famous engineer Murphy.
target: القوانين الوحيدة اللي أنا مؤمن بيها بدون إثبات علمي القوانين اللي حطها مهندس مشهور اسمه ميرفي

source: One of them, for example, says that you should expect the worst because the worst will happen.
target: منها مثلا، توقع الأسوا لأن هو ده اللي حيحصل

source: Perhaps my life is the scientific proof of these laws.
target: وسبب إيماني بيها هو حياتي كان يقدر ميرفي يستخدمها لاثبات قوانينه

source: And mythical creatures simply don't exist.
target: وعلى نفس المنوال، مافيش حاجة اسمها عفاريت ولا أشباح

source: Why pretend there's a spirit moving the curtains when we know it's just the winds.
target: وحرام نسرق الحق المعنوي لشوية الهوا اللي حركت الستاير ونديه لوحش أسطوري

source: Or that a ghost lurks in the doorway when we know it's just the rusty door hinges.
target: أو نسرق حق مفصلات الباب المصدية واجتهادها في التزييق ونقول إن اللي بيقفل الباب ده عفريت

source: And don't get me started on figures made by streetlights shining through the trees. Am I to believe that these shadows are somehow the specter of some little girl?
target: وأكيد مش حنسرق حق عمود النور اللي في الشارع وورق الشجر ونشكك في قوانين النور والضل ونقول ده مثلا خيال شبح

source: Like Mr. Murphy, I, Dr. Refaat Ismail, have set down my own laws.
target: وزي ما أخونا الأفندي ميرفي حط قوانين دكتور رفعت إسماعيل برضو حط قوانينه

source: The first one is that nature operates by the principle of 1+1=2
target: وأولهم إن الطبيعة ماشية بإن 1 زائد 1 تساوي 2

source: Cause and effect
Anything outside of this equation is not normal
target: وأي حاجة بتطلع برة المعادلة دي ماتبقاش من الطبيعة

source: And there is no such thing as the paranormal.
target: ولا يوجد ما يسمى بما وراء الطبيعة

source: Most days, I wear my grey suit. But since today is my 40th birthday and I am in a bad mood, I wear the suit I save for special occasions.
target: في الأيام العادية بألبس البدلة الرمادي، لكن بما إن ده عيد ميلادي الأربعين وبما إني بأكره اليوم ده فهألبس بدلة المناسبات

source: A navy blue one that makes me look utterly charming.
Hi, Raeefa.
We're having lunch at my place today, and you're bringing your fiance, Howaida.
target: النهاردة الغدا عندي وهويدا احتمال تيجي

source: And don't forget to wear your ring.
If you really cared for her, you'd tell her to flee now and escape a tragic destiny that awaits her.
target: لو بتحبيها فعلا هتكوني أول واحدة تنصحها تطفش من مصير مظلم منتظرها معايا

source: Let's skip my birthday today, Raeeda.
target: طب ما بلاش النهاردة يا رئيفة

source: You know I hate all that. And I don't want anyone to make a big deal. Just take the cake back.
target: أنت عارفة أنا بأكره أعياد الميلاد والمفاجئات والتورتة والشموع

source: It never even crossed my mind.
I didn't buy a cake. It's just lunch.
target: ولا في تورتة ولا في حاجة، قعدة عادية كده هو

source: Elham was craving Mulukhiyah.
target: إلهام بس كان نفسها في شوية ملوخية

source: I decided to make some with the meatballs that you like.
target: قولت بقا أعملهالها وأعمل معاها إيه الكفتة اللي أنت بتحبها

source: Doesn't that sound delicious? Just have some food. It's no big deal.
What do you want from me?
Go on, leave if you want.
I never wanted a cat in the first place.
You were forced on me.
Some people can make your heart skip a beat even if you haven't seen them in 15 years.
target: هناك أشخاص رؤيتهم قادرة إنها تلعب في دقات قلبك حتى لو ماشوفتهومش من 15 سنة

source: Maggie
Now, I know why I wore my navy blue suit today.
target: قد إيه كنت موفق في اختيار البدلة الكحلي النهاردة

source: You haven't lost your candor, Maggie.
Don't you dare to invite her!
Raeefa will eat her alive.
Now I finish the dolma and the Circassian chicken
Yes.
Now, we add some cardamom for flavor.
Listen, please stop being so awkward around Refaat.
target: واسمعي بقا، عايزاكي تبطلي الخيبة اللي انت بتعمليها مع رفعت دي

source: I know my brother very well.
He's stubborn.
You have to loosen him up a bit
I'm not being awkward, Auntie Raeefa.
target: أنا مش خايبة يا أبلة رئيفة

source: I don't know what to do when I'm around the doctor.
target: هو ابيه رفعت مش مفهوم. أنا مش عارفة أعمل معاه إيه!

source: Doctor?
You refer to your fiance as "doctor"?
That's awkward.
I've called him that for as long as I can remember.
target: طب ما أنا من ساعة ما اتولدت وأنا بقوله يا أبيه

source: Now, you're a grown woman and his fiance.
And soon you'll be his wife.
So pamper him
I got him a tie.
target: ما أنا جيبت له هدية كرافتة

source: I'm gonna give it to him today.
Look.
Good, it's better than those shabby scraps he keeps wearing constantly.
target: كويس، بدل الاتنين المقيحين اللي بيبدل فيهم

source: Mama, Mom, can I tell you something?
target: ماما أنا عايز أقولك حاجة مهمة

source: Listen, ask him if he ate or not.
Serve him some food.
If he tells you it's enough, serve him more.
target: لو قالك خلاص حطي له كمان

source: Of course.
I swear I didn't touch it.
And I swear I'll beat the hell out of you one of those days.
target: والله العظيم لا اجي اقرصك من فخادك

source: You hear me, Taha?
Did I add the cardamom yet?
Cardamom always gives the dish a lovely aroma.
Where did that boy go?
Has anyone seen him?
Come in, Reda. Welcome.
Come in. Come in.
Welcome.
Is Refaat not here yet?
I came all the way from Mansoura. I still got here first.
target: أنا اللي جاي من المنصورة جيت قبله

source: I'm glad you're here.
target: حمد الله على السلامة يا أخويا.

source: Hi, Raeefa?
Don't run
Don't run
I made the Mulukhiyah with cardamom.
And I made a cake
A cake?
He told me not to, but it's not up to him whether he has a cake for his birthday.
target: قالي ماتعمليهاش، بس هو بمزاجه؟ غصبن عنه

source: Raeefa, you're full of surprises.
Hello, our beautiful bride-to-be.
Good to see you
How are you, dear?
I'm fine.
Hello everybody.
