Illuminate, O night of mysteries. We worshipped you when we were young.
target: نور يا ليل الأسرار، ياللي عشقناك واحنا صغار

source: We tend to forgive, but you tend to hurt.
As they said about you - you are fickle.
Oh dream roses, keep blooming as long as you can.
target: فتح يا شجر الأحلام قد ما بتدور الأيام

source: Turn into a fruit and delight us. Be a comfort to us.
We long for happy moments.
For our search is bittersweet.
Be still, sea of lovers.
Feelings of longing sail through you.
Be still and promise to find happiness for two hearts lost in the current.
target: روق وأوعد إنك تسعد قلبين ضاعوا مع التيار

source: Oh port, come closer.
Help those who have spent their lives sailing endlessly to come ashore.
target: اللي ضاع عمره في أسفار خليه يرسى

source: And when they do, remember that they are strangers in a foreign land.
target: أوعاك تنسى إنه غريب عن أهل الدار

source: A time we had
What a time we had together!
What a wound we tore for the rest of our lives!
Our time is now over. The bells of sadness are already ringing.
target: دلوقتي خلاص مواعدنا خلاص بتدق خلاص أجراس حزننا

source: I cannot find words to express the pain of delusion and the relief of closure.
target: مش لاقي كلام يوصف آلام جرح الأوهام ويبارك لنا

source: There was once a time when our love was there.
target: وكان ياما كان كان في حبنا

source: Do you remember the hope in our eyes when we first met? It was poetic.
target: فاكرة الأمل لما التقينا زي الغزل مالي عنينا؟

source: Do you remember the thirst before it was quenched?
We found what we were missing in one another, but we lost ourselves in our own world.
target: لقينا في بعضنا شئ ضايع مننا وتوهنا في عالم حبنا

source: We drowned in our love, forgot about time and were overcome by hope.
target: وغرقنا في بعضنا ونسينا وقتنا وعيون الأمل بتشدنا

source: My love, it is our destiny to separate and live in loneliness and pain.
target: يا حبيبتي وداعنا مكتوب، ضياع، غربة وألم

source: Our parting is predestined.
O road, our heart thirsts for hope and forgiveness.
target: ماشين يا طريق بقلوب عطشانة أمل وسماح

source: Our desire is to forget the past through your love.
target: نفسنا في هواك ننسى اللي راح

source: Liar is he who says that days with you make them weak and weary.
target: كداب كداب اللي يقول تعب لو قضى العمر معاك في عذاب

source: Our names are lanterns in your night sky
target: اسامينا مزروعة فيك قناديل في سما لياليك

source: From an early age we have wondered whom we love, live and long for.
target: من صغرنا عايشين لمين بنعشق ونحن لمين

source: We rejoice to see and welcome you.
target: نفرح لما نلاقيك ونقولك أهلا بيك

source: Oh road, we have knocked on doors and parted friends with you.
target: دقينا فيك أبواب وفارقنا فيك أصحاب

source: We have always belonged to you.
We have always read your signs.
We walk back and forth, welcoming you at every step.
target: ونروح وبنرجع بيك ونقولك أهلا بيك

source: Our steps on you are predetermined.
You and the people are our reality.
I melt in your love.
My heart beats for you. I call you again and again.
target: قلوب عايشة العمر تناديك وتقولك أهلا بيك

source: When can we see all people smiling?
target: أمتى نشوف البسمة الحلوة مليا شفايف كل الناس؟

source: When can we sing together, be true partners, and fill the world with mutual trust?
target: أمتى نشارك بعض في غنوة غالية ونملى الكون إخلاص؟

source: When can we live happily?
When can we turn bitterness into compassion?
O life, be kinder and safer.
I wish for people to love each other.
Be kinder, people!
Why do your hearts tremble with insecurity and doubt?
Be kind and reject hatred.
Love can never coexist with cruelty.
target: عمر الحب ما عاش في قساوة

source: You cannot forget me. Your eyes say everything.
Sing songs of pure love.
Love has always healed souls.
Nice, warm songs gain importance in a world of hope and freedom.
target: محلى الغنوة الحلوة الدافية لو قدامها أمل وبراح

source: I love you because I see life through your eyes.
I see in you my hope after long despair.
target: بشوف بيكي أملي اللي كان أنتهى

source: I love you because you saved me at the last moment.
target: بحبك لأنك في آخر ندا لقيتك في قلبي بتروي صباه

source: Sometimes I try to imagine how I will be without you, my love.
target: ساعات يا حبيبتي ياخدني خيالي وأفكر في حالي من غيرك أنتي

source: For whom, my love, will I continue my life?
My desires revolve around you.
target: دا أنا أمنيتي اتبنت بيكي أنت

source: I love you because your love was the water in the desert of my soul.
target: بحبك لأنك وهبتي بحبك لقلبي مناه

source: I begin to love life, my love.
I am trying to find the fastest way to be with you on our journey.
target: بأفكر في أسرع طريق للقى في رحلة حياتنا اللي هتكون لنا

source: You will be with me day and night with an unchanging beauty.
target: هتبقي معايا في صبحي ومسايا جميلة

source: You and I will live in a happy world with its silence, excitement and ardent hope.
target: هنبقى أنا وأنتي في عالم سعيد في صمته وجنونه وأمله العنيد

source: Most certainly, my dear, I will spend the rest of my life with you.
We will spend the rest of our lives together.
These will be our most exciting years.
Your existence is the true beginning.
target: وجودك معايا هيبقى البداية الحقيقية الجميلة

source: I will always be yours no matter what.
You are the only one I will ever love.
target: دا أنتي الواحدة اللي ليكي هكون

source: She is an Egyptian girl with Horus-like eyes.
She struts actively like the models of today.
Her spirit is as gentle as the sunset breeze. Her heart is as tender as the sun is warm.
target: الروح طرواة العصرية والقلب شمس الحنية

source: She is as real as freedom.
Her eyes have a look that speaks volumes.
They are the root of everything. You are the child in me. Sometimes you are the quintessential sister, other times the mother.
target: أنتي الطفولة اللي في دمي وأختي ساعات وساعات أمي

source: You are the beloved who lovingly embraces, blesses  and protects me.
target: وأنت الحبيبة اللي تضمي بعيون حنانك وتسمي

source: You are the gladiola of hope. You are the reason for tomorrow.
target: أنتي الأمل وأنت الزهرة وأنت النهاردة عشان بكرة

source: Your eyes shine like candlelight. Your brunette skin is so beautiful. You are sweet by nature.
target: أنتي العيون شمعة وسمرة وانتي الجمال وانتي التمرة

source: Wherever my soul goes, I find you within me.
Where you are, is where my soul thrives and my life blossoms like a garden full of flowers.
target: تخضر روح روحي وتصحى وزهور حياتي تروح طارحة

source: Your naughtiness is not malicious.
She is my harbor and my shore.
Her rosy cheeks are adorned with her lovely smile.
Her waist is so slender that she can turn heads.
This goddess is an Egyptian woman.
My heart and soul are full of unspoken words of longing to you, my soulmate.
target: اه على اللي في قلبي وعاللي في روحي منك أنت يا خلي

source: When I feel your breath, magic happens to me.
target: نسمة هواك لما بتوصلي معرفش ايه اللي بيحصلي

source: The moment I saw her, oh my, my wounds were healed and I asked her to never leave my side.
target: أول ما شوفته يا روحي دابت جروحي وقولتله خلي

source: Let your soul merge with mine and sing of such beauty, my love.
target: خليلي روحك في روحي وروح غني يا روحي

source: I have all the love for her in my eyes and she loves me back.
target: أنا شلتله في العيون عل كل لون من الحب وشالي

source: How could this love end so easily one day? How could everything we had together just be overlooked?
target: وإزاي في يوم راح يهون الحب ويهون اللي حصل لي؟

source: The tree of love stands forever, and we are its evergreen fruit.
target: شجر المحبة يدوم واحنا المحبة بعينها تملي

source: I swim across your seas to woo you and give you my love and affection, hoping that you will love me in return.
target: وأنا وسط بحرك بعوم وأديك وادادي وادادي وأحلي

source: O ship of the wicked, may you never find your way to our sea.
Birds of love approached me, whispered something, and then flew away.
target: عصافير الحب مالت وقالتي كلام وطارت

source: They were talking about you, Mrs. Long Eyelash Gazelle.
target: وباينه كان عليكي يا أم رمش سايب

source: I wondered what happened to you.
You looked confused.
You were dreaming about my songs.
It turned out that love knocked at your door.
How beautiful is the first love!
target: اه يا ليلي يا عيونه ياني من الحب الأولاني

source: It makes the passion burn and turns the burning into a song.
target: بيخلي الحب آه ويخلي الآه أغاني

source: You see? When love knocked on your door too, it drove you crazy.
target: شوفي لما الحب جالك طايرلك عقل بالك

source: Birds of love said.
They came with the first breeze and said.
In your eyes the colors of love are as bright as a garden.
target: فعنيكي الحب باين ألوان زي الجناين

source: And the laughter of your heart echoes through the city squares.
target: قلبك عمال بيضحك ويسمع في المداين

source: She is a brunette as charming as the full moon that lights the streets.
target: سمارة والبدر طالع ومنور كل الشوارع

source: In the light of your eyes I find my lost dreams, O beautiful night.
target: بنلاقي الحلم اللي ضايع جوة عيونك يا ليلة

source: In the light of your eyes I take off the burden of my burden and forget the misery of the day.
target: ونرمي حمل الهموم وبننسى عذاب اليوم

source: I adore the light of the stars reflected in your eyes, O beautiful night.
target: وبنعشق نور النجوم جوة عيونك يا ليلة

source: The flute sings its sad songs. our long nights of love give us life.
target: الناي يشكينا غناه والسهر لينا حياة

source: I find lost moons in your eyes, O beautiful night.
target: بنلاقي القمر اللي تاه جوة عيونك يا ليلة

source: At night I hear you call my name. For you I open my window.
target: في الليل بسمع نداكي وافتح ليكي شباكي

source: I love to stay up with you at night in the shelter of your eyes, O beautiful night.
target: يحلالي السهر معاكي جوة عيونك يا ليلة

source: For whom do you sing, doves? Do you sing for two lovers in a garden and for a gentle breeze that carries them like a sailing ship?
target: بتغني لمين ولمين ولمين بتغني لمين يا حمام لاتنين أحبة جوة الجنينة ولنسمة دايبة والروح سفينة

source: The roses of love have blossomed and offered such a wonderful spectacle to mankind. How beautiful!
target: ورد المحبة أهه هل وطل على البني ادمين ياسلام

source: They sing for the laborers who set to work, who prepare to shoulder the food for their children.
target: بتغني للي بيقول يا هادي، يا كتفي شيلي أرزاق ولادي

source: Count on God, the Opener of the Gates of Profits. Give your blessing, O Helper, O Giver of Peace.
target: خلي تكالك على الفتاح وأرزق يا معين يا سلام

source: O brown doves sing for the sun, the flowers and the land. Sing.
target: يا حمام يا بني للشمس غني للورد غني للأرض غني

source: The songs of longing are ours, dedicated to our loved ones. Like a magic carpet, they fly us to where our loved ones are.
target: غناوي الشوق غناوينا لأحبابنا تطير بينا

source: Sorrow cannot consume us. Happiness cannot make us forget the burden of the night.
target: ولا الأحزان تدوبنا ولا الأفراح تنسينا ليالينا

source: Oh brunette, your love is the gentle breeze and the moon on a starless, lonely night.
target: في ليل الغربة يا سمرة هواكي النسمة والقمرة

source: Oh, the promises I make. Oh, the promises I wait for are just you and me.
target: يا وعدي يا مواعيدي أنا عمرك أنا انتي

source: I am the one whose longing cannot be satisfied. My happy day is when you are happy, my sweet song.
target: أنا المشتاق ويوم عيدي في يوم عيدك يا غنوتي

source: I am your serenity. I am your bewilderment. But love is the answer. Love is a world of our own.
target: أنا صفوك أنا حيرتك ودنيا الحب دنيانا

source: I have told of you in many nights, and like me they are sleepless because of the longing that your name awakens.
target: ليالي ياما علي سيرتك تبات من شوقها سهرانة

source: Sing with all your heart and with mine.
Sing for both hearts.
You spoke to me and reassured me before I came here.
target: كلمتيني و طمنيتني قبل ما اجي هنا

source: I will sing only for your love.
She told me that love has the power to take me to the stars.
target: قالتلى بالحب أقدر ألمس أي نجمة من هنا

source: I was worried and hesitant, but her voice was heavenly.
target: كنت خايف إنما فى كلامها رنة من السما

source: Today I stood alone in the spotlight to sing.
target: ووقفت اليوم أغني تحت الأنوار لوحدي

source: No matter how far apart we are, we are here together.
target: مهما فرقنا المكان انما احنا سوا

source: I will tell you everything about her. Believe every word I say.
target: بحكيلكو عنها و صدقوني في كل كلمة قلتها

source: She's the only truth I have ever lived.
target: هيا الحقيقة اللى فخيالي و فى كل لحظة عشتها

source: I hear her in every song and I see her in every line of a poem.
target: بسمعها فى كل غنوة و ألمحها فى كل فكرة

source: The years pass and life separates us, but we will always be together.
target: تفترق بينا السنين إنما احنا سوا

source: I am inclined to apologize to you.
Your hair is like a wave that swirls around us.
It calls to you, but it must wait years for a response from you.
Distance has not yet diminished her love of music.
Your eyes are a cure for my broken heart.
target: عنيكي زي دوالي قلبي اللي انكوى

source: When I see your lips, faithful to me, I am relieved and forget all who have betrayed me.
target: أنا أشوف شفايفك مستعدين للوفا انسى اللي خاين الصفا

source: I feel like I am in a world of joy.
Your lips are so well grown and sweet like dates.
target: شفايفك أنت اللي متصبرين على النوى

source: When I see you, I become a different person.
target: أنا أشوفك أبقى غير ما كنت أنا

source: What have you done to me?
When I am not at home, you soothe my estranged heart.
target: وأنا مش هنا، بترضي غربة قلب روح متطمنة

source: You have filled my life with love.
target: أنت اللي خليتي الحياة ميلة الهوا

source: I am leaving my loved ones behind.
I am wandering in the heart of sorrow, going to a foreign land.
target: ماشي في ضلع الأحزان لبلاد الأغراب

source: I am leaving, o home of my loved ones.
I am leaving you.
It is my destiny to live as a loner.
I am destined to lose you.
Oh God, why did I fall in love with you?
The separation is tearing my soul apart.
I wonder where the heart that loved you at first sight has gone.
Now we go our separate ways.
target: ماشي أنا في طريق وأنتي في طريق تاني

source: No more candles to warm my heart, no more tears to cleanse it.
target: لا شمع عاد بيضئ ولا دمع اه ينساني

source: I am leaving, soul of my soul.
I am wandering about with no destination.
I cannot conquer the memory of you.
My eyes cannot forget you.
Welcome back
I have missed you so much.
How nice to have your company. The joy is indescribable. Welcome back!
target: الصحبة دي وحشانا والفرحة مش سيعانا يا مرحبا يا هنانا

source: I swear, without you I have grown tired, and longing has plagued my heart.
target: من غيركوا والله تعبنا والشوق حلف ما يسبنا

source: No letter could comfort me. No song would cheer me up.
target: لا رسالة بتريحنا ولا غنوة بتفرحنا

source: You are in a foreign land and I am a stranger here without you in my homeland.
target: انتم هنا في الغربة واحنا هنا في دوامة

source: Since your departure no one has cared enough for me.
target: من يوم رحيلكم واحنا ما حد عدى في ريحنا

source: Seeing you again has revived me. Your arrival has really delighted me.
You are the dearest thing to me. Your return has revived me.
target: يا أغلى حاجة لينا ردت ورحنا فينا

source: Absence burns and your absence hurts.
target: دا البعد عنكم نار والفرقة باستمرار

source: Please have mercy on me, my beloved.
I really miss you very much.
Where can I find people who can understand this question and say it out loud?
target: ومنين أجيب ناس لمعنى في السؤال يتلوه؟

source: They killed the man and then dragged him to the police station.
I ask a question based on their answer.
Do they know what to say? Or do they not know? Or are they hiding the truth from investigators?
target: عارفين ولا مش عارفين ولا على الحكومة داروه

source: I swear, I am at a loss. Should I take my fate into my own hands, or should I mourn my fate?
target: احترت والله أحط الحرف فوق السطر ولا أبكي على المكتوب

source: Oh mercy, where can I find you?
I am ready to ransom you with my soul to solve the riddle of the question.
target: برقبتي وروحي افديكي وأحل لغز السؤال

source: We cannot escape our destiny.
target: والمكتوب على الجبين لازم تشوفه العين

source: This is a story told, witnessed and really lived by a wise man.
target: دي حكاية حكاها الحكيم وعاشها بقلبه وشافها كمان بالعين

source: The lash of the beloved is as big as the land.
target: ورمش عين الحبيبة يفرش على فدادين

source: The truth has two faces.
One is a teacher, the other is a millionaire.
target: واحد معلم كتب والتاني معاه ملايين

source: A bird that became featherless on both wings.
The eye must see who was murdered at the fence.
target: واللي انقتل على السور لازم تشوفه العين

source: Thousands of questions about death: who killed and who was killed?
target: وأسئلة الوفات مين اللي اتقتل واللي قتل

source: Her beauty is divine.
Her beauty is Egyptian.
Her eyes show that she has fallen in love with me.
target: واللي باين من عينيها إن ليها شوق وغية

source: Mine show my good intentions.
target: واللي باين من عينيا إن فيهم حسن نية

source: Her beauty is divine.
I cannot suppress my longing for you.
I do not mind losing myself again and again in the sea of your eyes; the sea of loving kindness.
target: في بحور حنانك بحلم أغرق تاني وتاني

source: Oh, your eyes are magical! Save me from these streams of water.
target: ياللي الهوى في عيونك ساحر نجي غريق من وسط المية

source: She is 100% in love with me.
I am also in love with her.
My eyes cannot hide my longing.
Thousands of lovers begged her for a handshake.
target: ألف رصيد في الحب وصلها يطلب منها سلام وتحية

source: She rejected them all and came to me after I had endured the agony of her love for more than two months.
target: راح كل الكون وجت لي بعد عذاب شهرين وشوية

source: Some boats are sailing home.
The eyes are puzzled.
No one knows who is sailing away.
target: ما حد عارف مين مين المروحين

source: No one knows who is about to be happy and who will spend their night in sadness.
target: مين اللي راح يفرح ومين يبات حزين

source: Some people implant a moon in a dark sky full of tears.
target: بشر يزرع قمر في عتمة الدموع

source: They fall in love, they break up, but who chooses their fate?
target: ولقى وفرقة وقدر ومين يختار نصيبه

source: My love is like a lonely moon.
I feel like a stranger next to my beloved.
I sail over a sea of tears, only to find a sea of regret.
target: بعدي بحر دموع يصادفني بحر ندم

source: Friends have left me.
I used to think of them as brothers.
Some hearts are like the rain and other hearts are no hearts at all.
target: وقلوب زي المطر وقلوب من غير قلوب

source: Oh, my thirsty heart! Oh, my tired soul!
target: يا روحي يا عطشانة يا نفسي يا تعبانة

source: The sails are taking us on an unknown voyage of memory.
target: قلوع لفين وخدانا في رحلة الحنين

source: Oh come back, precious nights.
My precious lover's scar kept me awake night after night.
target: جرحي من حبيبي الغالي سهرني ليالي

source: Oh, my heart! I cannot bear the separation.
target: اه يا قلبي من فرقة الأحباب

source: Oh, my pain is unbearable.
Oh! We cannot escape our fate.
Every sigh is a sigh of agony.
She used to shower me with love and tenderness before she left me.
target: يا ما من حنانوا سقاني قبل ما ينسى

source: Oh life, how thirsty I am now! How bitter everything tastes!
target: دلوقتي عطشان يا زماني والمر في لساني

source: She is gone, leaving behind only her cruelty. Yet I miss her.
I blame separation for my anguish, for it has robbed me of the chance to see her again.
target: وفي اللقا بعتب عليك يا فراق

source: All I can say is that I miss her indescribably.
Oh stars, you are my only friends now. Tell her the story of my sorrow.
Tell her that her beloved is wandering alone through this life.
target: قولوا حبيبك تايه في الدنيا وحداني

source: Even her song has become joyless.
I was deeply hurt by my beloved, but I do not regret it.
target: جرحه معاه عاشق وعمره ما تاب

source: It pains me deeply that you should go away and forget me. I am used to your love.
target: يصعب علينا تبعدوا وتنسونا ياللي بحنان الحب عودتونا

source: Why have you forgotten me?
You have given up the comfort we gave each other.
You gave up the years we had together.
Why did you give up on me so easily?
Why the heartache?
Where is your love and tenderness? Are they lost forever?
Why do you forget a loving heart?
How can it be that you just leave like that? Oh people!
target: عشرة حنان ازاي يا ناس تبوعوها؟

source: It seems that parting is our only harbor and tears are the only shore.
target: هو الفراق موانينا ولا الدموع مراسينا؟

source: Blame me.
Blaming can be helpful.
You can see the pain in my eyes.
target: مر العذاب بقت كاسات جوة عيني

source: Blame can be helpful, blame me.
Enough torment, forgive me.
If she says her bride price is the night, I will sacrifice my sleep.
target: لو قال أنا مهري السهر عمري السهر

source: If she says her heart is a chord, my heart will sing a ballad.
target: لو قال أنا قلبي وتر أنا قلبي له موال

source: O people, if she says yes, the ballad will be a happy melody that gladdens hearts and soothes the anguish of alienation and homelessness.
target: لو قال يا ناس لو قال هيرقص الموال ويفرحنا ويريحنا في الغربة والترحال

source: I am full of hope and my heart wonders, What if ...?
target: أنا عشمان والقلب قال لو كان

source: Tenderness is her nature.
My silence is also filled with longing and tenderness.
I wish she would say something.
I am afraid that her silence will last long.
How infinitely patient I am waiting for her! But I know that one day she will come to me.
target: دا احنا صابرين لكن عارفين إن احنا في يوم هنول

source: Oh night, show me what is in my heart.
Tell it to all those who persevere in the night.
Oh night, you are the meeting place that embraces the hearts of those who are lost.
target: أنت اللقى يا ليل يحضن قلوبنا الحيارى

source: What a pity that we go our separate ways!
O migratory bird, your green home is drawing near.
target: يا طير يا متغرب بيتك الأخضر قرب

source: After a long journey, the sun has finally risen.
target: بعد ما طال مشوارك طلعت شمس نهارك

source: Come back, rebuild your home, start over and try again.
target: ارجع عمر دارك وإبدأ تاني وجرب

source: Do not be reckless. Do not change your feathers.
target: أوعى يغرك طيشك ولا تغير ريشك

source: Do not go with the flow, chasing after your livelihood.
target: وعلشان لقمة عيشك تمشي ورا التيار

source: I fear for what you have built in your diaspora.
target: خوفي عنه بنيته في الغربة وعليته

source: You may tear it down one day and have your dreams come crashing down.
Just because your homeland loved your determination and perseverance.
target: علشان بلدك حبت فيك عزم واصرار

source: The proverb is true: "The crooked trunk bears no fruit."
target: صدق المثل القايل إن العود المايل عمره في يوم يتمايل

source: Yet it is heavy with fruit.
target: ما هو شايل على أغصانه ثمار

source: The language of the eyes between two lovers is the sweetest.
target: دا كلام العين أحلى كلام ما بين اتنين حب وغرام

source: Your eyes, young girl, have bewitched me.
They have thrown me into the floods of desire.
I swear, young girl, I am not a swimmer.
target: وأنا والله يا صبية منيش عوام

source: I swear that love for your eyes kept me awake all night.
I swear that your eyes have stunned me.
Your dark eyes make me melt.
By God Almighty, I will not stop loving you.
If we spend our nights thinking about our dreams, our days become cheerful, and fate smiles.
target: لما بأحلامنا نسهر ليالينا تفرح أيامنا تضحك في عينينا

source: O night of hope, bring us some happiness.
How are you? asks the night.
Never has been better, we answer.
O night, we long only for beauty.
target: ليل يا ليل وأما نميل منملش غير لجميل

source: I swear my eyes desire you.
I swear my eyes desire you.
Oh sweetheart, you are my better half.
target: يا سكر نبات نصي الحلو انتي

source: Slip through the door of my heart.
Slip quietly through.
My heart, sweetheart, is no longer mine.
I have been lost for too long.
I have been lost in your land.
What will happen to us? I fell in love with you. I have held out for years.
target: إيه آخرتها معاكي حب وحبناكي صبر صبرنا سنين

source: I am infatuated with you, protective of you. But you still do not believe that it is enough.
target: عشق عشقت عينيكي غيرة وغيرت عليكي وبرضه مش عاجبين

source: The journey is not long.
It will be done overnight. But I am afraid of the morning.
target: وهعدي في يوم وليلة لكن خايف يا بكرة

source: Perhaps that fear would be tempered by an equal measure of joy and our nights would shine.
target: جايز على قد خوفنا فرح الأيام يشوفنا وينور كل ليلة

source: When will we find our tomorrow?
When will it come true?
But despite all my dreams, longing for your closeness is better than being separated from you, even for a single night.
target: لكن على قد ما أحلم الشوقة في قربك أرحم من البعد ولو ليلة

source: I dream of you as a smile that makes the morning cheerful, or as a way and a reminder in days of trouble.
target: بحلم بيكي ابتسامة رسمالي بكرة ضحكة وفي أيام الملامة بتكون طريق وذكرى

source: O morning, come on time and drive me on every path where I can channel my fear.
target: يا بكرة تعالى بكرة وارميني في كل فكرة تخلق من الخوف وسيلة

source: Does she want me or not? Is she uncertain?
target: هي عايزاني ولا رفضاني ولا محتارة؟

source: In my heart you will find tenderness and security, but alas!
target: دا الحنان قلبي والأمان قلبي بس يا خسارة

source: The one my heart is drawn to - the one I would love to share my days with - grows more distant the closer I get to her.
target: اللي قلبي حاسس بيها واللي نفسي تعيش أيامي كل ما اجي اقرب ليها بالخيال تسبق احلامي

source: My heart said, "Come here, my darling."s
She lives in an ivory tower.
Her heart is so high that my heart cannot reach it.
No matter how loud I sing, how will she hear me?
My heart said, "Come here, my darling."
target: قلبي قال يا حلوة تعالي فرحي عاشق مستني

source: O my longing heart, tell me!
target: قلبي يا مشتاق ياللي دوبت في الأشواق قولي

source: If your longing is as intense as mine, then we are even.
target: لو شوقك قد شوقي يبقى احنا كدا خالصين

source: We will tell life to settle down and bring our best years.
target: هنقول للدنيا روقي وتعالي بأحلى سنين

source: Come, come, O you who I always think of.
target: وتعالي تعالي تعالي يا اللي دايما على بالي

source: If you feel the same, we are even.
target: لو حالك كان من حالي يبقى احنا كده خالصين

source: My heart asks me a question, and the answer lies with you.
target: قلبي بيسالني سؤال وسؤاله جوابه معاكي

source: If my heart wanders with you through the lands of passion, would you lead it on the right path or would it get lost in your love?
target: لو عاش قلبي رحال في بلاد الشوق وياكي حيلاقي معاكي طريقه ولا هيتوه في هواكي

source: The days are passing. How long will I wait?
target: أيام بتجيب أيام ولأمتى أنا هستنى؟

source: Will I lose myself in dreams, or will I truly find joy?
target: هفضل عايش أحلام ولا فعلا هتهنى؟

source: Will my heart find its love, or will it continue to hope?
target: قلبي هيلاقي نصيبه ولا هيفضل يتمنى؟

source: I have been attracted to you for several years.
target: من كام سنة وأنا ميال ميال

source: My heart has been preoccupied with your love.
You do not speak to me. You do not greet me.
Why are you so fickle?
target: ليه كل يومين بلاقيكي في حال

source: I have traveled far and wide, but only your image has been imprinted on my heart.
target: لفيت بلاد ومشيت بلاد وفي قلبي صورتك جوايا

source: My love, will not you end our distance?
target: يا حبيبتي إيه اخر البعاد متخلي للبعد نهاية

source: I reached the clouds and your eyes sparkled like stars.
target: ووصلت فوق فوق السحاب ورسمت عينيك نجماية

source: There I exchanged all worries for love.
target: ونسيت هناك كل العذاب ورجعتي بالحب معايا

source: How do you do? Would you answer me?
How are you? Have you forgotten me?
I cannot fight the darkness without you.
Oh my forgetful lover, listen to me and speak to me.
After you, all I have only sleepless nights.
Loving you makes me puzzled and my songs show it.
Oh my forgetful lover, why don't you remember our love?
Who told you to forget me?
Oh, you leave me alone in my sadness.
It is a love story and it is over.
I was faithfully and sincerely in love with you.
I simply loved you without thinking much about it..
I loved you and my heart chose you.
I fought a lot against the waves of your stormy sea, but finally I drowned.
target: وفي بحرك ياما عومت كتير وغرقت في آخر المشوار

source: My love, do you see what has happened to me?
My heart is no longer the same after I suffered. It is no longer the same heart that wished to be with you.
target: قلبي معتش القلب الخالي بعد ما شوفت وتمنيت

source: I wished with all my heart that you would be my bride.
target: اتمنيت من قلبي تكوني أحلى عروسة تشوفها عيوني

source: The first thing I said when I saw you was, "Oh my God!"
target: أول ما أقول الله الله الله

source: The last thought I said when I saw you was, "Oh my God!"
target: آخر ما أقول الله الله الله

source: Your beauty is divine.
There is no one like you.
Where can I ever find someone like you?
target: زيك وفين ألقاه الله الله الله

source: The moon lit up my dark night and wished all lovers a good night.
target: شق القمر ليلي، مسا على العاشقين

source: Oh, the light in your eyes is calling me.
target: العين تناديني يا ضي مالي العين

source: Miss rosy cheeks, come and have mercy on me!
target: يا أم الخدود وردي حني بقى وارضي

source: Oh, you are a dream I have been waiting for, oh God.
target: يا حلم باستناه الله الله الله

source: Have my nights grown longer? Or have I forgotten how to sleep?
You are like a sea that surrounds me, but I have forgotten how to swim.
How beautiful it is when the moonlight invites friends to meet!
target: نعشق القمر لما يجمع الصحاب لمة

source: We cry when we part.
We rejoice when we meet.
It feels like the moon is shining just for us.
Our eyes sparkle in its light.
We rejoice when it smiles upon us.
Would you like to come closer to us? I want to be close to you, too.
I want to hold your hands in mine.
Go over to the shore of our dreams.
As long as I can see your beautiful eyes, the way will be bearable.
target: يا أم العيون تحلى نمشي والطريق يحلى

source: We come ashore and the land embraces us.
For you are the reason I emigrate and the reason I return.
You are the reason I emigrate and the reason I return. You rock my world and my heart leaps every time we come together.
target: خلى قلبي يهز ضلوعي يفرح باللقى لمة

source: Let my heart melt in your love.
Come nearer to declare it to me.
You are the one who understands me the most.
Make me long for you more and more.
Make me long for you even more, more than I already do.
Do not think that I will let go of you no matter how much the longing subsides.
target: وإياك تفكر بحر الشوق مهما علي هيغرقنا

source: Keep making me fall head over heels in love, my darling.
Keep doing that too, but do not think that the more you avoid me, the less I'll like you.
target: دوبنا واوعاك تحسبنا من طول دلالك راح نتعب

source: Your shyness will never drive me away.
Come closer to reassure me.
Are you putting me to the test? Do you want to know how much I care for you or do you want to test my sincerity first and foremost?
target: بتقيس غلاوتك فى قلوبنا ولا بتتأكد منا؟

source: Your absence makes everything so sad.
target: ياللي أنت بعدك راح يبعدنا عن أي شيء راح يسعدنا

source: I am patient because I know that you will eventually keep your promises.
target: صابرين عليك بس مسيرك راح توفى كل ما توعدنا

source: So what?
So what if she says goodbye to me, leaves me, or forgets me?
She thinks I will cry for her and spend many sleepless nights because I feel lost without her.
She is gone, so what?
She does not have feelings for me anymore, so what?
I will discipline my heart to forget her, and my eyes not to cry for her.
target: هوصى القلب ينساها وأوصى عينيه متبكيش

source: I will look to others again for happiness and hope.
target: وهدور فى العيون تاني على فرحة وأمل تاني

source: Since she has given up on me, I will also give up on her.
I am neither the first nor the last to fall in love and break up again. Besides, this breakup is not my fault.
target: لانا الأول ولا الآخر ولا كان الفراق ذنبي

source: She is as beautiful as the moon and I could not help but fall in love with her, O people.
She is as beautiful as the moon and I am so much in love with her.
target: قمر قمر دا أنا دوبت خلاص

source: Loving her is the best feeling I have ever had. My darling, you have the sweetest smile.
target: دا حبها أجمل احساس يا أحلى ضحكة شوفتها

source: My heart has surrendered to her love.
I will tell her that I am having the time of my life.
With you, time becomes a sweet melody.
You are the melody in my life.
I will make sure she is happy with me. I will sing for her every night.
target: هجيبلها دنيا جميلة وأغني ليلة ورا ليلة

source: I will quench her thirst with the sweetness of love and so will my thirst.
target: أسقيها من شهد الأيام وقلبي يشرب بعدها

source: My night becomes sweeter, if only you look at me.
target: ليلى ليلى يحلى لما عينيكى ليه تميل

source: Apple of my eyes, who could blame me for loving you? Or who clould take you away from me? It is impossible to stay away from you.
target: مين يا عينى يلومنى ولا ياخدك منى ياللي بعدك عني مستحيل

source: Where are you? I can not find you. You are the one my soul desires.
target: فينك مش لاقيكى ياللى روحى فيكى

source: My heart is in your hands, loving you day and night.
target: وقلبى بين ايديكى عاشق ليل نهار

source: All night long I call your name in every valley.
target: طول الليل بنادي عليكى فى كل وادي

source: I wait for you, on time and with my heart on fire.
target: ومستني فى معادي وجوة القلب نار

source: Why should I keep away from you?
Why should I forget your eyes?
I have no control over the steps I take. I do not know why.
target: دانا ماشي بخطي ومش بإرادتي كده مش عارف ليه

source: I cannot stay away from you because your eyes are the essence of my life.
target: مش بايديه أبعد عنك ياللى عيونك سر حياتي

source: My love for you is stronger than you and me.
My love for you is the reason for my misery.
You, for whom I must sacrifice myself, my love for you is the reason for my misery and joy.
target: حبى سر عذابي وفرحي ياللي عشانك لازم أضحي

source: It is not my choice that I love you.
I did not choose my destiny.
I found you in the midst of alienation. You are my first true love.
target: ياللي في عز الغربة لقيتك حبك أول حب حقيقي

source: That is how it started.
That is how I fell in love.
I was amazed at your eyes.
They were magical.
That is how passion swirled around me.
That is how I fell in love. I did not know I could.
target: وأهي جت كده ولا على بالي

source: You enchanted me when I saw you.
I saw bliss in the charm of your eyes.
I entrusted my heart to you.
And love blossomed in us.
That is how I fell in love. This is my last time.
After you, my feelings are trapped.
After you, my life is no longer mine and my songs will never echo with melancholy.
target: بعدك سنيني مهيش ملكي ولا عمر أغانيا ما هتبكي

source: As long as our hearts are safe.
I have fallen in love, father.
I have fallen in love, and it is not in my hands.
I have fallen in love face first, father.
target: حبينا يا بوي ووقعنا ولا حدش سما علينا

source: I have fallen in love. Our hearts are melting. We have both surrendered.
How can we escape our destiny? It is our destined fate.
target: فين نهرب من المكتوب ودا وعد ومكتوب لينا

source: Oh God, the lovers are lost.
Yes! Love is longing for us.
It came out of the blue and robbed my eyes of sleep.
target: جانا من الباب للطاق والنوم خاصمك يا عينيننا

source: It brought us into the sea of dreams where our hearts cannot swim.
target: خدنا في بحر الأحلام اه والقلب ماهوش عوام

source: Enough, we do not need words. Longing became our nightly companion.
target: ما خلاص مش عايزة كلام الشوق صاحب ليالينا

source: If you still want me as you did before, why should you hide your love for me? Why should you hide it?
target: لو كنتي يوم باقية عليا كده زي زمان بتخبي ليه حبك ليا وتداري كمان

source: You know that I love you more than myself.
target: وانتي اللي عارفة إني بحبك أكتر مني

source: You are the only one I feel safe with.
target: وانتي الوحيدة اللي في حبك حسيت بأمان

source: Your eyes taught me how to swim in a sea of your love.
target: أنا الغريق اللي اتعلم في عينيكي العوم

source: I am the lover who has confessed from day one.
target: وأنا الحبيب اللي اتكلم من أول يوم

source: I am the one who stays lonely all night, my baby.
target: أنا اللي طول الليل ماشي يا حبيبتي وحيد

source: I am the one who can not sleep when you are not around.
target: وأنا اللي عيني مبتنامشي طول ما انتي بعيد

source: Do not worry, my darling!
I have not forgotten you.
Do not worry, I hear you and only you when you call my name.
I can not live without seeing your eyes.
I can not live with anyone else.
You are my destiny. You are the one I adore.
target: ده قدري ومكتوبي أنتي وعشقي ومحبوبي أنت

source: Do not worry about being separated.
Wherever I go, my heart belongs only to you.
No matter how many divinely beautiful women I meet, rest assured that I belong to no one but you.
target: مهما شوف في الكون ملايكة مش حكون غير بس ليكي

source: How could I get lost when your eyes always lead me back to you!
target: مستحيل أنا أتوه في سكة فيها في الاخر عينيكي

source: Like time, you are fickle and cannot be trusted. In the blink of an eye, you can turn the present into the past.
target: زي الزمان ملكيش أمان وفي ثانية بتبيعي اللي كان

source: I will stop thinking about you. I will no longer bear your love because it is not meant for me.
target: لا هنشغل بهواكي وأدوب ولا أقول مقدر ولا مكتوب

source: Before I loved you, my heart was pure and full of hopes.
target: أنا قبل حبك كان قلبي ملاك برئ كله أماني

source: Knowing you has taught me not to be so hopeful anymore.
target: عرفت قلبك علمني مبقاش برئ أبدا تاني

source: Do not think that you have deceived my loving heart.
target: وإياكي تفتكري إن انتي ضحكتي على قلبي الولهان

source: You have deceived yours and sacrificed your love for nothing but oblivion.
target: ضحكتي على قلبك انتي وبعتي حبك للنسيان

source: We regret being close to people we thought were valuable. After all, we accept that there are things we cannot control.
target: ونندم على العشرة الغالية ونرضى بالمكتوب

source: C'est la vie! It is true. Life can separate lovers.
target: والله ادي حال الدنيا بتفرق في القلوب

source: I have loved you. I spent many cold nights dreaming of an early spring.
target: حبيتك وعشت ليالي وأنا بحلم بأحلى ربيع

source: I loved you. I never thought that one day our true love would disappear.
target: حبيتك مكنش في بالي الحب الحقيقي يضيع

source: I persevered to the end, my love, but I walked this path like a lonely stranger.
target: ومشيت الطريق للاخر يا حبيبتي لوحدي غريب

source: Then I discovered that I had reached the finish line, but the prize was not mine.
target: أتاريني وصلت الاخر والاخر ملهش نصيب

source: Your beauty is in your eyes.
They can conquer a million hearts.
There are many admirers around you, but who do you love?
target: كل القلوب حواليك وانتي بتحبي مين؟

source: Your beauty has called to me.
Something I do not know exactly has drawn me to you.
Your image has been imprinted on my heart for years.
target: صورتك هنا في وجداني ساكنة عيني من سنين

source: My heart speaks full of adoration for you. I am sleepless and head over heels.
target: قلبي وسهر لياليكي عاشق متيم بيكي

source: I have been captivated by your eyes.
I fell in love with you when you looked at me.
I say it with all my heart: I fell in love with her.
target: وأنا من قلبي بقولها حبيتها حبيتها

source: For years before I saw you, before I met you, I dreamed of meeting someone like you.
target: قبل ما أشوفك قبل ما أقابلك عشت سنين أحلم بلقاكي

source: I hoped for years to be able to tell you that you made me love myself.
target: عشت سنين بتمنى اقولك إني عشقت الروح وياكي

source: My life started with you, my baby.
I can not keep up with your eyes. I can not get you out of my mind.
target: لا أنا قد عيونك تشغلني وتشاغل بالي

source: Please stay away from me.
Leave me alone.
Please, I do not understand.
How can I reconcile with you?
I loved you.
Maybe I am delusional.
I do not know what happened to me.
Please, bear with me.
I cannot stand your thorns or your roses.
target: لا أنا قد لا شوكك ولا وردك

source: Please, I beg you, let me live my life alone again.
target: الله يخليك أنا في عرضك تسيبيني لوحدي أعيش تاني

source: Gold is precious, but if you wear it, it becomes a treasure.
target: لو الدهب غالي بيكي الدهب مشغول

source: I cannot tell what's wrong with me. But if I could speak, I swear I would tell everything.
target: لا قدرت أقول مالي وإن قولت والله هقول

source: I have never found anyone as beautiful as you, nor has there ever been anyone as tender as you.
target: ملقتش في جمالك حد ولا حد في جمالك كان

source: Oh light that shone on my path, it was your eyes that sent out the rays.
target: يا ضى في طريقي اتمد الضي بعيونك بان

source: The moon is high. But I swear it's not as high as you.
target: لو القمر عالي والله القمر ما يطول

source: I sang my ballad. My heart was immediately captivated.
target: غنيت موالي قلبي انشبك على طول

source: No matter what happens, I'll stay patient and soon get what I want.
target: مهما يكون حالي صابر وبكرة هنول

source: Oh twinkling star, listen to me and shimmer.
target: يا نجم بتلالي لالي وأنا اللي بقول

source: How can I let my mind roam free when I am busy with you.
target: إزاي أكون خالي وأنا اللي بيك مشغول

source: My love, your passion has brought me far.
Take me with you.
Take me.
Take me with you into the bliss of your love.
Are you aware of my predicament or is it just wishful thinking to make you love me?
target: أنت داري بانشغالي؟ ولا حبك شئ خيالي؟

source: If you had believed the truth in my eyes, if you had felt my tenderness, you would have loved me and not let go. You would also have asked me to sing for you again and again, wherever you wanted.
target: لو صدقت عيوني لو حسيت بحناني كانوا عنيك عشقوني وماكنتش تنساني وكنت كمان تقوللي كمان وأغنيلك في كل مكان

source: If you had felt my agonizing longing, you would surely have stayed close to me; you would have hated to separate from me
target: لو حسيت بحنيني وعذابي في أشواقي كنت أكيد حتجيني كنت كرهت فراقي

source: Why are you surprised?
Why are you surprised that I am going to leave you?
Have you just realized that I am your lover?
For a long time I have tasted sorrow.
target: ده أنا ياما زمان دوقت الأحزان

source: You said it was my destiny.
Have you learned how to long now?
Are you telling me you have had enough of longing?
Where has that love gone?
target: كان فين الحب ده كله زمان

source: Now the heart that once loved you has finally learned to forget you, no matter what you say.
target: دلوقتي خلاص قلبي اللي هواك اتعلم مهما تقول ينساك

source: I will not be able to return to my old ways.
If you think I am an angel, you are mistaken.
I love your dark eyes.
I am very much in love.
I am in love.
I am in love with the night as dark as your eyes.
I have known many women, but only you can defeat me.
target: عرفت كتير وعندك بس أبات مغلوب

source: I sing ballads about enduring.
I wander from land to land, but only you can defeat me.
target: بلف بلاد وراها بلاد وعندك بس أبات مغلوب

source: I have no one but you. I am your lover and my heart is your favorite bird.
target: أنا عاشق مليش غيرك وقلبي في الهوى طيرك

source: No matter what, I roam the whole world, but only you can defeat me.
target: ومهما يكون بلف الكون وعندك بس أبات مغلوب

source: I am your lover. I call you to taste my love, piece by piece.
target: أنا عاشق وبندهلك تدوئي الحب على مهلك

source: I have fallen in love many times, but only you, only you, can defeat me.
target: أنا حبيت وياما هويت وعندك بس أبات مغلوب

source: I have chosen you from the beginning. We will begin our story together.
You and I have often been apart and have often longed for each other.
target: ده أنا وانتي بعدنا ياما واشتاقنا لبعض ياما

source: We have been away from home long enough, don't you think?
target: واتغربنا كفاية ولا انتي مش معايا

source: As much as we have longed for each other, separation and longing must come to an end.
target: قد ما احنا اشتقنا ياما للبعاد والشوق نهاية

source: Do you want to blame me?
Blame me, but without starting an argument.
If you have something to say, I have a lot to say too.
target: وإذا كان عندك كلمة لا ده أنا عندي كلام

source: What do we have in common, besides love? Tell me.
target: بيني وبينك إيه غير الهوى ريحني

source: I have had sleepless nights, but you are hurting me.
target: أنا سهران لياليك وأنت هنا بتجرحني

source: Even in the heat of our quarrel, I send you the sweetest greetings.
target: حتى في عز خصامنا بهديك أحلى سلام

source: I give you my whole life, what did I get in return?
target: أنا بأديلك عمري خدت في حبك إيه

source: Maybe I am fed up and you are crying for me.
target: جايز يخلص صبري ترجع تبكي عليه

source: Who will be there for you when I am gone?
You can rest in my eyes.
How could I ever forget you after tasting your love?
target: من بعد ما حسيت بهواك مين ده اللي هيقدر ينساك

source: Having put my trust in you, I can live with no one but you.
target: من بعد ما صدقت عيونك مش ممكن أعيش إلا معاك

source: From the first spark of feeling, I fell in love with you, my love. I accepted my destiny. I loved your passion and desire that called me.
target: من أول احساس يا حبيبي حبيتك وعرفت نصيبي وعشقت الحب اللي ناداني وعشقت الشوق اللي ناداني

source: I do not dream except when you are with me.
You always wander in my heart.
If one day I could stay away from you, I would.
target: لو هقدر أبعد يوم عنك انا هبعد عنك

source: What drove you to do this?
To love again, my heart.
What do you want me to do with you? You can not hide it.
After we have had enough and got rid of our pining.
target: بعد ماقلنا خلاص م الأشواق ارتحنا

source: While we were among other people, her eyes sparkled and enchanted us.
target: جانا في وسط الناس رمش عنيها جرحنا

source: Suddenly I found you in love. Why are you dragging me into this?
target: فجاة لقيتك عاشق طب وأنا إيه ذنبي؟

source: Days and years passed without us falling in love.
target: ياما أيام وسنين عدت ولا حبينا

source: Suddenly we fell in love and had sleepless nights.
The longing returned and the longing is toying with us.
target: ترجع تاني اللهفة والأشواق تلعب بي

source: You made me forget the world and love only you.
target: خلتني نسيت العالم وأنت لوحدك حبيتك

source: I was asked to remember you.
When did I ever forget?
Desire threw me away, my baby. With all the strength of my passion I called for you.
target: ورماني الشوق يا حبيبي وبكل هوايا ناديتك

source: The whisper of your lips still lives in my heart, even though you are no longer there.
target: دا أنا همس شفايفك لسه في بعادك عايش فيا

source: How could my heart forget that you were the one who filled my nights with bliss?
target: وإزاي القلب هينسى وأنت اللي مليت لياليا؟

source: Until the last day of my life, I will live for you.
target: على طول ولآخر عمري أنا هفضل عايش ليك

source: No star can shine brighter in my night than the glimmer of your eyes.
target: ولا نجمة تنور سهري أجمل من ضي عينيك

source: Let us not talk about the past.
The past is full of scars.
As long as loving you makes me happy, why bring up the past?
target: و مادمت بحبك أنا راضى، ها ندور ليه على شيء راح؟

source: Oh sweet angel, my heart has realized everything it dreamed of through your eyes.
target: يا أرق ملاك أنا قلبى ملك بعيونك آه كل الأحلام

source: The past disappeared when I met her and knew that she really loved me.
target: الماضى انتهى لما عرفتها  وعرفت إنها حبتنى أكيد

source: At that moment I felt that I loved her and, more importantly, that the seed of that love began to grow in my heart.
target: حسيت وقتها إني بحبها وابتدى حبها جوايا يزيد

source: Knowing that she loves me with all her heart encouraged me to be close to her - so close that I dreamed of planning a life with her.
target: أحساسي إنها عاشقة بقلبها  وأنا صدقتها خلاني بقيت أنا أقرب لها من الناس كلها وبنيتلها أجمل قصر وبيت

source: Where else can you find our good days?
Where else can you build our dreams?
Would it be fair if one day we were no longer lovers?
target: ويرضي مين إن احنا منكنش يوم عاشقين

source: We have fallen madly in love. We can not help that time has finally blessed us with a sweet destiny, but now it's important that we keep our promises.
target: حبينا وعشقنا وقولنا مش غلطتنا إن الزمان صالحنا بس المهم إن احنا منرجعش في كلامنا

source: We have had the time of our lives.
Who can ever forget that?
Where else can we find true love when one day we are separated?
target: وفين هنلاقي روحنا لو عشنا يوم تايهين؟

source: It has been said that our flame of love has gone out.
target: اتقال كلام علينا واتقال الشوق نسينا

source: People have said things that have hurt us.
target: واتقال كلام جرحنا من ناس كتير تانين

source: Do you remember the memories we had together? They are everywhere. There is hardly a place that does not remind me of you.
target: فاكر لما كان وكان وكان لينا في كل مكان مكان

source: When we first met, you greeted me with your eyes. They conveyed something that connected our hearts, something that went beyond a handshake.
target: أول لقا بينا أول ما تقابلنا كان السلام بإيديك ولا الكلام بعينيك يتحس بقلوبنا

source: What a coincidence when we first met, not knowing it was meant to be. The meeting was meant to be and so was the parting. We thought our promises would come through.
target: كان اللقا صدفة وقلوبنا مش عارفة إن اللقا مكتوب وإن الفراق مكتوب والوعد مكتوبنا

source: My baby, your love has driven me crazy.
You run away from me saying you still love me.
What makes you think you'll take care of me when we are apart? Why do you think you'll take care of me when you can not when I am here with you?
target: إزاي في البعد فاكرني إذا كنت في قربي ناسيني؟

source: Life keeps you so busy and at a distance, so I write to you and ask you a thousand questions.
target: واخداك الدنيا بعيد وابعتلك ألف سؤال

source: If you still care about me, you will surely think of me.
target: لو كنت فاكرني أكيد كنا خاطرنا على البال

source: Tell me, how is that possible? My eyes follow you wherever you go.
target: طب قولي ازاي وعينيا مطرح ما تروح وياك

source: But you do not care about me - me who has always loved you so much.
target: قلبك ميخفش عليا وأنا عايش عمري اهواك

source: How could your heart fall so in love and leave me?
target: جالك قلب إزاي تعشق كدا وتسبني؟

source: Will you add to the agony of longing?
target: هو هيبقى الشوق الشوق وأنت كمان تتعبني

source: You have stolen my heart. I go where you go.
target: أنت يا واخد قلبي مهما تروح وياك

source: I can forget everything and everyone, but I can never forget you.
target: بنسى الناس والدنيا وأنت اللي ما بنساك

source: Tell me, my love, how can you leave me and still sing for me?
target: قولي إزاي يا حبيبي تبعد وتغنيلي

source: My love, if I live on and one day I can love passionately again, I will still think of you.
target: لو يا حبيبي هعيش وأقدر يوم واشتاق تبقى عيونك أنت زادي للأشواق

source: Some days are melancholy and others are joyful.
We heal many wounds, but others hurt us.
Oh love, you have been with us for years. Regardless of the distance or the cries of pain, the sun rises every morning.
target: يا حب خدنا سنين معاه مهما افترقنا أو قولنا اه الشمس طالعة كل يوم

source: That's the way life is.
It is true that we were once lovers who challenged time itself.
target: احنا صحيح كنا زمان عشاق بنتحدى الزمان

source: But alas, it's time to say goodbye.
No need to dwell on the past.
Every heart has its own longings.
Your love was born in me since I was a child.
target: حبك ده شئ أتولد جوايا من صغري

source: I will live with it forever and sacrifice myself for it.
Your love is a path that spreads out before me. All my life I have walked it, despite the wounds and the anguish, but I have never objected.
target: حبك طريق اترسم طول عمري فيه ماشي فوق الجراح والألم ولا قولت غير ماشي

source: You are more important to me than my life, I cannot love anyone else but you.
target: يا أغلى من عمرنا غيرك انتي مش لاقي أنا والله مش لاقي

source: I swear I cannot.
O my love, O my darling, I cannot live without you.
target: يا روحى أنا ويا قلبى أنا ملناش عنك يا حياتى غنى

source: For you yearning drained me and got drained itself
A day feels like a year to me now.
My heart burns with desire, and only the touch of your hand can quench it.
target: النار فى القلب من الأشواق ما يريحهاش غير لمس إيديك

source: Where will you find a lover like me who sees the world through the light of your eyes?
target: ومنين هنجيب زينا عشاق بيشوفو الدنيا بضي عينيك

source: My baby, have not we been apart too long? I can not even dream without you.
target: يا حبيبي واخرة بعدنا إيه وإزاى العين هتشوف أحلام؟

source: It is unfortunate that we waste the nights of love and our own lives with quarrels and separation.
target: ده حرام الحب تروح لياليه وسنينا تضيع فى فراق وخصام

source: I am having an ice cream in December.
I am having an ice cream in Gleem.
People are shivering, but in my heart it feels like a beautiful spring day.
target: الناس حاسين بالبرد وفي قلبي ده شم نسيم

source: My head is teeming with revolutionary ideas to change the face of this world.
target: أنا جوة دماغي حاجات هتغير وجه الكون

source: I have thousands of dreams that I will achieve at any cost.
target: أحلام ألوفات ألوفات، وهطولها وفين ماتكون

source: When the sun sets, my inner sunbeams are bright enough to break through the clouds.
target: لو شمس الدنيا دي غابت أنا شمسي تشق الغيم

source: I am neither known nor familiar, but tomorrow I will be.
target: أنا مش مألوف امبارح لكن والجاي مألوف

source: Flowers without fears and thorns have blossomed in my heart.
target: وفي قلبي الورد الطارح من غير أشواك ولا خوف

source: I will always rise from the dust. I will never surrender.
target: وهعاند ايوة هعاند دايما من غير تسليم

source: Platform number 5. The street is crowded, but the silence between us is deafening.
target: رصيف نمرة خمسة والشارع زحام وساكت كلامنا ما لاقي كلام

source: Nuts to eat, mister?
Cigarettes to smoke, mister?
Meanings are suppressed in the harness.
The honking of the trolley bus traumatizes my ears while Shehta, the barbar, talks my ear off.
target: كلاكس الترولي بيسور وداني وشحتة المزين بياكل وداني

source: O Paris Club, please come over to help and schedule his debt - for him and for me.
target: يا نادي باريس تعالى وحاسبني وجدول ديونه عشانه وعشاني

source: Abdallah Roshdi, the esteemed lawyer, is suing Fikry, the street vendor who sells wheat cereal, in Bab al-Wazir court for once using his raspy voice to promote his wares on the street.
target: وعبد الله رشدي محامي قدير بيرفع قضية في باب الوزير على عم فكري بتاع البلبلة عشان مرة زعق بصوته الجهير

source: Al-Amanah, the food vendor, and Noshi, the saddler, say they are partners and have a boutique.
target: بقالة الأمانة ونصحي السروجي عمالين لي شركة في مشروع بوتيك

source: They wanted Abdo, the poultry merchant, to join them, but he arrogantly refused their request, saying he did not like business partnerships.
target: ونادوا لعبدو الفرارجي يشاركهم فرد بألاطة محبش شريك

source: There was a bitter dispute in al-Imam market because Lam'ey, the pigeon seller, could not reach a compromise with Sab' effendi in terms of the peace agreement.
target: وجت وقعة سودة في سوق الإمام عشان عم لامعي بتاع الحمام مقدرش يوصل لأي اتفاق مع سبع أفندي في قضية سلام

source: There are many helpless children still in the cradle of childhood, advertising old movies and Coca-Cola.
target: وأطفال عجايز في نبض الطفولة وأفلام قديمة وإعلان كوكولا

source: If you do business, you live like a king for the rest of your days.
Even if you sell a chicken for them, you get your commission.
As the tram of Rod El-Farag (Gardens of Relief) passes by, the years go by without a sign of relief.
target: تروماي بسنجة في روض الفرج وأعمار تعدي لا يجي الفرج

source: Neither is the sea on which we sail charted, nor is there a coast on the horizon.
target: ولا البحر باين لآخره مراسي ولا حد راسي منين الفرج

source: I will rebel against the present state.
I will not stay up nights thinking about loving you.
It is impossible to have you back.
In your absence, my life will be much better and more pleasant.
Wrong is the heart that bargains for a lover and ignores the red flags.
target: كداب القلب اللي يساوم ويغالط احساسه الواهم

source: You deceived me and now my heart has learned its lesson.
I will never believe you again - not even in my dreams.
I will not be able to overcome you in the blink of an eye, but I can look forward to other dreams that can make me happy.
target: ولا هقدر انساكي في ثانية واستنى الأحلام التانية بالفرح الموعود جايالي

source: Just sing, and we will follow.
Every time I sing, they follow me.
target: أنا كل ما أغني يقولوا معايا

source: I will sing the usual traditional ballads.
target: هقول يا ليل واقول يا عين

source: Hey, you! Sing a little quieter.
Band No. 9, and Street No. 9
Say anything, even a simple 'I love you'
target: ما تقولوا حاجة إن شاء الله أهواك

source: All my songs were sad
target: كل اللي عندي آهات في آهات

source: How can I sing?
Just two more verses, then it's done.
Oh dear, things are looking up. Our friend Nour sent me a few things.
target: جانا الفرج يا سلام سلمنا ونور صاحبنا بعتلي حاجات

source: O disabled people all over the world, unite.
In the beginning, the universe was full of pure feelings.
I swear I do not understand anything.
Just shut up, kid.
The nights smile at the smile of my beloved.
target: ضحكة عيون حبيبي ضحكت ليها الليالي

source: My heart has abandoned me to my love.
It has forsaken me after I have engaged with her.
After falling so deeply in love and experiencing the glory of life together, after admiring your eyes, my dear baby, my heart has leapt to the moon in its joy.
target: سافر عند القمر من بعد ماخدنا الهوا وعرفنا الدنيا سوا وعشقنا عيونك يا.. ياقمر

source: Her beauty is indescribably magical.
If I must say it, I must admit that I am now head over heels in love with you - more than anyone else could ever be.
target: والكلام عنها لو حقول حعترف إن أنا دلوقتي بحب وأدوب وأكتر بكتير من أي قلوب

source: Our love story is eternal.
Everything before her is lost, it does not count.
I was reborn by the touch of your hand after waiting so long for it.
target: دا العمر ابتدا من لمسة إيد من بعد ماعشنا أنا وأنتي بعيد

source: Everything has changed since you came into my life.
Oh my heart, you were right. In her presence you could not help but melt, pause, and then come back to life.
target: كان عندك حق تدوب وترق وترجع تاني ياقلبي تدق

source: You are losing yourself in her love and sighing in pain.
Many times I said I would leave that love behind, but I did not. I thought time could make me forget, but it could not.
target: ياما قلنا حنبعد مابعدناش وتاخدنا الدنيا مابننساش

source: Other eyes invited me into their lives and begged me to be loved. But it is only her eyes that I answer.
target: وعيون تنادينا.. تحايل فينا ونقول ياعيونه يا اما بلاش

source: So I lose myself in their love and sigh in pain.
target: دة ندوب في هواه ونقول الاه

source: You were right, my heart. What else could we do? We have already given ourselves to her in love.
target: كان عندك حق ونعمل إيه ماخلاص سلمنا الهوا لايديه

source: Even if for once I try to hide the love I feel for her, my eyes say it all.
target: لو مرة دارينا يبان في عنينا

source: Who is madly in love without showing any signs!
target: مين داب في الحب مابانش عليه

source: I dream of sweet nights with you.
I never stop dreaming with you.
target: وياك ما بينتهيش الحلم فى عينينا

source: I dream of a longing look in your eyes when you are in my arms.
target: باحلم بعينيك تاخدني أنت والشوق فى حضنى

source: I dream, my darling, because your love is my last hope.
target: بحلم وهواك يا حبيبي آخر أمل لينا

source: I dream with you to compensate for past losses and wounds.
target: بعد اللى راح بعد الجراح بحلم معاك

source: I have no one here but you.
You are all I have ever wished for.
target: ما أنت اللى كنت أنا بتمناه

source: I felt safe and tender in your love.
target: كل الأمان كل الحنان عشته فى هواك

source: I am not the same person after falling in love with you.
target: حتى أنا مابقتش أنا من بعد ما قلبى داب وياك

source: My love, my darling, who do I have but you?
target: ياعمرنا يا قلبنا أنا ليا مين غيرك

source: I have grown so weary without you
target: تعبنا ودوبنا فى البعد من غيرك

source: Who else do I have but you?
My life was unbearable, impossible to like without her.
target: أيام حياتى فى بعدها، يا عمرنا، كان مستحيل أحبهاـ، يا قلبنا

source: I was not alive when she was gone, oh dear!
target: أيام ما عشت في بعدها، يا عمرنا

source: Life separated us and made us lose the way to each other
I had only one dream of her: to be the only one in her heart.
target: كان حلم عمري في حبها، يا عمرنا، هعيش لوحدي في قلبها، يا قلبنا

source: It was a precious dream that passed through my imagination
target: كان حلم غالي مر في خيالي

source: Now my dream has come true
Since the day you left, I have had no comfort.
I have been waiting for an answer.
You said you would come back, but you forgot me.
Tell me how you are going to live without me.
I send a letter every other day.
Sometimes I send words of love and sometimes words of blame.
My baby, where is the love you swore would never fade?
target: فين يا حبيبي الحب اللي انت كنت بتحلف إنه ما غاب

source: A long time ago we were overwhelmed by passion.
I can not live anymore since you left.
You have robbed me of my happiness.
Tell me, my darling, to whom are you leaving me?
I have already forgiven you.
Whether you are near or far from me, I have no lover but you.
Please, never leave me.
I have already forgiven you because you are my life. What else can I do?
target: خلاص سامحتك يا عمري وبإيدي ايه

source: My heart has fallen in love with you, and I have given myself to your love.
target: أنا قلبي حبك وحبك أنا دبت فيه

source: The love of the whole world is nothing compared to your love.
target: هو حب الدنيا كله جنب حبك يجي ايه؟

source: You are my beloved, my everything.
My love, you are my destiny.
You have captured my heart.
I could not hide it. No one else in the world can feel me.
target: لاعرفت أخبي ولا حد غيرك في الكون داري بي

source: Let us forget the past. Enough is enough.
Our days are happier when you are with me.
You are a part of me. You made me sing.
You made me want to start over.
I was minding my own business.
I had no idea what would happen to me.
target: واللي جرالي ما كان على بالي

source: Love took me by surprise.
I have ventured too far.
It led me to her.
I fell in love with a new love
I fell in love with her love.
My heart told me, "this is the love of your life."
target: ده خدني وقالي هو ده حب العمر كله

source: My heart told me, "live with her for the rest of your life."
I said no.
Before I saw her beautiful soul, I was completely lost.
target: قبل ما أشوف أجمل روح تهت كتير قبلها

source: I was wounded for years, but that is over now.
target: عشت سنين وأنا مجروح بس ده كله انتهى

source: Love was gone as if it had never existed.
Who has ever fallen in love and managed to return to what he once was?
target: مين كان عاشق مرة ودايب يقدر يرجع زى زمان؟

source: That is life. That is our destiny.
Our love can leave us in an instant, and the one we once left can become our new lover, with whom we feel safe.
target: اللى نحبه فى لحظة يسيبنا واللى نسيبه يبقى حبيبنا ونلقى معاه الدنيا أمان

source: Is life to blame, or was the separation our choice?
target: اه يازمان الحق عليك ولا فراقنا دا كان بإيدينا

source: Will we cry over our days? Or will life cry over us?
target: احنا هنبكي على الأيام ولا الدنيا حتبكي علينا

source: Why does the cruel grief continue? And why does joy vanish in the blink of an eye?
target: ليه الحزن القاسى يدوم وليه الفرح فى ثانية يطير

source: Why is my heart bereft of tenderness, though it has been there for so long?
target: ليه القلب يعيش محروم وهو اللي ادا حنانه كتير

source: They keep accusing me.
Let them!
My heart has chosen the one I am to love.
Oh my heart, feel the love.
Oh my heart, dream.
Let tomorrow be filled with love and affection.
target: خلي بكرة كله حب ودوب معاه

source: Do not hesitate to live this love story to the fullest.
They used to talk about us.
We have only reaped tears.
target: خدنا إيه غير بس دموع عنينا

source: Never mind, tomorrow our love will heal us and the meeting will be a song calling for us.
target: ده الهوا والشوق بكرة يداوينا واللقى هيغنى وينادينا

source: Hide your happiness, my darling. Do not let the envious see us. They have already hurt us enough with the judgment in their eyes, but they will never succeed in separating us.
target: دارى يا قمرنا ليشفونا اللي غارو منا وحيرونا واللى بعيونهم بيجرحونا واللى عمرهم ماهيبعدونا

source: I have already changed the lock on the door of my heart and can fall in love again.
target: أنا غيرت خلاص عنواني وقدرت أرجع وأعشق تاني

source: It cannot be that I go through life alone.
I was not lonely before.
It's hard to love life when you do not have a heart that is ready to love.
target: من غير قلب من غير حب صعب الدنيا فى يوم تتحب

source: It's even harder to find someone who has as much love and tenderness as I do, honey.
target: وأصعب منها إن أنت تلاقي حد يكون له نفس حناني

source: I wasted many years of my life dreaming and getting caught up in my own stories.
target: أنا ضيعت سنين فى حياتى بين أحلامى وبين حكاياتى

source: But after the longing dies down, my heart will have no more wounds.
target: لكن بعد الشوق مارتاح مش هيكون فى القلب جراح

source: I cannot dwell on the past, not after seeing that your love is the answer.
target: أنا مش ممكن أعيش فى امبارح بعد ما حبك بقى شيء واضح

source: How could I feel lonely again when you are the one I love now?
target: وإزاى هارجع تانى وحيد وأنا دلوقتى بحب جديد؟

source: Our love and our nights together cannot be forgotten.
target: ولا الليالى تهون ولا اللي بنا يهون

source: My heart in love can never betray you.
target: ولا عمر قلبي العاشق يقدر فى مرة يخون

source: You came into my heart, and since then it dreams only of you.
target: دخلتى قلبى ومن يومها معادش يحلم غير بيكي

source: Life throws burdens on my shoulders, but they melt away the moment I meet you.
target: دنيا بترميلي همومها تدوب فى لحظة ملاقيكي

source: Life brings us apart, but we always come back together.
target: وادى الحياة بتفرقنا لكن بنرجع تانى نقول

source: I swear by your smiling eyes that I can never sing to anyone but you.
target: وحياة عينيكي وضحكتها ماغنى أبدا غير ليكى

source: You are my songs and joyful chants. My future is in your eyes.
target: دانتى الأغانى وفرحتها وبكرة باين فى عينيكى

source: If your eyes can betray me, nothing else matters.
target: العيون لو تخون يبقى كل شئ يهون

source: For a long time I believed sweet words, but then the truth was finally revealed.
target: ياما صدقنا كلام وأتاكدنا مع الأيام

source: I took your eyes for my way and my life.
But your smile turned out to be the beginning of my sorrow.
Whatever wounds are created, they always heal.
If we ever commit betrayal, we would wound our souls.
target: ولو مره خونا بنجرح فى روحنا

source: Remind me not of the life I have wasted with you!
target: متفكرنيش بالعمر اللى أنا ضيعته معاك

source: Do not remind me of the torment and horror I endured long ago because of you!
Forget me!
My heart no longer longs for the nights of your love.
target: ده أنا قلبي خلاص مبقاش مشتاق لليالي هواك

source: Do not remind me of the past, of my melting heart, of the sorrow, the anguish, the wounds and the separation!
target: متفكرنيش بسنين عدت وسنين مرت وسنين حرمان مافيهاش أشواق

source: Do not remind me of what I have experienced and gone through!
target: متفكرنيش باللى أنا شفته واللي أنا عشته

source: My heart thought you were an angel.
target: كان فاكر قلبى ان انت ملاك

source: Do not remind me of what you said! I believed it, although they were just empty words.
target: متفكرنيش بكلام قلته وانا صدقته، بكلام فى الهوا مش من جواك

source: I swear by the nights and by your eyes, my love.
I do not know what has happened to me or what is going on between us.
target: ما اعرف ايه جرالي وايه حكايتي معاك

source: I have heard but one sweet word from you and found myself loving you, my love.
target: هي كلمة وأحلى كلمة، لقيتني بهوا يا حبيبى هواك

source: I have walked a path of hope with you.
target: هي ضحكة وأحلى ضحكة، مشيت في سكة من الأماني معاك

source: Why did I get involved with love again?
I had forgotten her, and she had almost forgotten me.
Just one sweet word and I was enchanted. I saw the longing in your eyes again.
target: من كلمة حب لقيتني بحب وعرفت الشوق في عينيك تانى

source: When you are with me, my feelings for you cannot be described, not even in a thousand stories.
target: احساسي بيك وانت معايا عايزله ولا ألف حكاية

source: It is something that only we can feel through a word or a laugh.
target: دا شيء يتحس ما بينا وبس من كلمة أو من ضحكاية

source: There is no other option.
Either we spend our lives together or I will not move on at all.
target: يا نعيش الحياة أنا وأنت يا وقفت فى مكاني

source: My baby, as long as you are far away, I feel lonely in this world.
target: ياحبيبى طول ما أنت بعيد أنا عايش فى الدنيا وحيد

source: I am tired of the pain. My heart has already suffered enough.
target: مليت الاحساس بالألم والقلب اللى كتير اتظلم

source: I never knew anything but sighs of sorrow, my love.
target: وفى كل الأيام مش عارف ياحبيبي غير التنهيد

source: Without you, I spent years with a heavy heart.
target: فى بعادك أنا عشت سنين من عمري وأنا قلبي حزين

source: I had enough of the sorrows and the life I once led.
target: مليت الأحزان كلها وحياتى اللى زمان عشتها

source: Without you, I endured much and chased after an illusion.
target: من غيرك ياما شفت كتير وأنا باجرى ورا وهم كبير

source: I have accepted my fate of wasting my life.
target: وأنا راضي بمشيئة القدر والعمر اللى راح وانهدر

source: I will not cease to love you.
I will not stop falling in love with your heart.
Many hearts around you are sunk in your love.
target: حواليك قلوب وقلوب بتميل عليك وتدوب

source: But, my baby, I am your predestined love.
target: لكن يا روحي أنا حبي عليك مكتوب

source: My baby, my life, you are as pure as an angel. I have given myself to you. My life is all yours.
target: حبيبي يا كل عمري يا برىء زي الملاك لهواك سلمت أمري ولعمري الجاي معاك

source: How and why can my heart melt for someone other than you?
target: ادوب إزاي وليه وماليش الا هواك؟

source: I spent the night with you and learned what passion is.
target: ليلك وسهرت فيه وعرفت الشوق معاك

source: Love has brought us together, and the world will hear us.
Tonight is our first feast.
This is the road of our glory. These dark-skinned men are our sons. This is Cairo. This is our land
target: آدي طريق أمجادنا وآدي السمر ولادنا وآدي القاهرة وآدي بلدنا

source: This is our life. This is our road. The future is wide open before us.
target: آدي أيامنا وآدي سكتنا وياما أيام كتير جاية

source: Our story, my dear, is one to behold.
The passion between us is endless.
From the first call, love was born.
target: ده من أول ندا الحب ابتدى

source: I have never fallen in love with a woman like this, except when I found you.
target: ولا عمرى عشقت أنا بالشكل ده إلا مالقيتك ويايا

source: Before you I met many women, but I never lost sleep from longing.
target: وقابلت كتير قبلك وقليل ولا مرة الشوق سهرنى الليل

source: When I saw you, I forgot everything and fell in love.
Your love taught me to sing.
I drowned in the whirlpool of life.
Why did we go our separate ways?
target: ليه كل واحد فينا ماشي فى اتجاه؟

source: We have grown weary because of our painful memories.
target: ذكريات عشنا فيها، دوبنا فيها من العذاب

source: Why are we still chasing our memories like a mirage?
target: ذكريات من ماضينا باقية فينا ليه سراب

source: We went down this road many times and got lost.
target: فى الطريق كتير مشينا واتنسينا فى الطريق

source: It wore us down and destroyed every bit of innocence we had.
The truth is not quite true.
target: والحقيقة مش حقيقة فى كل شيء

source: Her beauty is indescribable.
When you see her, you will know that I am in love with an angel.
She is like a flower that you want to smell.
I still remember the day I talked to her. I remember how her eyes and smile dazzled me.
target: دنا لسه فاكر من يومها ساعة ماكنت بكلمها ضحكتها وعينيها

source: Her innocent smile promises me so many dreams
target: ضحكة بريئة بتوعدني بحاجات كتير بأحلم بيها

source: I have been waiting so long for those wishes to come true, but I will not talk about it.
target: أنا من زمان مستنيها لكني مش هحكيها

source: She was my life's dream that finally came true.
She was everything I had ever wanted.
I loved her just the way she is.
She has a beautiful, special smile that is not easily found.
target: ضحكتها مش ضحكة عادية توصفها تلاقيها

source: I have tried to stay away from you, but I have not succeeded.
I tried to forget what we once had, but I could not.
target: حاولت انسى اللي كان بينا ومقدرتش

source: I tried so hard, but my heart was crying. It was driving me crazy. It spent nights blaming me.
target: حاولت كتير لكن قلبي بكى مني وجنني وتوهني في ليل اللوم وزاد اللوم

source: Maybe I am wrong, but I do not know.
Maybe that is how it is with love.
I tried to listen to my heart, but I could not understand it.
I tried hard, but my heart did not speak to me, not even to rebuke me.
target: حاولت كتير لكن قلبي لا كلمني ولا لامني

source: Its words were silent.
Finally, I found out that my heart has fallen deeply in love with you, my dear.
target: اتاري قلبي حبك موت اه يا عمري

source: Perhaps I miss you.
Maybe it is my fault.
I tried to run away again and live alone with my heart.
target: حاولت اهرب بعيد تاني واعيش تاني انا وقلبي

source: Do not speak to her.
My heart, keep away from her, or you will fall in love with her just by looking into her eyes.
target: خليك بعيد عنها لتنشغل بيها وتهوى لياليها من نظرة بعيونها يا قلبي

source: I fear you may lose yourself in her dreams, you may become a prisoner of her memory.
target: خايف عليك منها لتتوه في احلامها وتعيش اسير الشوق على ذكرى ايامها

source: Did you love her and her features?
Tell me how you fell in love without knowing her.
target: طب قولي فين وازاي من غير ما تعرفها

source: Do you now believe that you were valuable to me?
target: صدقتني ان انت كنت عليا غالي؟

source: Do you believe that? Do you need time to think or do you want me to tell you more?
target: صدقت ولا محتاج تفكر ولا عايزني أقولك أكتر؟

source: I swear, I had no idea that all this would happen to me.
target: والله ماكان على بالي كل اللي بيجرالي

source: Do you believe me and realize that I am in love?
My heart, which has always longed for you, is no longer mine.
target: قلبي اللي عاش في هواك مابقاش خلاص ملكي

source: My heart cries with joy for you, day and night.
target: بقى ليل نهار وياك من فرحته بيبكي

source: If I had the choice to live twice as long and love you, I would have your eyes as my helmsman.
target: لو كان بإيدي أعيش عمرين على عمري، أنا كنت أخلي عنيك تملك زمام أمري

source: Where were you when my heart melted?
target: طب كنت فين وأنا دايب دوب؟

source: It makes no difference. I will forget you.
target: ماهيا هيا اه اه هنساك انا

source: Your love burned me, but you did not feel it.
target: هواك وكان ناري وانت ولا داري

source: You say you are my lover. How can you be when you leave me in the midst of my grief?
target: وتقول حبيب وازاي حبيب وانت ناسيني في عز الاه

source: Why should we try again?
Why should we love each other once more?
I have a future to live with.
We come back to be taken by love and spend our lives together.
target: راجعين نعشق وندوب ونعيش مع بعض حياتنا

source: We are coming back. There is no escape from our longing and our shared stories.
target: راجعين مايفيدش هروب من شوقنا ومن حكاياتنا

source: Come to me, O love of my life.
target: وتعالى تعالى تعالى يا حبيب العمر تعالى

source: Every moment I have lived without you does not count.
target: كل اللي انا عشته ف بعدك من عمري دا مش محسوب

source: I vowed to go away and live without your eyes.
target: وحلفت اني هفارق وهعيش من غير عينيك

source: It turns out that not only am I in love with you, but my soul is enraptured with you.
target: مش بس لقيتني عاشق انا روحي لقيتها فيك

source: My dear, let us not blame each other or wallow in the past.
target: يا حبيبي بلاش نعاتب ونجيب سيرة اللي فات

source: Lovers share only the most beautiful memories.
target: دا مفيش بين الحبايب غير احلى الذكريات

source: They want to confuse you and hope you will change your mind. But I swear by our love that no one will ever come between us.
target: عايزين يغيروك عايزين يحيروك لكن وحياة اللى ما بينا ما في حد هيقدر يبعدنا

source: Even if at some point we stray from the path, our desire will surely bring us back together.
target: وإن مرة غلطنا أهى أشواقنا أكيد هيرجعوك

source: They say things about you.
They say things about me.
No matter what they say, in my heart you are blameless, far beyond their chatter.
target: وأنت اللى صورتك فى قلبي فوق الملام والكلام

source: To me, you are my destiny and my lot in life.
Even if they manage to turn you against me, you always impress me with your tenderness.
target: ده حتى لو غيروك رقيق وزى الملاك

source: When they see you through my eyes,
they will fall in love with you as I do.
Their days are over, my heart. Others will take their place.
Let them go.
Forget them and they will follow you like your shadow.
Why should you think about them?
Do not think, my heart, that you can live with them again.
target: ماتفكرش ان انت يا قلبى ترجع تانى تعيش ايامهم

source: After they were my dearest lovers, we went our separate ways.
target: بعد مكانوا اغلى حبايبى احنا فى حالنا وهم فى حالهم

source: My heart, for so long we gave them more love than they could imagine.
target: ياما ياقلبى قدمنالهم اكتر من الحب اللى فى بالهم

source: Then they hurt us. We kept silent, but they took that as submission.
Promise me that you will remember me when you love again, even if you live with another love.
target: اوعدني انك في بعدي عنك حتفتكرني لو عشت ثاني مع حب ثاني

source: Stay my beloved, but please let us not hurt each other.
target: خليك حبيبي من غير ما نجرح بعضنا

source: Stay my beloved, even if you are not here.
target: خليك حبيبي حتى وانت مش هنا

source: The days passed, my love, and we went our separate ways.
target: ايام يا عمري في العمر فاتوا وكل واحد اختار حياته

source: We agreed to separate. We accepted it and left.
target: احنا اتفقنا ع البعد واحنا خلاص فارقنا وطاوعنا روحنا

source: From the first moment we met, I believed her and loved her.
target: من اول مرة قابلتها صدقتها وعشقتها

source: She is the only one in the world to whom I will confess my love.
target: هى الوحيدة في دنيتي اللي هقول بحبها

source: Who can tell her that she is the one I need?
target: يا مين يروح ويقولها هيا اللي انا محتاجلها

source: Passion was the fate of our hearts, revealed out of the blue.
target: العشق كان وعد انكتب على القلوب من غير معاد

source: I do not know who is to blame for it.
I do not know where this separation would lead.
Our best days were spent in longing and languishing.
target: أجمل سنين من عمرنا عدت مابين لهفة وحنين

source: I am finally fed up with us being apart.
I am tired of being sad all the time.
A night worth all of life.
target: ليلة من عمري، ليلة بكل الليالي

source: One night worth the future and the past.
target: ليلة من عمري بالجاي واللي كان

source: One night is worth the whole life.
I dreamed of her. The moment I saw her eyes, I had a strange feeling.
target: أنا كنت بأحلم بيها، أول ما شفت عينيها حسيت بحاجة غريبة

source: I felt serene and safe with my beloved.
You seemed like an angel in the middle of the crowd.
You just wormed your way into my heart.
After just a few glances at you, I was speechless.
target: هما يا دوبك نظرتين حبيت وتاه مني الكلام

source: My life, my greatest love, I wandered for so long.
target: لفيت كثير ومشيت كثير يا عمري يا حبي الكبير

source: I chose you for my life.
I became a free man, caught by your love.
The same place that brought us together is also the place where we made our empty farewell speeches.
target: نفس المكان اللى كان بيجمعنا سوا هو مكان الوداع اللى ضاع فى الهوا
