target: يا روح روحي على الريشة اللي رسماكي

source: Oh, your light has touched me and changed me forever!
target: يا نور قلبك يا نور طيب لمسني لمسة شبعني

source: Although you are still young, you already confuse me.
target: عيونك لسه بتفتح ومن دلوقتي بتحير

source: If I were not gentle enough, I would not stop myself from coming close to you.
target: أنا لو بس مش طيب مفيش ولا حاجة تمنعني

source: With a gesture of innocence you beckon to me
I have seen your beauty and my heart is moved.
target: وأنا شايفك و واخدة قلبي بجمالك

source: When you enter the room, you shine like a movie star.
target: عليكي طلة ماشاء الله كإنك نجمة مشهور

source: And because I admire you so much, your beauty seems to be tattooed on my eyes.
target: وأنا من كتر إعجابي بعيني خدتلك صورة

source: My beloved is more than enough for me and I feel comfortable with her.
target: حبيبي مالي عنيا وبلاقي راحتي معاه

source: Life changed completely when I met her.
No matter how many people I meet, she is the one I want to be with.
target: دا أنا مهما أشوف حوليا هو اللى بتمناه

source: She is one of a kind. Her gentleness and tenderness are incomparable.
target: حنيته ورقته مش موجودين في الناس

source: Her eagerness to see me and be with me is great.
target: وشوقه ليا ولهفته في منتهى الإحساس

source: What else can I say about her?
She is as innocent as she has ever been.
If I had one wish, I would want to spend my whole life with her.
target: أمنيتي في دنيتي لو عمري يكمل بيه

source: Oh my heart, I can not stand it when she is not with me, even if it is only for a short time.
target: ما أقدرش لا .. يا قلبي لا .. يغيب عليا شوية

source: She is my soul and my whole life.
The most beautiful thing in my life is always her.
target: أجمل حاجه ف عمري دايما هي

source: She is definitely not an ordinary girl.
I love her with all my heart.
Loving her is the most beautiful feeling.
For me she is my sweetheart.
With her I learned how to live.
From now on I can safely say.
I can not live without her.
I love no one but her.
She is my ultimate bliss and no one else.
She is the one who fills my life with meaning, the one who is always by my side.
target: هي اللي بتملي الدنيا عليا واللي بتفضل جمبي ع طول هي

source: She is the purest dream I ever dreamed of.
target: هي .. هي هي هي أجمل حلم برئ ف عنيا

source: Like a wave, her eyes flicker amazingly.
The day I met you will remain the most unforgettable day in my life
target: يوم ما اتقابلنا اليوم ده هفضل مش ناسيه

source: On that day a new love story was given to me
target: أنا انكتبلي أحلى قصة حب فيه

source: I promise you that from tonight I will always be with you, taking care of your comfort and protecting you.
target: أنا بوعدك من الليلة دي هفضل معاك وهعمل اللى يريحك وهخاف عليك

source: I promise you, my beloved angel, that I will do everything for you. If you wish for a star from heaven, I will bring it down for you.
target: أنا بوعدك يا حبيبي يا أجمل ملاك لو عزت نجمة من السما هجيبها ليك

source: I remember everything. I even remember how and where we first met. I remember how it was when I touched your hand for the first time.
target: أنا حتى فاكر اتقابلنا إزاي وفين وأول كلمة بنا وسلامي لإيديك

source: Many eyes surround me, but I can perceive only yours.
target: شوفت كتير حوليا ما شوفتش إلا عنيك

source: Whenever I see you, I come closer to you.
target: كل ما تيجي في عنيا بقرب أكتر ليك

source: When you are not with me, I cannot help but think of you.
target: تبعد عني أنا غصبن عني بفكر فيك

source: When you come back to me, darling, I close my eyes as soon as I see you so that your beauty is the last thing I see.
target: ترجع ليا حبيبي، بغمض عيني عليك

source: So many nights I have always thought of you, my precious baby.
target: يا ما ليالي وأنت يا غالي دايما في بالي

source: So many nights I thought of you and could not let go.
target: ياما ليالي شاغل خيالي وما سبتنيش

source: I swear you are so dear to me and I would give my life for you.
target: والله أغلى من عمري وحياتي كلها ليه

source: My love, I say it from my heart.
You are always in my heart. My heart is always racing to see you.
target: أنت في قلبي ودايما قلبي بيجري عليك

source: The moment I hear your voice, everything else becomes indifferent to me.
target: أول ما أسمع صوتك بنسى الدنيا معاك

source: I can not imagine how much my heart rejoices when I meet you. It is indescribable.
target: ما اتخيلتش فرحة قلبي لما إلاقيك

source: Yes, all this happens when I meet you.
And I could not believe it then, but I do now because you are here with me
target: وما صدقتش غير دلوقتي وأنا وياه

source: Do you know, my dear, what has made matters worse?
target: عارف حبيبي اللي زود ف الخلاف؟

source: The differences between us make us opposites.
Every time I try to do something that will bring you close to me, I find that it only repels you.
target: أنا كل ما أعمل حاجة بينا تقربك مابقيتش ألاقي حاجة واحدة بتعجبك

source: And when I ask you if you love me and you say you do, I can not believe it and fear fills my heart.
target: وأما أسألك بتحبني وتقولي اه مابقيتش أقدر أصدقك وبقيت بخاف

source: I am afraid that the same two people who made promises of love to each other might be the ones who kill that love with their own hands.
target: نفس الاتنين اللي اتفقوا مابينهم وعد خايف بيإيديهم يتفارقم ويموتوا بعض

source: You no longer hear, understand or feel me. It seems that I have become some kind of enemy that you take pleasure in despising.
target: لا بقيت تسمعني وتفهمني ولا حاسس بيا وكإني عدوك وسعادتك ف عذابك ليا

source: What has happened to us? What has gone wrong?
target: هو احنا مالنا وايه جرالنا وليه كدا ؟؟

source: What has happened to us? How did we get to this point?
target: هو احنا مالنا وليه وصلنا لكل ده؟

source: I have grown tired and so have you. Who is not, anyway?
I wish we had not suffered.
The game is over. I can count it among the others I have grown from.
target: تجربة وعدت واتعدت م ضمن تجاربي

source: There's no way back.
The game is over, and I say that plainly.
target: تجربة وعدت وأنا قولت وبتكلم عربي

source: Frankly and simply put, no one is worth it.
It was necessary to be cheated in order to learn.
target: مهو لازم عشان اتعلم كان هي تبعني

source: I will not continue to live in pain.
I will overcome it.
I have to move on. I cannot live alone
target: ما أنا لازم أخطي واتقدم ومقفش لوحدي

source: You! The one who made my heart tired! I will forget you
You always said I was not that angel, right?
Right?
There is something about you.
I do not know what it is.
It never ceases to amaze me.
When you are with me, I forget the rest of the world and can think only of you.
target: وأنت معايا أنا بنسي الدنيا وبسرح فيك أنا كل شوية

source: When you call my name, my heartbeat races.
target: بسمع صوتك ينده ليا دقات قلبي تبان في عنيا

source: Can this be a common thing?
You must be an angel and you hide it from me.
My confusion is unusual.
All I wish is to continue to see life through your eyes. Because everything I see is a paradise.
target: أكتر ما الواحد يتمنى شايف الدنيا بعينك جنة

source: And your words, my dear, are so sweet that they could be sung in song.
target: ولا كلامك اه ياحبيبي من رقته سمعه بيتغني

source: Days have passed.
They were so cruel to me.
I could not live, my love, when you were far away
target: ما انا معرفتش اعيش ياحبيبي وانت غايب عن عينيا

source: The hardest thing I have experienced is this loneliness through and through
target: اصعب حاجة مرت بيا حالة الوحدة طول لياليا

source: Even more difficult is the longing for you, my love, when you are not near.
target: واصعب منها الشوق ياحبيبي وانتى غايب عن عينيا

source: I tried to live without you.
I thought I could live with another love
But my eyes could see no one when you were gone.
target: بس مشوفتش ابدا غيرك وانتى غايب عن عينيا

source: I knew your worth, my love.
I knew what it meant, my love.
And who will I call my love when you are far away?
target: قولي اقول لمين حبيبي وانتى غايب عن عينيا

source: Think again, my dear, if our love means anything to you.
target: عيد حساباتك يا حبيبي دا لو يهمك حبنا!

source: Who loves whom?
We have become strangers.
If you do not care about what we have, I will not care either.
target: لو مش خايف ع اللي بينا مش هخاف عليه انا

source: You still have a choice!
You can either stay my love, or leave my life.
target: وبايديك تفضل حبيبي او تفارق دنيتي!

source: Maybe guilt would make you reconsider the years gone by, a good memory we had and a whole life that started with you.
target: جايز بالعتاب ترجع تاني تعمل حساب لسنين فاتو وذكري حلوه وعمر وياك ابتدي

source: If I did not care about you, I would have left long ago
target: لو متهمنيش كان من بدري اسيبك واعيش

source: I have been around.
I have seen many many women.
I have not found the beauty of my Arab girl.
My heart has only beaten for the Arab girl.
target: ولا قلبي مال غير للبنت العربية

source: Wherever she goes, she has charm and spirit.
target: لها سحر وروح لو فين هتروح

source: You can recognize her among all the girls in the world.
target: من وسط بنات الدنيا تشوفها تقول هيا

source: Her charm is guaranteed to blow you away.
I love her, guys!
She is the one who fills my life with joy.
I have met so many before her, but she is the one.
target: ده انا شوفت كتير قبلها ورسيت على ديه

source: Her eyelashes enchant me, and her laugh is sassy.
target: دي رموش العين تقتل والضحكه شقيه

source: She is be the prettiest girl wherever she goes.
target: وفي اي مكان هيا تكون احلى صبيه

source: No matter how hard I try, I do not have the words to describe her.
When her body moves, the whole world moves with her.
target: ده قوامها يميل القى الدنيا دارت بيا

source: Oh my heart! Have you fallen in love or what?
I long for her, think of her all the time
And usually I am not like this.
Why do I worry about her and miss her?
She is often on my mind and always in my thoughts.
target: بقي يجي كتير في بالي ولا بيفارق خيالي

source: Oh my heart, how can we solve this riddle?
I am not the same as the day I met her.
I do not imagine things.
When I see her eyes I forget everything.
Oh her heart, please tell her my heart is crazy for her.
Oh, the passion in your eyes.
target: اه من الهوى اللي في عينيكي

source: Your eyes enchanted me at once.
Oh my heart, oh my love, our love has begun.
target: يا قلبي يا عمري يا من الغرام اللي بينا ابتدى

source: Oh my heart, oh my love, no one can love this much.
target: يا قلبي يا شوقي يا مستحيل حد يعشق كده

source: Who is like her in my life?
Oh, you are my whole life.
My heart chose you and sang your praises.
target: قلبي ده شاور عليكي وغنى هوى

source: Oh her charm, her beauty, no one is like her.
target: يا سحرها ضيها هو في زيها

source: Oh her smile and her charm.
No other love can replace yours.
I swear there is a void in my heart, my love.
target: سبت فراغ كبير عندي والله حبيبي

source: You are far away, but not far from my heart.
target: وانت هناك بعيد مش بعيد عني حبيبي

source: Tell me how to live!
Every day I wonder when you will return to me.
target: كل يوم بقول امتي ترجع ليا

source: Life is so hard.
It is so hard without me and you together.
So many memories of you and me haunt me every day.
They remind me of you and the beautiful years in my life.
target: بتفكرني بيك وبسنين حلوة في حياتي

source: Even though you have been gone for years, your smile is the spark in my eyes.
target: مهما غبت سنين عن عيني ابتسمتك ضي عيني

source: My love, my soul will not be revived if you are not by my side.
target: روحي مش ممكن هترجع الا بوجودك حبيبي

source: I have so much I want to say to you when we are together.
target: عندي كلام كتير نفسي اقوله وانت معايا

source: I found love only with you, so what?
What's wrong with me?
Every day I talk of nothing but the life we once had together after many years of waiting.
target: كل يوم مافيش عندي سيرة غير حياتنا واللي فرحنا بيه بعد ما الفرح فاتنا

source: Without you I am dying, although I am actually still alive.
target: من غيرك بأموت واسمي عايش حد تاني

source: I cry silently in the midst of my endless wishes.
target: بأبكي من غير صوت وسط دوامة الأماني

source: Yes. No one is like you.
You cannot believe that! Words cannot describe you.
Every bright day ends with night, except for me: my night is bright because of you.
target: كل نهار نهايته ليل إلا ليلي نهار

source: No heart is like yours.
Yes! Your love is the only love for me.
Your love always makes my heart confused.
target: ياللي حبك خلي قلبي بين ايديك يحتار

source: I am so in love with you.
Your heart is so tender.
Whenever I meet you
Your love shows up at once.
Oh! You have such a wonderful feeling.
It is a real feeling.
Do you still ask why I love you, though you already know my answer? You are different from all the others.
target: لسه بتسأل ليه بحبك مع إنك عارف هأقولك هما حاجة وأنت حاجة

source: You are so different from everyone else.
Darling, all I dreamed of I found when you came and filled my life with love.
target: كل حاجه حلمت بيها النهارده انا شوفتها لما جيت ومليت حياتي يا حبيبي

source: I wished for a sweet life, I lived a sweeter one with you.
target: كان في بالي دنيا حلوة عشت أجمل منها

source: I want to call you a word more precious than "my love".
target: نفسي اقولك كلمه اغلي من حبيبي

source: Let us stay alone, forget all people.
Let us forget all people.
Let us live in our own heaven with our feelings.
Let us make it our heaven.
Let us stay alone together forever.
My heart sighed with relief with you and in a blink of an eye believed in my love.
It found with you a love and security it never dreamed of before.
target: شاف معاك حب وامان محلمش بيه

source: I feel at ease when I talk to you.
Whoever knows you, loves you.
So imagine what your lover would feel for you!
target: أمال اللي يكون حبيبك يعمل ايه؟

source: I heard every love word you said to me.
target: كل كلمة حب منك اتقالت لي سمعتها

source: You calmed me down and made me happy.
Whoever tastes your love will know they have lost so much time without you by their side.
target: ده اللي جرب حبك انت كان هيعرف وقتها اللي ضاع من عمره وانت مش معاه

source: The days go by and I say, "I have finally forgotten her love," but actually I have not forgotten her.
target: تفوت سنين واقول نسيت خلاص هواه وانا ولا بنساه

source: When I see her photo, I miss my life with her.
You always come back to my mind and I remember the past.
target: عمال بتيجي في بالي وبفتكر اللي فات

source: The time spent with you is relived in many memories of us.
target: والعمر يعدي قصادي ويتعاد في حكايات

source: And they are only memories.
I get lost in an old photo of us holding hands.
target: سرحت فيه في صوره لينا من زمان وانا ماسك ايديه

source: I say to myself, "This is life, what can we do?"
target: وقولت لنفسي دي الدنيا هنعمل ايه؟

source: No matter what you say or do, there's no going back.
The past is long gone.
To comfort myself, I have to say, "That's in the past".
target: بقيت مضطر أقول ذكرى عشان ارتاح

source: Can you please answer me?
What are you doing to me?
It's a feeling I have never felt before, except with you.
target: احساس عمري ما حسيت بيه غير وانا وياك

source: You become more beautiful every day. I can not resist those eyes.
target: عمال تحلي واقول انا مش قد عيونك دول

source: Is they real?
No, they can not be.
I do not have the words to describe them.
Are you happy now?
You stole my heart without me paying attention.
I fell head over heels in love with you just by a kind look.
I wish you could be with me.
That would be the way I have been waiting for.
If longing has limits, my longing for you has no limits.
target: الاشواق لو ليها حدود انا شوقي ليك دايما موجود

source: My heart has a date with your love.
It is always calling your name.
You are more beautiful than the moon that people think is the most beautiful thing there is
target: القمر اللي الناس شايفاه  أجمل حاجة في دنيتنا صدقني جمالك عداه

source: It is only a passing night.
It is just one night.
No more pain.
You have no equal in the world
No way for me to fall in love with someone else
target: ماهو صعب ومستحيل أعشق واحب واميل

source: Is it possible to cheat on you?
We will have so many happy moments.
Even the past is gone.
Now all I want is you.
Your soul is the most beautiful thing about you.
Your heart is an open book.
From this moment no one is allowed to look at you anymore.
target: دلوقتى مش مسموح بحد يبص ليكى

source: I say no more about me, my longing and my anguish.
target: مبقتش اتكلم عن نفسي ولا عن اشواقي وتعذيبي

source: When I hear your name, I no longer say "She is my love."
target: وان جات سيرتك قدام مني مبقتش بقول اه ده حبيبي

source: I am no longer moved when I hear your name.
I no longer think of you either.
I no longer mourn our memories, and you are no longer the same for me.
target: ولا علي ايامك بتحسر ولا زي زمان بالنسبالي

source: Yes, I have changed.
Nothing in life stays the same.
target: مفيش حاجة في الدنيا بتفضل على حالها

source: I do not want to belittle you.
I may not long for such days.
I will never go back to someone who left me.
target: اللي بيخرج بره حياتي ده لا يمكن ابدا ارجعله

source: You are no longer on my mind.
No matter what they say, I never listen.
In the end, all I care about is my well-being.
I do not want to lose my life.
I want to live comfortably with someone I dreamed about.
target: انا عايز اعيش فيها براحتي مع حد كان من احلامي

source: She was everything and the most valuable person for me.
She was supposedly "my love."
She was with me, the light of my life and I thought she was my destiny.
target: كان بين ايديا نور عينيا و انا فكرته نصيبى

source: My soul was so fond of her.
My heart and my whole life belonged to her.
She was my life, but oh dear!
It turned out that she was not my love.
I lost my heart unintentionally.
It left me and went to her.
Why should I love her when she does not think of me?
target: ليه خلانى احبه هو و قلبه عايش لاحبابه

source: Why should I feel safe with her?
After all that she lost me.
target: بعد ده كله سابنى اروح من ايده

source: If she had loved me, she would have embraced me and not let me drink from the cup of torment.
target: لو حبنى كان ضمنى و مكنش سقانى عذابه

source: In the hour of parting, do not blame anyone for what they say.
target: ساعة الفراق ماتلومش حد على اللى قالة

source: Just a few words to make the wound bearable.
target: واهو كلمتين بيهونو الجرح اللى فينا

source: Then everyone goes their way.
We cannot always get what we wish for.
target: مش كل حاجة نعوزها نلقاها فى ايدينا

source: Whenever we say, "we will forget someday, the breakup is no big deal," time passes and we never forget.
target: كل ما بنقول هننسى والفراق ميهمناش نفترق وتعدي فترة واحنا لسه مانسيناش

source: Everyone regrets a word said and wishes they could take it back.
target: كل واحد قال كلمة قال يارتنى ماقولتهاش

source: Who in the world can know where their decisions will take them?
target: فى الدنيا مين يعرف نهاية اختيارة

source: There are many things that we intentionally ignore. We see them only when time passes and when we no longer care about each other.
target: في حاجات كتير تبقى غايبة عن عنينا بنشوفها لما الحب بينا بتهدى نارة ولما كل حاجة حلوة تهون علينا

source: This beauty is not new for you.
It is new for me.
When I realized that my soul needed you,
I said, "I hope she will be mine."
I saw a masterpiece of beauty.
It is true, not a compliment.
My opinion of you was formulated in one sentence.
target: راى فيك انا قلته فى جملة

source: Oh! I hope you will become mine.
It is my wish.
That I hope you will make come true.
I want you to be all mine.
Come baby, let us live for today!
Let us refresh our hearts with a new love as if we just met!
target: نجدد تانى احساسنا بحب جديد كاننا لسه متقابلين

source: Let time take us to another world!
Let us live together in a dream state!
target: ونعيش انا و انت حالة من اللى فى الحكايات

source: Let us return to the old beginning!
Let us live for today!
Let us reminisce with our good memories!
target: نفكر بعضنا بأيام وذكرى حلوة عشناها أنا وأنت

source: A love song, Oh My!, that describes us when life brought us together
target: وغنوة حب اه يا سلام بتوصف حالنا لما الدنيا جمعتنا

source: I am not selfish.
I let you live freely without me.
I have waited for you for years and stopped.
Do not blame me for having someone new in my life now.
target: متجيش تلومني ان النهارده بقى في حياتي حد تاني

source: Why should I wait so long for you?
target: كنت هفضل كل ده مستني ايه؟

source: What love are you looking for?
target: حب إيه اللي أنت بتدور عليه

source: After this absence I am no longer moved by reproach.
target: بعد الغياب ده مفيش عتاب اتهز ليه

source: And you know what?
Because someone else has taken your place, you are jealous and desperate.
target: علشان مكانك اتملى عينيك وقلبك غيرانين وبقيت في ضيقة

source: Forget about me if you still remember me.
You have got a million ways to go.
Our days are over.
That is all I can say.
My heart will never forget its pain and wounds.
target: ولا ينسى قلبي بكلمتين تعبة وجراحه

source: Who told you that life stops when our lovers leave?
target: مين اللي قالك الحياه وقفت في يوم على اللي راحوا

source: Our love story will begin.
Your eyes have spoken to me.
The signs of love have made themselves felt in you.
Let us get straight to the point.
What you need to know is that I swore not to fall in love.
target: واللي انت لازم تعرفه انا قلبي كنت محلفه لا يحب ولا يهواه

source: I saw you and forgot all about.
target: شفتك نسيت انا كل ده ومشيت عينيا مغمضة

source: Where is your beautiful mind taking me?
target: على فين واخدني معاك كده مع روحك الحلوة

source: Why waste time?
Who can stop this love?
Our longing for each other defeats us.
It is a long journey. We have begun the path.
We will walk it together.
How can life become beautiful if not through the love in our hearts?
target: والعمر ايه هيجمله غير كلمة في قلوبنا

source: All that I have dreamed of is now before my eyes.
target: قدام عينيا اللي أنا حلمت بيه

source: She has changed my perspective of life.
target: هو اللي غير في عيني الحياه

source: When my heart took hold of her, I felt like a long lost love.
target: اول ما قلبي شاورلي عليه حسيت كانه ما صدق لاقاه

source: Her beauty is unsurpassed.
Is she real? Oh my God!
My heart was alone. When I saw her eyes I was lost.
target: انا قلبي كان في حاله شاف عيونه تاه

source: I pray to God that I may spend my whole life with her.
Who can say a word before your eyes?
target: مين ده اللي يقدر يقول كلمتين

source: Before these eyes words are missing
I search for words and practice them twice.
She smiles at me, and immediately all words are gone as if by the wind.
I have always wished to be with you.
I have dreamed of living my life with you, my love.
target: وحلمت اني اعيش يا حبيبي حياتي معاك

source: And we will move away and forget the whole world
We will forget the whole world when we are together.
I know now what it means to be alive, for you are here with me, my love.
I am having the best days of my life when we are together.
I have thought a lot about my life.
If I do not live it with you, my love, with whom?
target: لو مش هعيشها معاك يا حبيبي هعيشها لمين

source: I can not imagine my life without you. It would be worthless
O apple of my eyes, you illuminate my whole life.
target: ده انت وجودك ماليها يا نور العين

source: I have seen my life with you as in a dream.
target: خليتني اشوف الدنيا معاك ولا في الاحلام

source: My love, you taught my heart how to love.
target: علمت قلبي يقول يا حبيبي ارق كلام

source: I have a hundred proofs of my love for you.
Take, for example, my longing for you, as I sometimes cannot hide it, and my eyes say it all.
target: شوقي مثلا بان في عيني ساعات

source: I also worry and am often jealous.
There are so many other examples.
When someone mentions you, I speak up for you, but of course I do not reveal all the good things that can be said about you.
target: وإن سيرتك جات بنطق بالخير وطبعاً خدت منه حاجات

source: I also like to hear the details of how you cope with life.
target: واخبارك مع التفاصيل احب اسمعها بالتفصيل

source: As long as someone brings up a topic that relates to you, I do not mind talking about you all night.
target: مادام اتفحت السيرة اخد وادي لنص الليل

source: Loving you makes every day brand new.
target: في حبك كل يوم فيه جديد

source: When I miss you while you are away, I just think about you and feel like you are near me.
target: ولو توحشني وأنت بعيد بالإحساس بنتلاقى

source: I do not worry about the time.
If you want me to say what I want I could talk endlessly.
You can see it for yourself.
There are words that you can say directly, and there are others that you can convey through feelings. These words immediately find their way to your heart.
target: في كلام عادي يتقال للناس وكلام أجمل يتقال إحساس بيوصل للقلوب على طول

source: I am not sad when I think about you.
When I reflect on our history, I see that this relationship was not promising to continue.
target: بلاقي كل أما أتأمل ماضينا ماكنش فيه حاجة تقول إن احنا حنكمل

source: We were always opposite lovers.
Tell me, when did we ever see eye to eye?
If there is one thing in common between us, it is the decision to separate from each other.
target: ده احنا لو نشبه لبعض فالشبه يمكن فراقنا !!

source: We have moved further and further away from each other instead of getting closer. We have neglected our love and therefore love has failed us.
target: بعدنا أكتر ما قربنا وسيبنا الحب وأهو سابنا

source: Now when we tell our story, we either improvise or try to improve the details.
target: وأما بنحكي حكايتنا يا بنزود يا بنجمل

source: When we first met, you made me believe that our life together will be happy.
target: رسمتلي صورة للجنة في أول مرة نتلاقى

source: I walked this path willingly and contentedly with you, but in the end I felt lost and confused.
target: مشيت وياك بطيب خاطر لقيتني في حيرة ومتاهة

source: In your presence I have known loneliness.
In your arms I felt far from home.
Now when I hear about love, I become afraid and run away.
target: وسيرة الحب لو تيجي بقيت منها بخاف وأهرب

source: We will never be together again.
Those days are behind me.
I have grown weary of this story.
If there is anything about you that I once loved, I can no longer recognize it.
target: وإن كان فيك حاجة انا حبيتها دلوقتي بقيت انا مابشوفهاش

source: I have wasted my life with you.
I regret subjecting myself to this suffering. I thought I had finally found the solace I was looking for with you.
target: وماخدتش منها غير تعبي بعد أما لقيت راحة قلبي

source: If you ask me to come back now, I will not.
We will never be together again, I will never love you as I did long ago.
target: عمرنا ما حنرجع زي زمان ولا حقدر أحبك زي زمان

source: You have always seen me as a saint, but I am only human.
target: أنت اتعودت تشوفني ملاك بس أنا في الاخر انسان

source: There is no point in reminiscing about our past.
As if that past was a happy one!
target: قال يعني الماضي دا كان جنة

source: I certainly had good days with you, but the hard ones outweigh them.
target: أنا كان ليا معاك أيام حلوة بس الأيام الصعبة كتير

source: There are moments in life that should not be reenacted or relived.
target: في حاجات في حياتنا لا بنعيدها ولا ينفع تاني نجددها

source: How incredibly different my feelings are now!
In my eyes, you are the most beautiful. But tonight you are magical.
target: كل مادى بتحلو في عيني بس أحلى وأحلى الليلة ياه على السحر داه

source: My love, my heart becomes more and more jealous.
target: يا روحي أنا زادت في قلبي الغيرة

source: My darling, come close to me!
All eyes are on you tonight! You who have dazzled me.
target: عليك كل العيون الليلة ياللي يللي مجننا

source: A new day has dawned, and I know that life with you, my darling, will be beautiful.
target: يومي هيبتدي معاك وهتبقى دنيا جميلة يا حبيبي

source: Forget about everything else. Lose yourself in my arms tonight, my darling. You dazzle me.
target: انسى الدنيا دي وسيب روحك في حضني الليلة ياللي مجننا

source: We have decided to separate from each other.
target: أنا وأنت أخترنا إننا نبعد عن بعض

source: So there is no reason to reveal our vulnerability in front of other people.
target: خلاص يبقى مالوش لزمة يبان ضعفي وضعفك للناس

source: If someone asks you about me, you would better tell them that I was once your love, and I'll prove to them in my own way that we are over.
target: وياريت اللي يجيبلك سيرتي قول كان حبيبي وأنا هثبت ليهم بطريقتي إن الحكاية خلاص

source: That is alright. Our story is over, just like any other love story.
target: عادي أهي خلصت زي ما كل حكاية بتخلص

source: What would happen if we did not stay together?
target: إيه اللي هيجري وإيه اللي هينقص منا لو ماكملناش؟

source: I will get used to it and you have to do the same.
target: أنا هتعود وأنت كمان لازم تتعود

source: A breakup never killed anyone.
After all, life must go on.
My love, I will not forget you.
I will never forget you or the beautiful days I had with you.
target: عمري ما هنساك ولا هنسى الأيام الحلوة اللي كانت وياك

source: But life will eventually keep us on our toes and we will stay apart.
I just want you to know that even though I am leaving you, you still have my heart.
target: أنا عايزك بس تكون عارف ببعد وقلبي معاك

source: You are back asking about the love we once had, wondering why we did not stay together.
target: راجع بتقولي اللي ما بينا وبتسأل ليه ماكملناش

source: Ask yourself who is the one who stayed faithful and who is the one who just left.
target: أسأل روحك مين استنى ومين استغنى وباع ببلاش

source: There is no point in answering your questions.
You were confused and lost me.
It is a pity that the things we wish for happen when we no longer need them.
target: يا خسارة بتيجي الحاجة لما الواحد مايعوزهاش

source: I can not forget your cold and cruel words when we said goodbye.
target: مش ناسي كلامك في وداعنا ولا قسوة قلبك وعينيك

source: I begged you to stay with me.
You did not hesitate to leave me. It was so easy for you to leave me.
Now you pretend not to be aware of your cruelty and ask me what changed me!
target: بقى مش عارف إيه غيرني يا برئ يا حنين يا ملاك

source: I am leaving because you have made my wounds fresh again.
target: حبعد علشان بتفكرني بالجرح اللي أنا عشته معاك

source: I have a talent for recognizing what is most beautiful in a woman.
target: أنا ليا نظرة أعرف بيها الواحدة إيه أحلى ما فيها

source: I had this idea and then you came and changed everything for me.
Your influence does not surprise me, because everything about you is beautiful.
target: ما هي كل حاجة فيكي جميلة

source: My darling knows how to walk like a woman, and when she does, she turns my world upside down.
target: حبيبتي لما بتتمايل خطوتها بتسوي هوايل

source: She makes my heart melt
Oh darling, your beauty is divinely natural. I would love to sing you a love song.
target: ياللي جمالك رباني بحب أغازلك باغاني

source: Oh darling, your beauty is divinely natural. I can not help but praise you.
target: ياللي جمالك ربانى بحب أقول فيكي اغاني

source: Your name is the sweetest word I have ever spoken. I can talk all day about how much I love you.
target: يا أحلى كلمة على لساني غير حبك أنتي مليش سيرة

source: Your beauty has captivated me so quickly.
target: عودك طرح قبل أوانه جمل حياتي بألوانه

source: You can tell a book by its cover.
When I look into your eyes I become helpless.
My darling, I have a request for you.
Remember our sweet nights of love!
I miss the old days.
Would you swear by all you hold dear that you will try to take me back to the best days of our lives?
target: حلفتك بيا وبالغالي رجعني أعيش أحلى ليالي

source: I cannot stop thinking about them.
It goes without saying.
I spend long sleepless nights longing for you. I always think of you and wonder when you will come back to me.
target: الشوق خلى ليلي يطول وبفتكرك ودايما أقول حترجع تاني

source: It just can not be that one day I can just forget you and you can just forget me.
target: مش معقول في يوم أنساك وتنساني

source: I still talk about you.
I was never convinced that our love story was over.
Even in the most difficult times, I miss our moments together the most.
target: وحتى في أصعب الأوقات بقول أيامنا واحشاني

source: Life always manages to keep us on our toes.
I really miss your eyes. I dream of seeing you and telling you everything.
target: وعيوني قربك مشتاقة نتلاقى ونقول ونعيد

source: Forgetting you takes incredible strength, but as always, I can not resist you.
target: نسيانك ده عايزله إرادة وأنا قلبي بيضعف كالعادة

source: It loves you even more.
I have promised to be your heart and soul.
target: وعدتك إني أبقى لك وأقدم عمري من قلبي

source: You will always be my heart compass. I feel safe because you are here with me.
target: وروحي تملي ريحالك وبطمن عشان جنبي

source: It is enough for me to embrace you.
It is enough that your eyes are calling me.
I love my life with you. I wish for no other lover.
target: أنا حابب حياتي معاك ولا عايز حبيب تاني

source: You are my love that means more to me than my life.
From our first conversation I knew that I had found the happiness of my life.
target: ومن أول كلام بينا عرفت إن لقيت عمري وشوفت الدنيا دي جنة

source: Her body is a miracle.
The moment she enters, the room lights up.
She has a stunning look that does me a lot of good.
target: ليها طلة يعلم الله عاملة إيه فيا

source: Oh my! Oh no! She's driving me crazy.
target: ويلي يا ويلي عيني يا ليلي ناوية تجنني

source: Oh, my! You are such a wonder!
Dream and wish!
Give me a break! You drive me crazy.
target: على مهلك ياللي ناوية تخلي عقلي يروح مني

source: If you know what has happened to me since I saw you, you will have mercy on me.
target: لو تعرفي مالي واللي جرالي ترحمي وتحني

source: Honestly, I challenge you to look me in the eye and tell me if there is a girl as beautiful as you!
target: طب بيني وبينك عيني في عينك مين في حلاوتك مين؟

source: The moment I saw you, you took my breath away.
target: أنا شفت جمالك قلبي ندالك ياللي خطفتي العين

source: Tell me, my love, why I long for you more when you are away, and when you come, my heart sighs with relief.
target: قولى يا حبيبى ليه وانت عنى بعيد انا شوقى ليك بيزيد وان جيت انا برتاح

source: Tell me, my love, what has changed me and how do you make me forget a whole life spent before you?
target: قولى يا حبيبى ايه اللى غيرنى وازاى بتشغلنى عن عمر قبلك راح

source: You have my heart and please do not go away.
I miss you every day.
You have my heart I swear I will never forget you.
I have no one but you, my sweetest angel.
target: مليش غيرك حبيب قلبى يا احلى ملاك

source: My best days and years I either spend by your side or never.
target: احلى ايامى واجمل سنين تتعاش جنبك يا اما بلاش

source: Who else would I wish for?
You have my word.
No one can replace your love.
My life began with your love.
I found comfort in your love.
You sing a note of deprivation, complaining and exaggerating
target: ماسكلي ف نغمة الحرمان وعمال تشكي وتهول

source: You did not care what you had long ago or the sweet love at first
target: لا فرق اللي انت شوفته زمان ولا الحلو اللي ف الاول

source: Did I hurt you?
How can that be when you can hurt millions of people?
What is wrong with you?
Do you think you have control over me?
I will leave you and lose you forever
You almost killed me.
That is it. Goodbye!
We will stay apart forever.
I have heard a lot about love and devotion, I am used to it.
target: كلام ع الحب والاخلاص سمعته كتير ومتعود

source: Those words are meaningless now.
They do not matter anymore.
We find our comfort in strangers and not in our lovers.
target: نلقي راحتنا ويا الغرب و مش ويا حبايبنا

source: My heart, you have not been comfortable in her presence.
We feel more at ease when she is away.
Are we lovers?
Are we?
Because of people, we must continue to live together, even though we no longer care for each other.
target: عشان الشكل مضطرين نكمل والحياة تمشي لكن مع بعض مش فارقين

source: We walk hand in hand, and we smile in front of people so as not to spoil the image, so that they believe our feeling.
target: بنمشي الايد في حضن الايد ونتبسم قصاد الناس عشان مانهزش الصورة عشان يتصدق الاحساس

source: My heart, we have been offered a million solutions, but we are still the same.
target: قالولنا يا قلبي مليون حل لكن لسه على حالنا

source: Our love is decreasing day by day and we never run out of excuses.
target: وحبنا كل يوم بيقل ومش بتقل اعذارنا

source: How can anything in the world force us to do something we do not love?
target: وايه في الدنيا يجبرنا على حاجة ماحبيناهاش

source: If it is a mistake we have made, it is definitely a mistake we did not intend to make.
target: لو الغلطة اننا اختارنا دي غلطة اكيد مانقصدهاش

source: You are the most beautiful thing in my life. I want to tell you about my feelings, my longing and my love.
target: يا احلي حاجة في عمري انا نفسي احكيلك عن احساسي عن اشواقي عن حبي

source: I want to talk about my whole new world that began when I met you.
target: واعبر عن الحب اللي جوايا ودنيا جديد وحكاية مجرد انى صادفتك

source: Since I saw and knew you, I have forgotten myself in a life full of hope.
target: ومن ساعة ما انا شفتك ده من ساعة ما انا عرفتك نسيت نفسي في دنيا كلها اماني

source: Give me back my long lost life. Your love revived my soul.
target: رجعلي عمري المنسي وليل الحب صحاني

source: I stayed up nights of love.
The longing for your love drives me crazy, keeps me awake and makes me drown more and more in love, longing, life and love.
target: وحنين الشوق في حبك مدوبني مسهرني مخليني ادوب واعشق واعيش واعشق

source: No one before or after you has made my life a heaven on earth.
target: ولا قبلك ولا بعدك موريني الحياة جنة

source: Your most beautiful eyes have kept the lovers awake.
target: يا اجمل عيون واحلى عيون  صحيتي ليل العاشقين

source: You unexpectedly awakened my longing. Then why did you go away?
target: صحيتي الشوق من غير معاد  وسافرتي ليه اخر البلاد

source: I swear I will love you like crazy. I love Pisces women. I love your details, for you are my world.
target: والله لحبك موت واحب برج الحوت واعشق تفاصيلك لانك الدنيا

source: I do not care about anyone else. Your eyes are like a sea of stars.
target: واللي يفوت يفوت ياللي انتي عيونك بحر ليل ونهار

source: My heart is mesmerized, lost in your eyes.
The sound of your voice is life. I love it, and its echo is music to my ears.
target: يا صوت نبرته حياه حبيته وعشقت صداه

source: I belong to you with your angelic, sweet voice.
target: انا ليكي ياللي انتي  صوتك عذب وملائكي

source: Your whispers and laughter quench my thirsty soul.
target: همسات صوتك، ضحكتك، تروي عطش روحي

source: The look in your eyes is inspiring, and you are the cure for my wounds.
target: نظرة عيونك ملهمة وانتي دوا جروحي

source: You are my first in everything.
target: أنت أول كل حاجة والبداية في كل شيء

source: I first met your love when I still had an innocent heart.
target: حب اول مرة يجي لما قلبي كان برئ

source: You are the beginning of everything.
You are now what you were.
You are the first person to leave me and for whom I cry.
target: وانت اول حد يمشي ودمعتي تنزل عليه

source: You were the first one I had feelings for.
target: كنت أول كل حاجة بتجري ليا

source: You were the first who touched my heart.
target: كنت أول روح بتلمس حاجة فيا

source: You were the first love that I hoped would last.
target: كنت اول حب يجي ونفسي يفضل

source: You were the first joy I wished would last.
You were the first to hold her image in my mind.
target: كنت أول حد بأرسم صورة ليه

source: You were the first who made me know my worth.
target: كنت أكتر حد بعرف قيمتي بيه

source: You were the life for me. You were my future.
You are my life, but for you I was only a fleeting thought.
target: كنت عمري بس ليك انا كنت فترة

source: If only we knew from the beginning what the end would be, we would never make the wrong decision.
target: اللي يعرف م البداية النهاية هتبقى فين مش هيغلط ف اختياره

source: But how can we know?
You were the last person I trusted.
Tell me who else I could trust!
I do not think I will ever love again.
It is hard to be wrong twice.
Your greetings are as kind as if you were a rose in my hands.
target: سلامك كله حنية كانك وردة في ايديا

source: Your words are sweet.
Even your laughter is full of emotion.
You are still innocent.
You are more beautiful than I can ever imagine.
target: قمر إيه فوق ما أنا أتصور

source: My heart has been searching for you for a long time.
Your eyes are like the bright sun.
When you close your eyes, my night comes.
When you open them, my morning begins.
You are a gift from heaven that beautifies my life.
target: هدية من السما جاية تحلي دنيتي عليا

source: I swear the more I know you, the more beautiful you become in my eyes.
target: شهادة حق كل مابعرفك اكتر تزيدي حلاوة في عنيا

source: Only my beloved is enough for me.
I do not want to live except with her.
target: ولا عايز اعيش غير وانا وياه

source: My life brightens when she comes, and I feel the relief of my heart with her.
target: الدنيا بتحلى اما يجيني وبحس براحة قلبي معاه

source: She is my love, and let me say it again, she has the most beautiful name.
How beautiful her name is when you say it!
They asked me about you, I said she is my love.
Why are you hiding or afraid?
target: وانا يعني هداري واخاف من ايه

source: I swear by you, my eyes told everything.
target: وحياتك عندي لقيت عيني قالت على كل اللي مخبيه

source: If you are with me, my love, I always say, God willing, you will be mine.
target: وانت ويايا ياما قولت انشالله ياحبيبي تبقى ليا

source: My heart has longed for her.
Of all things, she spoke to my heart and came to me. My heart has longed for her
target: من بين الدنيا بحالها نداله وجاله

source: Her beauty is incomparable.
target: اهو ده اللي مفيش اتنين في جماله

source: Who can think of anything else in her presence?
target: مين يبقي معاه كل ده ويفكر او يشغل باله بناس وحياة

source: I will never forget her.
This is a promise and a word of honor.
My love, as long as you are with me and in my life, my love, I forget myself.
target: طول مانت معايا وف حياتي يا حبيبي بنسى روحي

source: I live in a story that begins with the word "my love".
target: وبعيش ف حكاية بتبتدي بكلمة حبيبي يا حبيبي

source: My life has become so sweet that it slips through my fingers.
target: والقى عمري من حلاوته بيجري بيا

source: When we are together I have found what I have wanted for my life.
target: وأنا جنب حبيبي اللي انا بتمناه ف عمري لقيته معاه

source: When we are together I am so happy I sing your praises.
target: وأنا جنب حبيبي طاير من الفرحة وكلامي بيبقى غنى

source: I talk about my joy.
Darling, my eyes tell you everything.
You know what you are to me.
target: أنت عارف أنت إيه بالنسبة ليا

source: I found my happiness the day we met, my love.
target: الحب ندالي والسعادة اللي في خيالي يا حبيبي يوم لقانا شوفتها بتنده عليا

source: You surpass all people with your feelings and the gentleness in your eyes.
target: معدي الناس باحساسك وبالرقة اللي جوة عينيك

source: I never close my eyes when you are by my side.
target: وعيني عليك يا روح قلبي مغمضهاش

source: You have finally managed to change me.
The best in me shows in your love.
target: واحلى ما فيا بان في هواك

source: My life with you must be lived to the last breath.
target: حياتي معاك لاخر يوم لازم تتعاش

source: Your voice is soft when you speak.
You take my soul to another world.
target: بتاخد روحي من روحي لدنيا بعيد

source: I feel relief and comfort.
Things become more beautiful when I am by your side.
target: وبعنيا بشوف الحاجة وانا جنبك جمالها يزيد

source: My love, you are the world to me, you are everything to me, wherever I am.
target: حبيبي انت اللي بالدنيا ومالي عينيا فين ما بكون

source: Nothing more beautiful my heart can wish for.
You made my life better.
You entered my life and painted it with the most beautiful colors.
When you are with me, I do not care about people.
I feel so much better with you.
When you are with me, I see you as the most beautiful person.
This is a truth that no one can change.
It seems I have fallen in love.
Yes, I have fallen in love.
I love the life that always smiles at me with you.
target: حبيت الدنيا اللي بتضحكلي معاك علي طول

source: I see the joy in your eyes that makes me confess my love to you.
target: وبشوف في عينيك الفرحة اللي تخليني بقول

source: I am sure I can only live with you, what can I say?
target: اتاكدت ان انا مقدرش اعيش غير وانا وياك

source: What can I say?
Not a second goes by without me missing you.
I have found my comfort with you.
What can I call it?
Sarcastically, she regretted it
This is the same old story.
What I said the day we parted will shock you if you know what it was.
target: ده انا اللي قولته على يوم بعدنا لو جه في خيالك تتصدم

source: Be nice, lady! Do not accuse me, say bad things and call me names!
target: مثل يا طيب ولوم في طبعي واغلط وعيب

source: I have only one thing to say to you, but how can I say it?
target: ملكش عندي غير كلمة واحدة بس اقولها ازاي دي طيب

source: She sarcastically claims that she is the one who left me.
Say that I was lured instead.
She blinded my heart, deceived me, and when my mind realized it, it saved me from her.
target: غمالي قلبي وضحك عليا ولما عقلي فتح نجدني

source: You are so sure about your feelings.
It is just between you and yourself.
You have your whole life ahead of you.
Make mistakes and try again and again. That's not my story anymore.
target: اغلط وجرب واي حسبة خرجني منها

source: Oh dear! You are sorry and you think I am the same old person!
target: قال اية راجع ندمان وفاكرني زي زمان

source: Oh dear! After living freely, she comes to me and says "our old love."
target: قال بعد ما عاش حياتة بيقولي كان ياما كان

source: Oh sweet angel, oh enchanting smile, you deserve to have stories told about you.
target: يا ملاك الحسن والفتنة، يا جمال الضحكة ديا، يتقال عليكي حكايات

source: O sweet little angel, you shake my world and enchant my heart.
target: يا براءة يا ملاك العيون، هزي الأرض هز واسحري كل العيون

source: With all your pride and shine you painted my life with all colors.
target: يا اللي كلك كبرياء وهيبه بسم الله وعز دنيتي بقا ليها لون

source: Days when I have to stay up late are sweetened by your overwhelming beauty.
target: يا اللي صحيتي الجنون حلي ايام السهر

source: You are the most beautiful thing there is
Your beauty shines as if the moon smiles at me, you are like no other.
target: يا ابتسامات القمر انتي زيك مين

source: Beauty is born from you.
Your beauty is beyond imagination.
It is a magical comforting beauty.
target: حاجة من فوق الخيال حسن طاغي في الهداوة

source: You are gentler than a breeze and more beautiful than all fantasies. I swear you are different from all other people
target: يا أرق من النسيم وأحلي من كل الصور أنت والله العظيم غير كل البشر

source: Can you laugh and greet just like that?
Can you behave normally?
O God! What a shame!
I have lived with you in pain.
I always say no human is perfect, but you are strange!
target: وبقول مفيش انسان كامل بس انت غريب

source: You are arrogant.
You are insensitive.
You are like ornaments, just decoration. May God help anyone who lives with you. What is arrogant?!
target: انت زي الزينة ديكور واللي عاشرك معذور

source: I am not like you.
I do not pretend.
I will neither long for you nor take you into consideration.
I am a closed door.
Being far away sometimes makes it easier.
I am not so close anymore. At last!
This is incredible!
You were just in my thoughts.
target: لسه انت كنت في بالي حالا من مفيش

source: After I left you, are things going well now, or is life not so good anymore?
target: من بعدي عايش ولا مش عارف تعيش

source: I left you a long time ago, but I have the feeling that you did not leave me.
target: ده انا من كتير سيبتك وحاسس انك انت ماسبتنيش

source: I do not care who left the other one.
target: مايهمنيش مين اللي سايب فينا مين

source: I am not as well as you
How can I be well after leaving you?
I cannot accept that I have lost you.
target: فكرة انك رحت مني مش قابلها

source: Even if you said that you have forgotten me, I would not take into account what I have heard from you.
target: ده انت لو هتقول نسيت واسمعها منك برضه هعتبرك كانك مش قايلها

source: Many people have said that I do not care about myself, but I only care about you.
target: في ناس كتيرة قالوا عني بهمل نفسي وانا بهتم بيك

source: I am lost in your absence.
I continue to look for you.
You are the enchanting moon in my eyes. We are enraptured by your glorious light.
target: يا ساحر عينيك قمر طالع طالل علينا

source: You are the only one my eyes long for, have mercy!
target: يامزغلل عيوني انا بالذات حرام عليك

source: Ever since we first met, I have been in love with you.
target: ومعلقني بيك من اول مرة اتلاقينا

source: I spent the nights awake. May you never experience such torment.
target: وسهرت الليالي الله الله لا يوريك

source: This is too much for me.
Keep a little peace!
What will you do later?
Remain normally calm in my presence, do not push it.
target: خليك في الهادي العادي قصادي مش للدرجة دي

source: I saw you and saw nothing else
I wondered who I would live with?
In a second I found the comfort that fulfilled my dreams.
target: وفي ثانيه لقيت اللي يعوضني وحققلي مرادي

source: Sometimes you see a laugh you give in to.
It draws you towards it.
There are eyes that soothe you.
My heart has calmed since I met you.
This is the happiness I have dreamed of all the years of my life.
target: هي دي السعادة الي بحلم سنين الاقيها

source: I'll think of all the years before you as a life gone by.
target: هعتبر اللي قبلك نسيته وعدي وراح

source: They should learn from this tenderness.
They are far away from my beloved.
They have never experienced anything like this, not even in their dreams!
I dare anyone to have a laugh or beautiful eye colors like her. If anyone does, they should come to me.
target: اللي عنده ضحكة زي ديا واللي لون عيونه مش عادية يجيي هنا جانبي يجيي ليا

source: I have to see for myself.
I melt in this sweet laughter.
I melt in that sweet look.
They will have to learn and imitate.
Probably they will be shocked at how hard it is.
She gets more beautiful every day.
I will never let her out of my arms.
The past belongs to the past.
Such beauty is found only once in a lifetime.
May God protect my beloved who puts my troubled heart at rest again.
target: عيني باردة عاللي خلى قلبي ناره تهدى

source: Threaten to leave!
I will go away even without saying goodbye.
target: طب وانا هبعد ولا هسال فيك

source: Stay here and do not come to me!
You have wasted our love.
If you can do it, so can I, and you are the one who loses.
target: يعني لو كنت هتقدر هقدر وهتخسر اكتر

source: I have endured much for your sake.
target: ده انا يا ما اتحملت عشانك

source: You never cared.
Should I think of it as a promise?
We are no longer made for each other.
Or is it just a chat that we will forget right away?
If it is easy for you to say empty words and offer no solutions, it is easy for me to leave the one who leaves my heart in this brutal way.
target: لو سهل عليك تقول كلام ملهوش حلول انا سهل اسيب اللي يسيب قلبي بقساه

source: Listen to the people; I will leave you
Time will bring you back to me. Unfortunately, no one will feel your sorrow then.
target: بكرة الايام هتجيبك لكن يا خسارة ساعتها مين هيحس بيك

source: He who gives up easily cannot be forgiven.
target: هو اللي بيبع بالساهل ينفع وياه نتساهل

source: Truly, I am the guilty one because I trusted you.
target: فعلا ما انا اللي استاهل لما امنت بيك

source: Why should I accept my dignity being violated just because you try to make me jealous!
target: علي ايه اجرح كرامتي علشان تصحي غيرتي؟

source: But now I can not stand it anymore.
target: بس النهاردة لا يمكن ارضى اعيش كده

source: Why do you think I put up with and accept everything you do?
target: ليه فاكر مهما تعمل انا هتحمل و اكمل

source: I am not an angel who can stand it with you like this
target: انا مش ملاك اصبر معاك بالشكل ده

source: You are my whole life, my hopes, and the best years I have ahead of me.
target: يا كل حياتي وآمالي ويا أجمل سنين فاتت

source: Every moment with you has been precious...
target: وحبي وكل أشواقي وكل لحظة معاك كانت

source: I am a part of you and indeed here for you.
My life is for you and all yours.
I see my life in you.
I see this whole world in your eyes.
You have awakened my feelings.
You make me fly on the wings of imagination.
I see all people in you.
I am jealous of myself when I look at you.
You haunt me and occupy my thoughts all the time
target: بتسرق كل اوقاتى وتشغل ياما تفكيرى

source: You make me experience love in a new world that no one has ever lived before.
target: وخلتنى اعيش الحب فى دنيا ما عاشها يوم غيرى

source: In the sweet world of your love you call me and whisper.
target: فى دنيا حبك الحلوة تنادينى وتهمس همس

source: We will write a song for happiness, composed on sun strings.
target: ونكتب للفرح غنوة ونغزلها بخيوط الشمس

source: You and I will spend our best years together.
target: أنا وأنت لوحدينا نعيش أجمل فصول العمر

source: The whole world will make up for our lost years.
target: وكل الدنيا حوالينا تعوضنا سنين الصبر

source: I am overjoyed now.
My heartbeat increases.
You always surprise me.
You are so sweet, all the time.
For what I see with my own eyes, whenever I see you, I always ask you to stay between my arms, oh love
target: من اللي انا شايفه بعيني كل ما أقابلك أقول تعالى حبيبيتي

source: Come to me!
Do not leave me!
Come into my arms!
Come to me! Let us live our lives to the fullest.
I definitely live in a whole new world when you are by my side
target: ببقي فى عالم تاني و انتي جنبي اكيد

source: If I leave her, I will be in distress.
target: ده لو اتساب لا ده انا يجيني تعب اعصاب

source: If I leave her even for a night or two, I will be severely tormented
target: ده لو اتساب ليلة ليلتين اعيش في عذاب

source: So, what should I do?
In two minutes I was caught by her eyes.
target: في دقيقتين ده بيقتلني وياخد العين

source: No, this goes beyond flattery!
No, this is more than admiration.
I have never fallen in love like this before.
target: انا عمري ما حد خطفني كده

source: She has gradually captured my heart.
There are things that cannot be hidden between two lovers.
target: فى حاجات مش ممكن تستخبي ما بين اتنين احبه

source: Care and unlimited affection are waiting for my baby.
target: في دلع متشال لحبيبي و حنيه من غير حساب

source: Tonight I am overjoyed.
I saw her like a moon because I long for her.
She drew me to her.
The closer I get to her, the better I feel.
Who did this to me?
Please, someone tell me.
Happiness seems to be on its way.
Your place is still in my heart, wherever you are
target: مكانك في قلبي مهما كنت بعيد عليه

source: We do not meet new lovers every day.
target: ومش كل يوم بنقابل حبايب جداد

source: I miss your voice and your laugh, dearest.
target: صوتك واحشني وضحكتك يا حبيبي ليه

source: I wish so much I could see you again so soon.
target: ياما نفسي اشوفك تاني في اقرب معاد

source: I could not forget you and our nights together.
When the nights go by, I miss you, dearest, and I keep thinking.
target: كل ما تفوت ليالي كل ما اشتاق يا حبيبي واقول

source: Do you miss our days together, or have you forgotten everything?
I suffer a lot without you.
I wish I could spend all my life with you.
target: كان نفسي أعيش عمري معاك على طول

source: I did not think we would be apart for so long.
No one can take your place when you leave.
target: محدش هيعرف يملي اي مكان تسيبه

source: Our shared memories keep me alive after you left me.
target: وعايش حياتي في بعدك علي الذكريات

source: No one in this world can find comfort when they lose their love.
target: في حد في الدنيا دي بيعوض حبيبه؟

source: I myself have stirred up the stories in my heart.
target: انا اللي بايدي صحيت في قلبي حكايات

source: In front of her mirror, she pampers herself as much as she always does.
I wait for her while I spur her on to finish.
She laughs while I look at her
She picks out her colors.
She asks me my opinion about her dress.
How should I choose since her beauty makes the world very sweet?
target: طب ه اختار ازاي وجمالها بيحلي الدنيا بحالها

source: In my eyes she is the sweetest of them all.
Let her walk in vanity, she has no comparison.
target: تتقل على كيفها مين زيها مين

source: I want and see no one but her.
target: مش عايز غيرها ولا شايف غيرها

source: She is the apple of my eyes.
I am very weak before her eyes.
What should I do?
Her talk is already enough!
I can not resist her.
What a beauty!
They told me a lot about her.
They said her beauty was precious, but when I met her, she was beyond imagination.
target: قالوا جمالها خيال وأما قابلتها غير

source: She was beyond imagination.
And how! She's just unbelievable.
Oh man!
Keep calm? Why should I stay calm?
Yes, yes! She's just stunning.
Look, my heart, how she looks.
target: بص شوف يا قلبي عاملة ايه

source: I have seen many girls, but it is her tiny details that awaken the passion in my heart.
target: شوفت كتير وقليل بس دي بالتحديد عندها كدة تفاصيل خلت ناري تقيد

source: Your beauty has captured my eyes. You are sweeter than the moon.
target: ياللي عليكي العين زي القمر واحلا

source: You make the world better, my sweetest baby.
Your features are beautiful. Happy is your lover.
target: ملامحك جميله وكلك جميله يابخت اللي تبقي معاه

source: Your dear eyes light up the world.
I immediately fell in love with the smile on your cheeks
target: والضحكه علي الخدين تتحب وفي ثانيه

source: You do not like it anymore when I get upset and reproach you?
What do you get out of living like this?
target: إيه اللي غاصبك ع العيشة دي واللي بقينا فيه؟

source: Do not you care anymore whether I am here or not?
I have many lovers waiting for me.
Hey! I celebrate your departure.
target: ما تفوق يا عم انا همشي اقول في الشارع هيه

source: I will give a party.
I'll finally forget everything.
target: وخلاص هنسي اللي كان مهما كان

source: We are no past history.
Why are you behaving like this?
This is the solution for everyone like you. The door is open, you can go.
target: انت اللي زيك بجد حله بدل ده كله السكه اهي وادي الباب مفتوح

source: You can go. Goodbye!
No need to worry, because you have not left good memories.
target: لا عليك ملامة ولا ليك علامة

source: Truly, easy come, easy go!
No cure can ever heal a wound caused by our loved ones.
target: جرح الهوى لو من الحبايب ملوش دوا

source: My heart is totally in love .
Forget what we had!
I have forgotten.
Everything we had is just a memory now.
Go away from me!
Go away! You are the reason I suffer.
My heart forgave you. My wound forgave you.
target: ده انا قلبي سامحك وجرحي سامحك

source: May God forgive you!
Oh pity for the wasted days!
There is nothing more to say after what you said.
I have banished your love from my heart.
target: انا حبي ليك اه من قلبي شيلته

source: I will not cling to someone who has already left me.
After all you have done, now you come to talk to me!
Have you finally remembered me?
My heart is attached to this laughter.
I cannot get her image out of my head.
When I say she's is the sweetest girl in the world, who can say otherwise?
target: لو اقول دي احلي ما في الدنيا مين بعد الجمال ده هيعلق

source: Her walk is mesmerizing. Watch and learn!
This is the one to learn from.
target: أهي دي اللي ع الكل هتعلم

source: She is perfect, flawless.
There is nothing wrong with her.
That is not a compliment
I do not have to say more about her beauty.
Her looks attract me.
She is the breath of my life's dream.
If I say she is the sweetest woman in the world, is there any objection?
target: لو اقول دي احلي ما في الدنيا مين ده اللي يعارضني

source: Really! Who can say otherwise?
Her features are so beautiful, especially her charming smile.
Doors are opened in front of her.
She sways; I can not stand it.
I can not even resist her coquetry.
My eyes still see you as bright as the moon.
target: انتي لسه زي ما انتي قمر في عيني

source: I had the best life with you.
target: أحلى عمر ده اللي كان بينك وبيني

source: Whenever your name is mentioned, I say "she is my precious, well-bred beloved".
target: واما تيجي في الكلام سيرتك بقول دي حبيبتي الغاليه دي بنت الاصول

source: I cannot accept any word that belittles you.
target: مستحيل اقبل في حقك اي كلمه

source: You are a star above all others
You are a star.
Whoever asks about you, I say she is a blessing.
target: واللي يسالني عليكي بقول دي نعمه

source: Your beauty is indescribable.
You are still as beautiful as ever.
To me you are the same old love.
The same affection, but the feelings are hidden.
You have left good memories in my heart.
target: ده انتي سايبه جوه قلبي ذكري حلوه

source: I still hear your voice like a song in my ears.
target: لسه صوتك بسمعه في وداني غنوة

source: Truly, life is worthless after you left me.
target: دي الحقيقه ان الحياه بعدك ما تسوي

source: My love for you grow stronger every day when you are gone.
target: حبي ليكي كل يوم في البعد يقوي

source: Do not worry.
How are you doing? How is everything going?
Beginnings are sweet.
Beginnings are full of new stories.
I spend nights with you and talk for hours on end.
Your love drives me crazy.
I spend the whole night thinking of you.
We would live a happy life that would compensate me for my past life.
target: نفرح ونعيش نعوض عمري قبلك فات

source: My longing for you always brightens my days.
What has happened to me?
Your love has changed everything in me.
Oh, my shining moon! Make me ever awake and busy.
I swear I woll never get tired of your love.
Me, you and our joy, we three will live a happy life.
target: انا وانت وتالتنا فرحتنا والحياة حلوة

source: We live life to the fullest.
We love our lives.
We have lived and truly loved the true stories
Oh your mood!
You are rogue and sweet in your madness.
Oh, you are a hard-to-reach star.
You have turned my life upside down.
These are the eyes
That stunned my yearning heart.
Your style has captivated me.
Your features are serene and soothing; they radiate light and charm.
target: ملامحك هادية بتطمن وطالع منها سحر ونور

source: What I have said has never been said before.
target: انا قلت اللي ما حدش قاله

source: What I have done, I have never done before.
I have no problem with her leaving me, whatever.
Soon she will realize her biggest mistake.
She will remember it all her life.
Whenever she meets a new love she will remember me.
target: وكل ما يقابل في بعدي هيفتكرني

source: She only wishes she could know me.
She shall realize who her true friends and lovers are.
I have always cared about her feelings.
target: ده أنا ياما عملت حساب زعله

source: After all she has said and done, there is nothing that could make me fogive her.
target: أنا بعد كلامه وأفعاله لا يمكن حاجة تشفعله

source: Oh doctor, the left side of my chest aches.
target: عم الطبيب، جنبي الشمال ده بتجيله شكة

source: I suffer all night and lament.
He made me take off all masks.
He recognized all my burdens.
He said sadly, "Get up."
You do not need a doctor, my son.
Your treatment is a true lover.
Oh herbalist, make me a special mixture.
target: عم العطار، اعملي من عندك تحبيشة

source: I will use the mixture to soothe the bitterness of life.
He looked at me and asked, "Which part hurts?"
Is it joy and sorrow, like all of us?
I told him my problem was that I was not opening up.
He told me the cure was to have real friends.
Oh Sheikh, I have been confused for a long time.
target: شيخ العرب، آديلي مدة دايخ مدوخا

source: I asked him to cut to the chase.
I am in a bad situation.
Your cure - and do not interrupt me - needs a magician.
target: قالي دواك وبلاش تقاطع عند العجيب أبو سر باتع

source: I asked again.
Oh poor soul, money solves all problems.
target: قالي يا متعوس كل العلل دواها فلوس

source: Oh my long journey, oh my misery, oh my agony!
target: يا طول غلبي، يا طول توهتي، يا آهه جديدة على آهاتي

source: Your remedy is bitter, but I will try it.
But your cure is rare and hard to find.
The first day after the separation passes very slowly.
target: أول يوم في البعد يوم بيعدي سنين

source: It is another life between your before and after it.
Walking alone.
You wonder where you are going.
target: تسأل نفسك هو أنا رايح فين؟

source: When you sleep with pain, the dreams fade. You feel like you are dying after your lover leaves you.
target: لما تبات مجروح والاحلام بتروح احساسك وحبيبك سايبك زي طلوع الروح

source: The first time I think about my purpose in life.
target: اول مرة بفكر عمري بعيشه انا ليه

source: I can not believe I will never hear your voice again.
target: بقى معقول مش هقدر تاني اسمعلك صوت؟

source: I have gotten used to going to sleep and waking up and hearing your voice, sweetheart.
target: بعد ماكنت بنام يا حبيبي وبصحى عليه

source: It is the first time since we met that I feel like my heart is dead.
target: اول يوم من يوم ماعرفتك قلبي يموت

source: We had a life to live together.
Where would we find a similar life? And who can give a similar life?
Too hard to destroy in a minute what we have spent years building up.
target: اصعب حاجة تهد في ثانية اللي انت بنيه في سنين

source: All I think about is the first day after we broke up.
target: أول يوم في البعد ده اللي بأفكر فيه

source: What should I do after you are gone?
May God help those who are separated from their loved ones, oh my!
target: ده اللي يفارق أغلى حبايبه يا عيني الله يقويه

source: On Tuesday, three girls called out to me.
On the sidewalk, O people, I see girls with beautiful eyes.
target: ع البساط بصات يا ناس عجبوني

source: We had a nice get-together. They even invited me to have lunch with them.
I was fascinated by their tiny details.
It seems that I fell into their net.
Who should I love! The blonde, the brunette or the red-cheeked chick?
target: اعشق السمرا ولا اعشق البيضاء ام الخدود حمرا

source: Life is sweet with you, oh miss rosy cheeks!
target: الحياة حلوة ويا أم الخدود حمرا

source: They are all so pretty. They drive me crazy.
Whenever I think of leaving, I stay even longer.
target: كل ما أجي أقوم أقول خليني

source: You really are so beautiful!
Should I leave this place?
Why should I leave?
You attract me.
Your silky hair moves in the air in front of me.
It is hard to see except in my dreams.
target: صعب أشوف ده غير في أحلامي

source: Their charm is dangerous
It is indescribable.
A Tuesday of a thousand days!
I can not even decide who has the best body.
target: كل عود وعود أحلى من التاني

source: My heart is no longer mine It follows them.
target: قلبي لم يعود ليا من تاني

source: I had an oud in my hand.
I used it to sing songs.
I come in the morning to the one I loved.
Quickly it grew dark after our chat.
I had the best day of my life I can imagine.
target: عشنا يوم جميل أحلى ما أتخيل

source: She slowly leans against me.
If I spend my life here, it will not be enough.
I love her affection and  pride.
I love her madness.
I love her jealousy and suspicion.
target: بحبه في غيرته علي ولما بيتهيا له

source: I am used to her.
I know her inside out.
There is no one like her.
target: لا في زيه ولا هلاقي ربعه

source: I love her. What should I do?
When we disagree, I try to fix things and obey her.
My heart is on fire.
I can not bear to be separated from her.
She is on my mind day and night.
I love her. I like her eyes to follow me.
She makes me crazy and worried.
I swear I love her but she never believed me.
target: بحبه وانا بحلف له وعمره ما صدقني

source: I love my baby in all her moods, in her suspicions and her stories.
target: بحبه حبيبي في كل حالاته في سوء ظنه وحكاياته

source: When will my baby get wiser, so I get all her attention?
target: هيعقل امتى حبيبي وانا واخذ كل اهتماماته؟

source: People envy you for your beautiful body, my sweetheart.
Swaying on the notes of the lute.
After all I have experienced, I can say that 'everything comes at the right time.'
target: بعد اللي أنا دوقته، كله بيجي بوقته

source: We have all night to sing.
Your company is worth a hundred meetings.
We do not need company.
When I see you I forget everything around me.
My eyes have never seen or imagined such beauty before.
target: ده لا شافت عيني ولا جه عالبال

source: With you I always have a calm head.
Your body is magnificent.
You are by my side, yet I still long for you.
Do not go far away!
My eyes are so happy to see you.
I wish I could do what you did and forget.
Tell me how you managed to forget me.
I still remember you.
I am not the type who forgets easily.
My heart has never listened to me or helped me forget you.
target: انا عمري ما قلبي طاوعني ولا ساعدني انساك

source: On the contrary, it keeps reminding me of you and makes me waste more years of my life.
I see you leaving me, why do I still blame you?
I wonder where I got all my patience from.
target: أنا بسأل نفسي أنا جيبت الصبر ده كله منين

source: Whoever saw us in the past thought we were soul mates.
target: اللي يشوفنا زمان انا وانت كنا الروح بالروح

source: Baby, how come we forget those days and let them go?
target: ازاي يا حبيبي هننسى والايام دي تروح؟

source: After all the passion you want us to part and start new stories.
target: بعد الحب ده كله عايزنا نبقى لناس تانيين

source: Do you see that we are done and never coming back?
target: للدرجادي انت شايفنا روحنا ومش راجعين!

source: This is the first and last time I think I am safe with someone.
target: اول مرة واخر مرة ادي لحد امان

source: I am not used to showing my vulnerabilities.
target: متعودتش ولا مرة نقطة ضعفي تبان

source: When two lovers break up, it's always because they do not share the same affection.
target: دايما اي اتنين اتفارقوا مش نفس الاشواق

source: One does not care at all, and the other is dying to see his beloved.
target: واحد يفضل ولا همه والتاني بيشتاق

source: Such is her attitude. She is not pretending.
She is like that and you have to accept that.
In a fight she always speaks extemporaneously.
She is blind and cares for nothing.
Let her finish.
She is tired
It is all right to listen to her complaint at the end of the day that she is suppressed
target: واختم يومك بيها بتلومك انها مظلومة كانسانة

source: She would relax if you gave her an answer.
We are blessed to have you in our lives.
target: ده احنا في املة ان انت معانا

source: When she realizes she was wrong, just sing her praises.
target: واما تقولك انا غلطانة، طبل طبل

source: She talks.
Listen to her
Stay calm, and do not talk too much.
When she expresses her opinion, praise her and cheer her with amusement.
target: هي بس تقول رايها وقولها الله اكبر

source: When she says "hello.", I am in love with her voice and her words.
target: اه لما يقول الو بعشق صوته وكلامه يا عالم يا هو

source: Her beauty is incomparable.
My eyes love to see her all the time.
target: دي عيوني كل ثانيه بيحبو يشوفوه

source: She deserves all the words of love I say to her.
target: ده اللي يتقال له كلام حب

source: No one else has said it.
People are jealous of her.
Why should I leave her?
How can that be when my soul is in her arms!
As soon as I saw her I went crazy.
target: ده انا من اول ماشوفته وهتجنن عليه

source: She has absolute power.
She made me fall head over heels in love with her.
Honestly, this is my chance!
I can not miss it.
She is the one who has my heart. She's free to do whatever she wants.
target: ده اللي يتشال جوه القلب ويعمل مابداله

source: I left the whole world and loved her.
I blame you because I believe in our love.
Building on our love, I want you to listen a little and understand what I mean.
target: ومن باب المحبه عايزك تسمعني حبه وتفهم قصدي ايه

source: You manipulate my deep love by hurting and leaving me.
target: بقى يعني علشان بحبك يبقى ترد الغلاوة جرح وبعد وقساوة؟

source: Have I ever done anything wrong to you?
Honey, no one has ever been loved like you.
target: ده مفيش حد اتعمله ياحبيبي اللي اتعمالك

source: Make your heart the judge and tell me who is left for you when I leave.
target: حلف قلبك وقوله من بعدي مين فضلك

source: Think again before the gulf gets any deeper.
target: راجع نفسك وفكر قبل الزعل مايكبر

source: I do not want my heart to be filled with sorrow. I do not want to go without telling you.
target: مش عايز اشيل في قلبي وابعد من غير ما اقولك

source: Baby, today leave it to me!
You are my life, for I do not count the years before you.
target: ده انت عمري اللي عمري ماعيشته قبلك

source: You are a part of me.
It is not up to me.
You are sweeter than "I love you".
target: أنت كلمة أحلى من كلمة بأحبك

source: When I am by your side I feel alive and can do anything.
I have no more fears as long as we love each other.
target: ولا بخاف لو ايه في هواك يكون

source: If this is madness, nothing is better than madness.
target: لو ده جنان ايه احلى من الجنون

source: Let us get even crazier!
When I am by your side I am not afraid of time.
I will go with you wherever you go.
target: انا هروح وياك لو رحت فين

source: Where do I get my courage?
You have changed many things about me.
You made me experience a rare love story with you.
target: أنت حالة من حالات العشق نادرة

source: You are my yesterday, and you are also my tomorrow with all its dreams.
target: انت ماضي وانت برضه حلم بكرة

source: I thought that if I loved, I would have a normal love story.
target: كنت بحسب لما احب هحب عادي

source: When I saw you, I forgot everything about me.
target: لما شفتك مين انا مبقتش فارقة

source: So you love me?
Surely this cannot be! This is a joke, is not it?
This way I will brag about it to the whole world.
target: انا كدة هتغر وهتمنظر ع الدنيا دي

source: I will not sleep for joy.
Look what you have done to me!
My most beautiful dream is in love with me?
That is unbelievable!
You are telling me that you love me?
Please, think again.
It is normal that I fall in love with you, but you are too good to fall in love with me
target: العادي احبك مش اكتر بس انت كتير

source: You said "I love you"? Are you sure?
Wait, did you say it or was I just dreaming?
target: لا ثواني قلتها ولا انا متهيالي

source: No, say it again.
No, please, say it again. Do not think I have gone mad.
One last time so people - not me - can believe.
target: طب مرة كمان علشان الناس مش علشاني

source: Exactly what I feared.
target: أهو ده اللي كنت خايف منه

source: But tears do not stop fate.
I am obsessed with finding love now.
You must be afraid when love is in the air, for I have been deceived many times before.
Love is an inexperienced merchant who loves to gamble.
Either he wins double or he loses everything for nothing.
Love, do you still remember me?
I am your regular.
My heart was caught here in your web.
But you sold me a crazy, complicated kind of love.
target: وادتني من الصنف المجنون ابو العقد واللذي منه

source: Yes, I am the one you ripped off.
You are right.
I returned to you defeated and oppressed.
I chose another, only to find out months later that she was worse than the first one.
target: وخدت غيره وبعد شهور طلع اللي بعده اسخم منه

source: Be nice to me this time, dear.
Do not take anything from the past stories!
Do not make the hurt worse!
Are you bluffing, dear?
In the beginning everything is perfect.
But later mistakes appear.
Suddenly there is a blockage!
Such a mistake is innate and not due to abuse!
Anyway, it was a mistake. Let us take care of it.
That should make things better, not worse.
target: ده جر خير مش جر عداوة

source: I want to love. Please, find me someone worthy.
Find me someone special!
Oh, love! Do me a favor, for heaven's sake!
In return I will bring my friends to buy love from you.
Be careful and make it nice this time.
Let us have some fun.
With you comes laughter from my heart
For I am spending the night with you, Oh, baby!
It is a wonderful night.
It is either me or no one else.
No one else!
You will never find anyone as caring as I am.
Or even as tender as I am.
I beat around the bush.
I have my excuse!
I am absolutely right
I give up. I admit it.
Nothing will stop me.
Here I am I come to you, my love.
Make my eyes happy by seeing you.
Antoine De Saint-Exuper
Chapter 1
Once when I was six years old I saw a magnificent picture in a book, called True Stories from Nature, about the primeval forest.
target: في مره، لما كان عندي ست سنين، شفت صوره روعه، في كتاب عن الغابات إللي ماحدش زارها قبل كدا كان اسمه قصص حقيقيه.

source: It was a picture of a boa constrictor in the act of swallowing an animal.
target: وكانت عباره عن تعبان من نوع البوا بيبلع فهد.

source: Here is a copy of the drawing.
In the book it said: Boa constrictors swallow their prey whole, without chewing it.
target: كان بيقولو في الكتاب: تعابين البوا بيبلعو فريستهم كامله من غير مايمضغوها.

source: After that they are not able to move, and they sleep through the six months that they need for digestion.
target: ومش بيبقو قادرين يتحركو بعد كدا، وبينامو لمده ست شهور عشان يهضمو.

source: I pondered deeply, then, over the adventures of the jungle.
target: بعدها، فكرت كثير في مغامرات الأدغال

source: And after some work with a coloured pencil I succeeded in making my first drawing.
target: وأنا كمان نجحت في إني أرسم أول رسمه بالألوان الخشب.

source: My Drawing Number One.
It looked like this:
I showed my masterpiece to the grown-ups, and asked them whether the drawing frightened them.
target: وريت التحفه بتاعتي للكبار وسألتهم إذا كانت رسمتي خليتهم يخافو.

source: But they answered: Frighten? Why should any one be frightened by a hat?
target: ردو عليا وقالو: إيه اللي يخوف في برنيطة؟

source: My drawing was not a picture of a hat.
It was a picture of a boa constrictor digesting an elephant.
target: دي كانت رسمة تعبان بوا وهو بيهضم فيل.

source: But since the grownups were not able to understand it, I made another drawing: I drew the inside of the boa constrictor, so that the grown-ups could see it clearly.
target: بعدها قررت إني أرسم تعبان البوا من جوه، عشان الكبار يقدرو يفهمو.

source: They always need to have things explained.
My Drawing Number Two looked like this:
That is why, at the age of six, I gave up what might have been a magnificent career as a painter.
target: بالطريقة دي إتخليت عن مستقبل هايل في الرسم وأنا عندي ست سنين.

source: I had been disheartened by the failure of my Drawing Number One and my Drawing Number Two.
target: أحبطني فشل رسمتي نمره 1 ورسمتي نمره2.

source: Grown-ups never understand anything by themselves, and it is tiresome for children to be always and forever explaining things to them.
target: الكبار مش بيفهوا أي حاجه أبدا لوحدهم، ودي حاجة متعبة بالنسبة للأطفال،عشان لازم دايما دايما يشرحلهم.

source: So then I chose another profession, and learned to pilot air-planes.
target: عشان كده، إضطريت أختار شغلانه تانية واتعلمت أسوق الطيارات.

source: I have flown a little over all parts of the world; and it is true that geography has been very useful to me.
target: وطرت تقريبا في كل حتة في العالم والجغرافيا بالتحديد خدمتني كتير.

source: At a glance I can distinguish China from Arizona.
target: كنت باقدر أفرق بين الصين وأريزونا، من أول بصة .

source: If one gets lost in the night, such knowledge is valuable.
target: ودي طبعا حاجة مفيدة جدا لو تهت بالليل.

source: In the course of this life I have had a great many encounters with a great many people who have been concerned with matters of consequence.
target: بكده، وخلال حياتي، اتعرفت على ناس مهمين أشكال وألوان.

source: I have lived a great deal among grown-ups.
I have seen them intimately, close at hand.
And that hasn’t much improved my opinion of them.
target: ده كله ماغيرش رأيي فيهم كتير.

source: Whenever I met one of them who seemed to me at all clear-sighted, I tried the experiment of showing him my Drawing Number One, which I have always kept.
target: لما كنت باقابل واحد منهم باين عليه أنه فاهم، كنت باختبره برسمتي نمره 1 اللي كانت معايا على طول.

source: I would try to find out, so, if this was a person of true understanding.
target: كنت باحاول أعرف لو كان بيفهم بجد ولا لأ.

source: But, whoever it was, he, or she, would always say: That is a hat.
target: لكن كان دايما بيجاوبني: دي برنيطة.

source: Then I would never talk to that person about boa constrictors, or primeval forests, or stars.
target: وفي الساعة دي، ماكنتش باكلمه لا عن تعابين البوا، ولا عن الغابات إللي ماحدش زارها قبل كده، ولا عن النجوم.

source: I would bring myself down to his level.
I would talk to him about bridge, and golf, and politics, and neckties.
target: كنت باكلمه عن لعبة البريدج، وعن الجولف، وعن السياسة، أو عن الكرافاتات.

source: And the grown-up would be greatly pleased to have met such a sensible man.
target: وبكده الكبار كانو بيبقو مبسوطين أوي إنهم اتعرفوا على راجل عاقل جدا زيي.

source: Chapter 2
So I lived my life alone, without anyone that I could really talk to, until I had an accident with my plane in the Desert of Sahara, six years ago.
target: بكده عشت وحيد، من غير حد أتكلم معاه بجد، لغاية ست سنين فاتت، لما الطيارة بتاعتي اتعطلت في الصحرا الكبرى.

source: Something was broken in my engine.
